TITLE: Hotel Frisco
LINK: TRUE
ADDRESS: 308 Main Street
CITY: Frisco
MAJOR: 
STATE: CO
ZIP: 80443
PHONE: 970-668-5009
TOLLFREE: 800-262-1002
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
COMMENTS: Dogs are welcome at this classic Rocky Mountain lodge which is located on Frisco's historic Main Street. The hotel offers two dog-friendly rooms with access to the back porch and to the doggie run. Enjoy hiking and swimming with your dog right from the hotel's front door! Dog amenities include dog beds and treats. Dog sitting and walking services are also available.  There is a $10 per day pet fee.

TITLE: Villa Castillo
LINK: TRUE
ADDRESS: 1100 Castle Rd
CITY: Sonoma
MAJOR: Napa Valley
STATE: CA
ZIP: 95476
PHONE: 707-996-4616
TOLLFREE: 
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
COMMENTS: Vacation rental cottage on a three acre landscaped estate available by the month, week, or day. Includes a full kitchen and use of the lap pool/hot tub. Queen bed, full kitchen, cable, phone, fireplace, BBQ and fenced patio. The Olive Grove Cottage is pet-friendly. Please follow the pet rules: any damages will be the responsibility of the dog owner, clean up after pets, pets must be leashed whenever outside the cottage and fenced patio (there is a resident cat, so dogs must not run free), pets not allowed on the bed, and no barking dogs.

TITLE: Redtail Ranch by the Sea
LINK: TRUE
ADDRESS: Call to Arrange.
CITY: Santa Cruz
MAJOR: 
STATE: CA
ZIP: 95060
PHONE: 831-429-1322
TOLLFREE:
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
COMMENTS: This 3 bedroom, 1 1/2 bath ranch house is located on a 72 acre horse ranch, the Redtail Ranch. The house features a 180 degree ocean view of the Monterey Bay and views of the coastal hills. The house sleeps 1 to 8 people and comes with a complete full kitchen. The home is located about a 5 minute drive to local beaches, a 1 hour drive to Monterey, Carmel and Big Sur, and a 1 1/2 hour scenic coastal drive to San Francisco. The rental is available year-round for nightly, weekly, and extended vacation rentals.

TITLE: Pine Haven Cabin Rental
LINK: TRUE
ADDRESS: Call to Arrange.
CITY: Julian
MAJOR: 
STATE: CA
ZIP: 
PHONE: 760-726-9888
TOLLFREE: 
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: Enjoy this dog-friendly mountain getaway on 1.25 acres. The entire lot is securely fenced, offering your pet the freedom to run off-leash. The cabin has one bedroom plus a small loft upstairs, a bathroom with a tiled walk-in shower (no tub), and a fully equipped kitchen. The cabin sleeps 2 people and is off a small private lane, so you will have lots of privacy. No smoking allowed. For reservations call Teresa at 760-726-9888 or email to pinehavencabin@sbcglobal.net.
COMMENTS: Enjoy this charming dog-friendly mountain getaway on 1.25 acres! The entire lot is securely fenced, offering your pet the freedom to run off-leash. The Pine Haven cabin rental offers a comfortable main room with a picturesque view of a local meadow. The cabin has one bedroom plus a small loft upstairs, a bathroom with a tiled walk-in shower (no tub), and a fully equipped kitchen. The cabin sleeps 2 people. Other amenities include air conditioning, stereo system, VCR with hit movie library, karaoke machine, back patio with a picnic table, Weber grill and more! The cabin is off a small private lane, so you will have lots of privacy. Located in the Pine Hills area of Julian (about one hour east of San Diego), the cabin is only 4 miles from historic downtown Julian. No smoking allowed. Cabin rental rates range from $160 to $180 per night. There is a $40 pet fee. For reservations call Teresa at 760-726-9888 or email to pinehavencabin@sbcglobal.net.

TITLE: Colony Inn at South Lake Tahoe
WEBSITE: http://gototahoe.com/rooms/colony.html
HIGHWAY1: None
survey: ca/hotel_ca
ROOMRATE: 
COUNTRY: 
FLAG: 
Submit: Submit
CITY: South Lake Tahoe
EMAIL: 
BOOK: 
IMAGE2: 
IMAGE1: 
RESTAURANT: 
ZIP: 96150
BOOKCOMMENTS: The Colony Inn at South Lake Tahoe is located just 1.5 blocks from Harrah's and the other casinos and just down the street from Heavenly Ski Resort. Want to experience the beautiful outdoors? The Colony Inn's backyard is National Forest Land, featuring dog-friendly hiking, mountain biking, and peace and quiet. There is a $25 refundable pet deposit, and pets cannot be left unattended in the rooms.
COMMENTS: The Colony Inn at South Lake Tahoe has one of the best locations in Tahoe. It's just 1.5 blocks from Harrah's and the other casinos and just down the street from Heavenly Ski Resort and their new Gondola at Stateline. Want to experience the beautiful outdoors? The Colony Inn's backyard is National Forest Land, featuring dog-friendly hiking, mountain biking, and peace and quiet. However, if night life is your thing, the Colony Inn is walking distance to the casinos, restaurants, and night clubs of Lake Tahoe's South Shore. Guests - both 4 and 2-legged, will find our staff friendly and helpful. Enjoy free coffee and doughnuts in the lobby, as well as lots of Tahoe resources, including trail maps, coupons, and free snacks for the slopes. No matter what you like to do on your vacation- gamble, ski, bike, hike, or shop - you'll find our year-round heated pool and hot tub a relaxing way to end (or begin) your day. Visit our website (gototahoe.com) for more info, our pet policy, lodging coupons, and more. We pride ourselves on being the most affordable pet-friendly lodging in South Lake Tahoe. There is a $25 refundable pet deposit, and pets cannot be left unattended in the rooms.
ADDRESS: 3794 Montreal Road
HIGHWAY: None
CATEGORY: Accommodation

STATE: CA
TITLE: Tahquitz Inn
LINK: TRUE
WEBSITE: http://www.tahquitzinn.com
CITY: Idyllwild
survey: us/hotel_us
TYPE: inn
CROSS: 
IMAGE1: ../images/tahquitz2.jpg
ZIP: 92549
COMMENTS: Overlooking the San Jacinto State Park and on it's own three acre wooded parcel is the Tahquitz Inn, where well-behaved dogs and their owners will find one and two bedroom suites with full kitchens (or a refrigerator, microwave, and coffee maker only) ready to make their mountain experience enjoyable. Featuring Idyllwild's only outdoor pool and spa (open May - October), expanded cable channel selections, direct-dial phones with modem ports, and fireplaces, the Inn welcomes visitors year round. With miles of dog-friendly hiking trails nearby, the Tahquitz is centrally located within walking distance of Idyllwild's quaint shops, art galleries, and fine restaurants. The Inn charges $10 per day for your dog, but mention DogFriendly.com when making your reservation, and your pet stays for only $5 per night! The Tahquitz Inn welcomes dogs (and only dogs) in all suites, without restriction to size, weight, or breed.
BOOKCOMMENTS: This inn is located in the heart of Idyllwild and allows all well-behaved dogs. They offer one and two bedroom suites with a separate bedroom, kitchen and porches. The inn has also been a location for several Hollywood film shoots. All of their rooms accommodate dogs and there is a $10 per day pet charge.

There are a few dog rules; no dogs on the furniture, dogs are not to be left alone in the house, you must clean up after your dog and pet owners are responsible for any damages.  Rates start at $150 per night with a 2 night minimum. There is a $30 per dog charge.

RESTAURANT: 
ZIP: 33767
BOOKCOMMENTS: Located on Clearwater Bay, this pet-friendly motel is within walking distance to the Gulf of Mexico and its white sandy beaches. Also close by is big pier fishing, deep sea fishing boats, shopping and fine restaurants.
COMMENTS: Located on beautiful Clearwater Bay, this pet-friendly motel is within walking distance to the Gulf of Mexico and its white sandy beaches. Also close by is big pier fishing, deep sea fishing boats, shopping and fine restaurants. Mar - Jac offers lovely large rooms with carpeting and spacious walk-in closets. All accommodations are immaculately clean, fully equipped and completely furnished. Room amenities include air-conditioning, electric heat, color cable television, fresh towels provided daily and phones in all apartments. Weekly maid service is available. You will enjoy the friendly, home-like atmosphere along with our private fishing dock, lawn, bayside patio with BBQ grill, bayside Whirlpool Bath, washer/dryer and shuffleboard. Everything is done to make your stay with us a most pleasant and relaxing one. Come as our guests, leave as our friends.

COMMENTS: A year-round vacation rental townhouse-style condominium in Mammoth Lakes, a small Mountain Resort in the beautiful High Sierra mountains of California. This condo has two downstairs bedrooms, two bathrooms, and a large living room, dining room, and kitchen. The condo is fronted by a large deck overlooking the development courtyard (where dogs are allowed off-leash), swimming pool, and Jacuzzi building. This is not a hotel-style lodging; rather it is a comfortable, nicely decorated, cozy mountain home in a small development, with a woodburning stove, easy access to both summertime and winter activities. It is close to dining, shopping, and recreation and it is only steps to the free shuttle to Mammoth Mountain. Tons of dog-friendly activities. Streams, lakes, trails, boulders abound! Wide-open spaces in the American West! All dogs are welcome. The $25 per visit pet fee helps with the cleaning.

COMMENTS: Three Buck Inn is an upscale Tahoe City and Squaw Valley dog-loving lodging. Room choices range from Trailside Studios to Riverfront Suites (one and two bedroom suites). Each 520 Sq. Ft. or more mountain suite includes a king bed, sitting area, efficiency kitchen, and bath with fine hotel amenities. Movie channels, plush robes, down comforters, and an electric potbelly stove are just a few of the extras. Four-legged guests are welcomed with cookies, a squeaky toy, a dog bed, Le Bistro water feeder, a ceramic food bowl, and temporary "vacation" tags. More dog amenities include a "doggie" video collection (Homeward Bound, Turner & Hooch, etc.) that your dog can watch while you are out to dinner (popcorn included) and a board game you can play with your dog called "My dog can do that." Dog sitter and doggie day camp numbers are also provided. Just outside the door is a wonderful hiking path where dogs can run off-leash and swim in the river. Tons of nearby hiking paths, dog beaches, mountain bike trails, cross-country ski trails, and restaurants welcoming dogs. Snowshoes will be available in each room during the winter so guests can enjoy winter hikes with their dogs. Complimentary Three Buck Inn water bottles will keep you and your pup hydrated during all your excursions. The location, the accommodations, and the amenities make it paradise for doggies and their humans. Recently rated "4 paws" by New York Magazine. Rates range from $125 to $350 a night (depending on the room and season) and dogs stay FREE. Every dog deserves a vacation at Three Buck Inn. Children are also welcome.

Kelley, was a wedding gift to his daughter, Daisy MacCallum, and is a historic landmark. COMMENTS: Pets of all varieties are warmly welcomed at the MacCallum House Inn and Restaurant, located in the heart of the Mendocino Village. A two-minute walk from the front door to fantastic leash-free beaches and California State Parks. Pets are allowed in the cottages and Barn and are provided with blankets and beds. The original Victorian mansion, built in 1882 by William H. Kelley, was a wedding gift to his daughter, Daisy MacCallum, and is a historic landmark. Rooms include a full gourmet breakfast in our formal dining room or caf; seating with pets is available outside on the front porch as weather permits for breakfast only, not dinner. Please check out our website at www.maccallumhouse.com for Internet specials and pet-friendly deals.

HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: The Hohe House is a non-smoking 2 bedroom/2 bath or 3 bedroom/3 bath, Ocean View, vacation rental in the Pacific Beach neighborhood. The Hohe House sleeps 6 and is fully furnished with all linens provided. There is a 4 night minimum during the low season, $200 nightly, (Mid-Sept to Mid-June), and rates vary for low to high season, from $1275 to $1875 weekly. A $350 refundable, security deposit is required to reserve a week's stay. There is a $10 per night pet fee. Well-behaved dogs over 18 months and under 80 pounds are welcome. 
COMMENTS: The Hohe (Hoy) House is a spacious, non-smoking, 2 bedroom/2 bath or 3 bedroom/3 bath, Ocean View, Private residence in a unique Pacific Beach neighborhood; close to all (Beach, Boardwalk, Restaurants, Nightlife, & Shopping), yet quietly removed from the hubs of activity. The Hohe House sleeps 6 (1 King, 2 Doubles, and a queen sleeper sofa) and is fully furnished with all linens provided. Amenities include: Beach chairs, Beach towels, Boogie boards, Umbrellas, Coolers, & Bicycles for your Beach enjoyment... This is a great dog friendly area. There is a 4 night minimum during the low season, $200 nightly, (Mid-Sept to Mid-June), and rates vary for low to high season, from $1275 to $1875 weekly.  Additional 10.5% hotel room tax applies and rates are subject to change. A $350 refundable, security deposit is required to reserve a week's stay and balance is due 30 days prior to arrival. There is a $10 per night pet fee. Well-behaved dogs over 18 months and under 80 pounds are welcome. They will gladly email the entire pet policy to you.

COMMENTS: With 8+ acres of ocean view gardens, meadows, forest, hiking trails and a secluded beach cove you and your pets will truly feel like you've gotten away from it all. To help your pets get in the vacation mood we welcome them with their own pet basket that includes a bed, towel, blanket, and of course a treat. We like to pamper our "two legged guests" as well with our ocean view cottages and suites that have Jacuzzi tubs, fireplaces, feather beds, private decks and kitchenettes. The charming village of Mendocino, with its many fine galleries, restaurants and shops, is close by. The surrounding area offers rivers, harbors, beaches and spectacular state parks for exploring the natural beauty of the area, as well as wine tasting in the nearby Anderson Valley. We will happily recommend many pet friendly restaurants, tourist activities and beaches in the area. At the end of your day, relax in our ocean view hot tub, while contemplating the sunset over the Pacific Ocean. Whatever your choice, activity or solitude, we'll strive to meet your individual needs.

COMMENTS: The Units at Signal Inn, truly an island hideaway of the rarest kind, consist of 19 luxuriously furnished, charming elevated beach houses with three sided exposure and cross ventilation, situated in a quiet, peaceful and casual atmosphere on the Gulf. Signal Inn is located in Sanibel, one of the most beautiful vacation spots you'll find in the Sunshine State. Sanibel Island is one of the best known of the many barrier islands of Lee County, Florida. Sanibel, which is known worldwide for its magnificent shelling, is connected to the mainland by a three-mile-long causeway. The pet fee (per pet) is $80 per week or $55 for 3 nights. Only particular units allow pets, please inquire at 1-800-992-4690.

COMMENTS: This bed and breakfast's rooms are located in a 100 year old barn behind the main house that houses the Yellow Snow Dog Gear collar and lead business. Rooms have kitchenettes, balconies, Jacuzzi tubs, and are decorated in the style of a B&B. There are 15 guest rooms and 13 have private baths. They welcome all well-behaved dogs and there are no size restrictions. Rates range from $65-140 depending on the season. There is a $10 per day pet fee.

ADDRESS: 288 Scudder Ave.
CITY: Hyannis Port
MAJOR: Cape Cod
STATE: MA
ZIP: 02647
PHONE: 800-637-1649
TOLLFREE: 
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: The B & B is at an 1800 Sea Captain's estate in Hyannis Port in the center of Cape Cod. 14 rooms in two buildings. Full breakfasts, wine hour(s), free bikes, beach stuff, billiards and a bunch more. A chance to see the collection of over 50 classic red sports cars behind the Inn at Toad Hall is probably worth the trip by itself.
COMMENTS: The 1800 Sea Captain's estate is now the only Bed & Breakfast Inn in Hyannis Port in the center of Cape Cod. 14 rooms in two buildings. Anything but formal, the Inn is just a great place to call your home while on the Cape. Full breakfasts, wine hour(s), free bikes, beach stuff, billiards and a bunch more. People friendly as well as dog-friendly. You'll feel a zillion miles away, yet be a half mile from anything, town, beaches, ferries and such. It's really a wonderful place to hang out at and venture out from. We feel it is, and so do all the major guidebooks, and most of the folks who have stayed here and come back. Just a chance to see the collection of over 50 classic red sports cars behind the Inn at Toad Hall is probably worth the trip by itself.

TITLE: Inn at Lake Joseph
LINK: TRUE
ADDRESS: 162 Saint Josephs Road
CITY: Forestburgh
MAJOR: Catskills
STATE: NY
ZIP: 12777
PHONE: 845-791-9506
TOLLFREE: 
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
COMMENTS: The Inn at Lake Joseph provides its guests with comfort, serenity, and all the amenities and ambiance of a memorable Catskills New York getaway. Guests enjoy exquisite views of the Catskills from the Inn's private 250 acre lake and have endless opportunities to get outside and explore the area.<br><br>This bed and breakfast offers privacy and relaxation with its 16 guestrooms and rustic accommodations, some of which are pet-friendly. Dogs of all sizes are welcome and invited to roam the beautiful lawns and forests surrounding the Inn. Four-legged guests receive blankets in their rooms, but human guests must bring appropriate food and supplies. The charge for dogs is $25 per night. Book online or call 845-791-9506!
OLDCOMMENTS: The Inn, located high in the Catskill Mountains on a 250-acre private lake two hours from the NY Metropolitan Area, hosted its first guests in 1984. Like resort hotel lodging, this Country Inn provides a variety of summer and winter recreation activities, including swimming, fishing, boating, kayaking, hiking, tennis, bicycling, cross-country skiing, tobogganing, sledding, snow shoeing and the use of a nearby full-service health and fitness club. But unlike larger hotels, the Inn, with only 17 guestrooms, has been described as a non-pretentious, romantic, luxury, jeansandsneakers, casual country retreat that assures guests a relaxing, private, rustic, mountain lake environment. Breakfast is served on the screened veranda, surrounding guests with the sounds and feel of the lush green forest. When glassed in during winter, guests experience the beauty of a surrounding snowscape. Over the years, the Inn has received numerous awards and has been praised in travel articles and publications, as well as by guests themselves on Trip Advisor. The Inn consists of three distinct dwellings: The Lodge with its casual English Country environment; and for more rustic accommodations, the Adirondack-style Cottage and Carriage House guestrooms with their own private entrances, where pets are welcome. In addition, all of the guestrooms have working fireplaces and whirlpool baths; and most have private sundecks.

TITLE: Lazy L at Willow Creek - A B&B Resort
ADDRESS: 16061 Willow Creek Road
CITY: Lewes
MAJOR: 
STATE: DE
ZIP: 19958
PHONE: 302-644-7220
TOLLFREE: 
HIGHWAY: Highway 1
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: Located on 8 secluded acres overlooking a marsh and creek, the Lazy L offers creature comforts for pets and pet owners.  They offer 5 large rooms with Queen sized beds, a swimming pool, hot tub, pool table, guest kitchen and a barbecue.  The dogs have a fenced in 1 acre run area, are allowed to sleep in the guest rooms and stay by themselves while you shop or go to dinner.
COMMENTS: Located on 8 beautiful, secluded acres overlooking a marsh and creek, the Lazy L offers creature comforts for pets and pet owners.  We offer 5 large rooms with Queen sized beds, swimming pool, hot tub, pool table, guest kitchen and barbecue and much more!  The dogs have a fenced in 1 acre run area, are allowed to sleep in the guest rooms and stay by themselves while you shop or go to dinner. Large lounge areas with flexi gates make this a comfortable and relaxing get away for pet and owner.

TITLE: Secluded Sunsets
ADDRESS: 10616 South Phillips Road
CITY: Clermont
MAJOR: 
STATE: FL
ZIP: 34711
PHONE: 352-429-0512
TOLLFREE: 866-839-2180
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: This is a pet friendly duplex on Pine Island Lake.  It has a two bedroom unit sleeping up to 6 adults and 3 pets and a one bedroom unit sleeping up to 4 adults and 2 pets overlooking a central Florida spring fed lake. Pet fees are $5 per pet per night.  Amenities include a Hot tub, 4 person paddle boat, 2 person canoe, gas and charcoal grills, fire pit area for evening campfires, swimming, fishing, satellite TV and fully furnished kitchens.
COMMENTS: Pet Friendly Duplex on Pine Island Lake.  A two bedroom unit sleeping up to 6 adults and 3 pets and a one bedroom unit sleeping up to 4 adults and 2 pets overlooking a beautifull central Florida spring fed lake. Pet fees are $5 per pet per night.  Amenities include: Hot tub in screened in boathouse on the lake; 4 person paddle boat; 2 person canoe; gas and charcoal grills; fire pit area for evening campfires; swimming; fishing; lawn games; satellite TV with pay-per-view movies;  fully furnished kitchens, linens and blankets provided; oranges, grapefruit, tangerines,lemons and key limes available when in-season; cattle feeding tours and much, much more.  Oh yes, also the most spectacular sunsets in Florida.

CITY: Miami Beach
MAJOR: Miami
STATE: FL
ZIP: 33139
PHONE: 800-783-1725
TOLLFREE: 
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: Pets are welcome in this Miami Beach boutique hotel. They have created a special package that includes a bed, treats, and walking service for only $19.95 per pet per day. The regular pet fee is $15.00 per pet per day.  
COMMENTS: Hotel Ocean's accommodations, mostly suites, are beautifully appointed in a warm Mediterranean style, where decor varies from room to room in colors, shapes, and accents. Furnished with 1930's collectible pieces, original art-deco fireplaces and exquisite bathrooms all units feature sound proofed windows, central A/C, in room safes, trench toiletries, magnifying mirrors, cable TV - vcr, cd players,complimentary continental breakfast and newspaper, VIP passes to nightclubs and much more. Hotel Ocean is the choice for a honeymoon couple, a business executive, holiday makers with pets or guests who want it all; location, comfort, luxury, intimacy and 24 hour attention. Pets are more than welcome, they are our special guests. We have created a special package that includes a bed, treats, and walking service for only $19.95 per pet per day. The regular pet fee is $15.00 per pet per day. Come and enjoy your stay in this small boutique hotel in the middle of South Beach.

TITLE: Harbor View Seasonal Rental
ADDRESS: Call to arrange.
CITY: Fort Bragg
MAJOR: Mendocino
STATE: CA
ZIP: 
PHONE: 760-438-2563
TOLLFREE: 
HIGHWAY: Highway 1
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: Watch the boats go in and out of the harbor and listen to the sea lions and fog horns from this dog-friendly vacation rental. This 3,000 square foot house is entirely furnished. The main floor has a living room, dining room, kitchen, 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom and a deck with a view of the harbor. The upstairs has a large master suite with a deck and a view of the bridge and ocean. The yard has redwood trees and even deer wandering through. This area is popular for year-round fishing. The rental is available throughout the year. Please call to inquire about rates and available dates.
COMMENTS: Watch the boats go in and out of the harbor and listen to the sea lions and fog horns from this dog-friendly vacation rental. This 3,000 square foot house is entirely furnished. The main floor has a living room, dining room, kitchen, 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom and a deck with a view of the harbor. The upstairs has a large master suite with a deck and a view of the bridge and ocean. The downstairs level has an apartment with a sofa bed and full bathroom. The yard has redwood trees and even deer wandering through. This area is popular for year-round fishing. The rental is available throughout the year. Please call to inquire about rates and available dates at 760-438-2563 or 760-809-8889 (cell phone).

TITLE: Beach Bungalow
ADDRESS: Call to Arrange
CITY: Melbourne Beach
MAJOR: 
STATE: FL
ZIP: 32903
PHONE: 321-984-1330
TOLLFREE: 888-414-5314 
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: The Beach Bungalow is 3 large, luxurious 2 bedroom oceanfront villas with private gardens in a small beach town. Dogs of any size are allowed with a $50 cleaning fee. The private gardens are entirely fenced and the floors are tile and hardwood.
COMMENTS: The Beach Bungalow is 3 large, luxurious 2 bedroom oceanfront villas w/ private gardens in a small beach town on the central east coast of Florida, and the closest beach to Orlando and Disney World.  We are happy to accommodate dogs of any size with a $50 cleaning fee. Our very private villas are on an oceanfront beach lane on the Atlantic ocean and just a couple of blocks down the beach from our small town beach boardwalk with it's surf shops and restaurants.  You couldn't find a more convenient and comfortable beach setting, and we renovated our villas with dogs in mind.  We lived there for 12 years with our beasts.  The private gardens are entirely fenced.  The floors are tile and hardwood.  The oceanfront boardwalk is a great place to walk your dog and we'll show you the best way to take your dog for a romp on the beach without risking disturbing beach goers or turtle nests. Please check our website for lots of photos and information. See you at the beach! Rob & Ann

TITLE: Lord Camden Inn
ADDRESS: 24 Main Street
CITY: Camden
MAJOR: 
STATE: ME
ZIP: 04843
PHONE: 207-236-4325
TOLLFREE: 800-336-4325
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: The Lord Camden Inn is located in the heart of downtown Camden. Many rooms boast ocean views, full balconies and kitchenettes. Dogs are welcome and pampered at the Lord Camden Inn with doggy biscuits and a list of activities and day care options awaiting your arrival in your room. Two well-behaved dogs are allowed per room (no size restrictions), and dogs are not to be left unattended. There is an additional $20 per pet per night fee. The hotel is open year round.
COMMENTS: Welcome to the Lord Camden Inn, Camden's finest upscale Inn boasting unsurpassed service, comfort, and elegance, with a premier village location. Extensively renovated in 2004, new amenities include larger suites, private balconies with magnificent ocean views, gas fireplaces, new furnishings, free high speed wireless internet, in-room hair dryers, coffee makers, and irons, new 27" flat screen TV's with DVD players, a state-of-the-art fitness room, and our new Suite Dreams Beds. Located literally steps from village shops, restaurants and Camden's Harbor Park. Our area abounds with recreational opportunities for you and your dog, such as hiking Camden Hills State Park, enjoying a day sail on a local Windjammer or swimming at nearby Megunticook Lake. Dogs are welcome and pampered at the Lord Camden Inn with delicious doggy biscuits, a plush fleece doggy bed, water bowl, and a list of activities and day care options awaiting your arrival in your room. Two well-behaved dogs are allowed per room. Room rates range from $89 - $179 in the quiet season and $159 -$269 in our high season. There is an additional $20/pet/night fee. Open year-round.

TITLE: Magnolia Plantation Bed and Breakfast
ADDRESS: 305 SE 7th Street
CITY: Gainesville
MAJOR: 
STATE: FL
ZIP: 32601
PHONE: 352-375-6653
TOLLFREE: 800-201-2379
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: The Magnolia Plantation has 6 private historic cottages located within walking distance of downtown Gainesville.  It is surrounded by 1.5 acres of lush gardens. They have no pet fees or weight restrictions, and only require that pets be kept on a leash while wandering around the property. Pets are not permitted in the main house but are allowed in one of the six cottages.
COMMENTS: The Magnolia Plantation has 6 private historic cottages located within walking distance of downtown Gainesville.  Surrounded by 1.5 acres of lush gardens, The Magnolia Plantation is a beautiful getaway site for any traveler, and their pet(s).  We have no pet fees or weight restrictions, and only require that pets be kept on a leash while wandering around the property (Maggie, our duck hates to be chased!)  Owners are responsible for any damages caused by their pets, and if pets are used to being up on the furniture, we simply ask that owners bring a sheet to cover our furniture.  Additionally, pets are not permitted in the main house, but rather only in one of our six lovely cottages.
CATEGORY: Accommodation

TITLE: Loganberry Inn
ADDRESS: 310 West Seventh Street
CITY: Fulton
MAJOR: Columbia
STATE: MO
ZIP: 65251
PHONE: 573-642-9229
TOLLFREE: 888-866-6661
HIGHWAY: Interstate 70
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: Just 5 minutes from I-70, The Loganberry Inn has welcomed guests from throughout the world, including such luminaries as Margaret Thatcher and her Scotland Yard detectives. This grand 1899 Victorian home in historic Fulton features pampered elegance including stained glass windows, marble fireplaces and a pet-friendly room. The Loganberry Inn is strolling distance to the quaint downtown area of Fulton. Well-behaved pets are welcome in the Garden Room which has direct access to the fenced in yard.
COMMENTS: Ideally located between Kansas City and St. Louis, just 5 minutes from I-70, The Loganberry Inn has welcomed guests from throughout the world, including such luminaries as Margaret Thatcher and her Scotland Yard detectives. This grand 1899 Victorian home in historic Fulton features pampered elegance including stained glass windows, marble fireplaces, pet-friendly rooms  with Jacuzzi (1 room), down comforters, fine linens, private baths, desks and sitting areas, TV's/VCR's, in-room phones and answering machines - everything you need right down to fluffy robes and slippers.  Cathy's infamous cookies and beverages greet you upon arrival, and her gourmet breakfasts (served in bed, if you wish) are a great way to start the day.<br><br>The Loganberry Inn is strolling distance to the quaint downtown area of Fulton, featuring brick streets, unique antique and specialty shops, great restaurants, Winston Churchill Memorial and Museum, Berlin Wall Breakthrough Sculpture, Westminster College and William Woods University. Check out our web site for 52 things to do and pet policy. Well-behaved pets are welcome in the Garden Room which has direct access to the fenced in yard.

LINK: TRUE
ADDRESS: 125 Kallof Place
CITY: Sedona
MAJOR: 
STATE: AZ
ZIP: 86336
PHONE: 928-204-1942
TOLLFREE: 800-619-4467
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
COMMENTS: A DOG FRIENDLY BED & BREAKFAST INN "Romance and intrigue, comfort and luxury, beauty and character, escape and adventure - the Lodge at Sedona has it all." Arizona Daily News<br><br>The Lodge at Sedona is proud to be a DOG FRIENDLY Inn. As dog owners & lovers, our guest service team is dedicated to ensuring the optimum comfort of all guests (dog owners & non-dog owners alike).<br><br>The Lodge at Sedona has designated several main level King suites for guests visiting with dog companions.  We permit one well behaved accompanied dog guest per room.  Guests planning to stay at the Lodge at Sedona with a canine companion must make advance two-night minimum reservations for themselves and their dog guest via valid credit card.  Reservations may be made toll free at 800 619 4467.  Suites are limited; therefore we suggest companion reservations at least 25-45 days in advance, depending on season. Guests allowing a pet in their room without a confirmed Companion Reservation will be charged a cleaning fee of $200 without further authorization.<br><br>There is a $35 per night additional charge for a dog guest. We provide a throw blanket, extra towels, a comfortable sleeping cot and water bowl. Dog Guests cannot be allowed on the furniture in either the guest rooms or the public areas. Guests with a dog companion will be charged a $200 refundable pet deposit. Deposits will be credited within 48 hours of damage-free departure.<br><br>Dog guests are welcomed with a Canine Goodie bag at check-in.  This includes a few dog treats, doggie pick up bags, Lodge at Sedona dog friendly guidelines, information from local pet stores, nearby dog friendly restaurants, location of vets, Sedona dog-sitters, and a DOG GUEST IN RESIDENCE door hanger to be displayed during breakfast.

STATE: CA

HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: Dog-friendly vacation rentals inside Yosemite National Park offer year-round vacation rentals that range in size from one to six bedrooms. Some of the rentals allow pets, but not all, so please specify your need for a pet unit when you make your reservation. There is a $10/night pet fee (per pet). Please abide by Yosemite's pet regulations, which require that pets be leashed at all times and are not permitted on many Park trails (a couple of exceptions are paved paths in the Valley Floor and a couple of short trails in the south Yosemite area). The rentals are located approximately 10 minutes inside the southern entrance of Yosemite National Park and offer 120 privately owned vacation rentals. 
COMMENTS: We are the only dog-friendly establishment inside Yosemite National Park. We offer year-round vacation rentals that range in size from one to six bedrooms. Some of our rentals allow pets, but not all, so please specify your need for a pet unit when you make your reservation. There is a $10/night pet fee (per pet). Please abide by Yosemite's pet regulations, which require that pets be leashed at all times and are not permitted on any Park trails (a couple of exceptions are paved paths in the Valley Floor and a couple of short trails in our area). We are located approximately 10 minutes inside the southern entrance of Yosemite National Park and offer 120 privately owned vacation rentals. TITLE: Beachview  House

HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: This historic 1892 House on Cumberland Island offers a fully fenced in yard, 3 bedrooms, 4 baths and sleeps up to 9. Pets welcome with prior approval.
COMMENTS: Beachview House was built in 1892 on Cumberland Island as three cottages. In 1923, it was floated down the Atlantic and reassembled in its present location as one cottage. The house retains much of its historic charm - original hardwood flooring - great beadboard walls - even the original claw foot tub! It is furnished with many comfortable antiques and high quality upholstery - but it is designed to be a place to put your feet up and relax to the pace of life that is St. Simons Island. For further information please visit our website.<br><br>Pets:<br>Pet friendly with prior approval.<br><br>Amenities:<br>Cable TV, Full kitchen, Microwave, Dishwasher, Washer/dryer, Two story porch with ocean view, Outside shower and foot wash, Fully fenced-in yard, Paved parking.<br><br>Activities and attractions:<br>In the center of everything right in the village/pier area close to Neptune Park, great shopping, restaurants, the lighthouse, the theater, library, and festival grounds.

Dogs are not allowed on the furniture or in the dining areas, and they must be cleaned up after at all times. They also allow horses.

We ask that dogs accompany you on your adventures and outings and not be left alone in your room. Dogs are not welcome in the dining room and it should be remembered that as dear as your dog is, not all guests are dog friendly. Check our website for our Memorial Day weekend special " Doggy Getaway" hosted by Jackson. We also welcome horses.

TITLE: Stanford Inn by the Sea and Spa
ADDRESS: 44850 Comptche Ukiah Rd and Highway One
CITY: Mendocino
MAJOR: 
STATE: CA
ZIP: 95460
PHONE: 707-937-5615
TOLLFREE: 800-331-8884
HIGHWAY: Highway 1
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: This resort is specially designed to accommodate travelers with pets. The inn is rustic and elegant. Amenities include feather beds, wood burning fireplaces, antiques, sofas, televisions with VCRs and DVDs. The resort offers complimentary breakfast featuring a choice from organic selections of omelets, waffles, burritos, and more. A large pool, sauna and Jacuzzi are protected from the fog by a solarium.  Massage in the Forest provides massage and body work and yoga. The Inn's Catch A Canoe & Bicycles, too! offers kayaking and canoeing on Big River Estuary as well as mountain biking and. Special canoes are set-up to provide secure footing for your dog as well as a bowl of fresh water (Big River is tidal and for eight miles and therefore salty). The Ravens vegetarian/vegan restaurant serves organic cuisine. Well behaved pets may join you at breakfast or dinner in a dining area created especially for them. Feed and water dishes, covers to protect bedding and furniture, sleeping beds and treats are provided in the rooms. There is a $25 pet fee per stay.
COMMENTS: Four Diamond small resort especially designed to accommodate travelers with pets. The inn is simultaneously rustic and elegant, embodying the rugged Mendocino Coast. Ocean view accommodations are paneled in natural wood and furnished with amenities including feather beds, wood burning fireplaces, antiques, sofas, televisions with VCRs and DVDs. The resort offers complimentary breakfasts featuring a choice from the menu of organic omelets, waffles, burritos, and more. A large pool, sauna and Jacuzzi are protected from the fog by a solarium.  Massage in the Forest provides massage and body work and yoga. The Inn's Catch A Canoe & Bicycles, too! offers kayaking and canoeing on Big River Estuary as well as mountain biking and. Special canoes are set-up to provide secure footing for your dog as well as a bowl of fresh water (Big River is tidal and for eight miles and therefore salty). The Ravens, nationally acclaimed vegetarian/vegan restaurant serves organic cuisine. Well behaved pets may join you at breakfast or dinner in a dining area created especially for them. Feed and water dishes, covers to protect bedding and furniture, sleeping beds and treats are provided in the rooms. There is a $25 fee per stay.

This is a full-service hotel with 122 rooms.<br><br>The property's amenities include a restaurant and lounge, room service, complimentary expanded continental breakfast, a computer for guest use in the lobby with Hi-Speed Wireless Internet access, complimentary newspapers, indoor pool beneath a glass-domed solarium, outdoor pool and poolside bar and grill, kids pool, kids sandbox, game room, tennis courts, volleyball court, horseshoes, ice machines, safe deposit boxes, wake-up calls, and free parking.<br><br>Standard amenities include complimentary Wireless Hi-Speed Internet access, individual heat and air-conditioning control, 25" cable TV, desk, radio alarm clock, coffeemaker, hairdryer, iron, ironing board, and speaker telephone with voicemail.<br><br>Pets are welcome in smoking permissible rooms for a $20 per night fee.<br><br>At least one occupant must be 21 years of age and a valid credit card is required at check-in.

TITLE: The Topanga Treehouse
ADDRESS: Call to Arrange
CITY: Dorrington
MAJOR: Bear Valley - Arnold
STATE: CA
ZIP: 95223
PHONE: 415-488-0278
TOLLFREE: 
HIGHWAY: Highway 4
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: This two bedroom, two bath vacation rental is located on Highway 4 between Arnold and Bear Valley. It sleeps 4 people. Well behaved dogs are welcome with a $100 refundable security deposit. Dogs should be groomed and have flea control. Dog beds, dog bowls and treats are provided.
COMMENTS: Welcome to the Topanga Treehouse. The name "Topanga" is an old Shoshonean word which means "To the Sky or Heaven." This charming, cozy newer cabin is nestled sky high in the cedar and sugar pine trees and has the feeling you're living amongst the treetops. Perfect for accommodating two couples or for a romantic weekend, this cute cabin offers serenity and natural forest beauty. The cabin has two bedrooms, two full baths and sits on a large upslope wooded lot that has a fenced area for your dogs to play in.&nbsp;<br><br>Calaveras Big Trees State Park is located only one mile from the cabin with scenic, dog friendly fireroads and endless views for hiking, biking, snowshoeing or cross country skiing.Bring your kayak or canoe and paddle the crystal clear mountain lakes including Utica, Union, Spicer and Alpine lakes. Bear Valley Ski Resort, Bear Valley Cross Country Ski Resort are 20 minutes up the hill on Highway 4.&nbsp;<br><br>This Non-Smoking cabin is located on a quiet, wooded cul-de-sac and is just 5 minutes from the beautiful, golden Stanislaus River. It is great place to unwind and enjoy the clean mountain air. The cabin has two bedrooms each with a bathroom. Both rooms have queen-size beds and views of the trees and forests. The living room has a comfortable queen size sofa bed as well. There is a wood burning stove to cozy up to in winter, and plenty of games and cards to play with as well as an assortment of videos for your enjoyment. The large front deck is perfect for outdoor dining in the warmer months. The cabin can accommodate off road parking for two vehicles in winter.&nbsp;<br><br>There are many wonderful restaurants in Arnold and Dorrington as well as Bear Valley. During the summer months, our guests are free to enjoy Big Trees Village Recreation Center, just a short walk from the cabin. The center has a children's pool and a lap pool as well as tennis courts, basketball courts, and outdoor movies in the warm summer evenings.&nbsp;<br><br>Well behaved dogs are welcome with a $100 pet refundable security deposit. There are endless activities for you and your pups year round. During the winter months our guests enjoy snowshoeing, cross country skiing and just playing in the snow with Fido. The summer months are filled with endless days of hiking on dog friendly trails, and swimming and canoeing in the many lakes and rivers that encompass this quiet and secret part of the Sierra.&nbsp;<br><br>Amenities:<br>Wood burning stove, Phone, Stereo, CD Player, TV, Cable TV, VCR, Video's, Full Kitchen, Microwave, Refrigerator, Dishwasher, Cookware &amp; utensils, Washer, Dryer, Gas barbecue, Deck, Balcony, Patio, Fenced-in yard, Dog beds, Dog bowls and treats.<br><br>Activities and attractions:<br>Walk, hike, bike or drive to Calaveras Big Trees State Park. Dogs are allowed on fire roads in the park. Fish the Stanislaus River, only five minutes from the cabin. Numerous hikes to beautiful lakes and Bear Valley Ski Resort is only 25 minutes up the mountain, home of the Bear Valley Music Festival.<br><br><br>Pets:&nbsp;<br><br>Well Behaved, Housetrained dogs welcome with a $100 refundable pet deposit.&nbsp;<br>Please groom dogs before arrival and have on flea control medication.&nbsp;<br>Dog beds, dog bowls and treats provided.&nbsp;<br><br>Rates:&nbsp;<br>$150.00 per night. $180.00 per night holidays. 6% County Tax.&nbsp;<br>Minimum stay:&nbsp;<br>2 and 3 holidays.&nbsp;<br>Dates available:&nbsp;<br>Year Round.&nbsp;<br>Deposit and payments:&nbsp;<br>$300.00 Refundable Deposit. $100.00 Refundable Pet Deposit. $85.00 cleaning fee.&nbsp;<br>Restrictions:&nbsp;<br>No Smoking.&nbsp;<br>Contact:&nbsp;<br>Phone: 415-898-0238<br>E-mail: topangatreehouse@earthlink.net

Because it is a landmark historic property, we are not allowed to fence it. Our fee for a dog is $25.

COMMENTS: We bought a vacation home so we would have somewhere to take our dogs on vacation!  Then we decided to open our home to other families who consider their dogs "part of the family." Between the trees you can even catch a glimpse of the lake from the deck. After staying at Percy's Place you will be begging to come back!

TITLE: Seabrook Exclusives
ADDRESS: Seabrook Island Resort, 1-4 bedroom accomodations
CITY: Seabrook Island
MAJOR: Charleston
STATE: SC
ZIP: 29455
PHONE: 843-768-0808
TOLLFREE: 888-718-7949
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None 
COMMENTS: All amenities offered by the Seabrook Island club are offered to guests of Seabrook Exclusives.<br><br>Golf Seabrook Island offers two championship 18 hole, par 72, golf courses within the privacy of Seabrook's gates. Ocean Winds, designed by Willard Byrd, plays out to the ocean and returns along the sea. Crooked Oaks, created by legendary Robert Trent Jones, laces through Seabrook's ancient live oaks, hardwoods, palmettos, and tall pines. Lessons and equipment rental are available through the pro shop.<br><br>Tennis Seabrook's popular Tennis Center features Har-Tru clay courts where professionals offer excellent teaching programs for all levels of play. Find a partner or play in the many tournaments organized throughout the year. A fully stocked pro shop is available for all of your tennis needs. <br<br>Horseback Riding Only Seabrook offers their famous Equestrian Center featuring 42 stalls and three miles of spectacular island and beach trails. Both English and Western instruction are offered at all levels - pony rides too! Enjoy an exhilarating beach ride or scenic trail ride guided by Seabrook's skilled staff. July 14-24, 1999, Seabrook will again host the international Hunter-Jumper Charleston Summer Classic. <br><br>Water Sports Boaters find Bohicket Marina, adjacent to Seabrook Island, a convenient full service facility accommodating yachts up to 110 feet. At Bohicket, you're only three and one-half miles away from the Intracoastal Waterway to the open Atlantic. Charter fishing boats, sailboats, and run-abouts are available for hire.<br><br>Swimming Along with Seabrook's four miles of spectacular, white sand beaches, the Club pool complex features a junior Olympic size lap pool, wading pool, and additional family size pool. Private swimming lessons and water aerobics are available during summer months. Pool use is offered at no charge to Seabrook Exclusive guests.<br><br>Crabbing: Take advantage of this old time favorite activity from Seabrook's crabbing dock along the marsh. Crabbing and fishing equipment are available at the Recreation Pavilion. <br><br>Kid's Club, Teen, and Family Activites Seabrook offers a fun filled Kid's Club from Memorial to Labor Day and holidays. Featuring educational activities, crafts, biking, golf, tennis, horseback riding, swimming and more, this expertly supervised program is a great way to meet new friends and have a wonderful time. Children ages 4-10 are invited to enjoy the half or full-day programs. Teen activities such as pool parties and organized games offer entertainment and a great way to make friends. Family activities include Bingo, ice-cream socials, movie nights and other events throughout the summer season to bring the family together and have some old fashioned fun for all ages. Daily activities are posted in the Recreation Pavilion. <br><br>Biking Seabrook offers its wide beach and paved trails for a relaxed pleasure ride or a full work out. <br><br>Fitness Center Located in the Recreation Pavilion, this newly structured exercise facility offers everything you need for cardio vascular and weight workouts, including televisions, music and ocean views. <br><br>PET TERMS AND CONDITIONS <br>Pet friendly villas require a $200 non-refundable fee on all weekly rentals, which has been included in your rental charge. Guest is responsible for any and all damages to the premises caused by the pet, including, but not limited to: urine, chewing, scratching or destruction of property. Guest must pick up after pet at all times in all locations. Excessive barking is prohibited. If your pet has separation anxiety, do not leave him/her in the villas alone. Guests found in violation of this regulation will be fined and/or be asked to leave, forfeiting any remaining rental nights. Pets must be even-tempered, well behaved, sociable, and in good health. If your pet is anxious, aggressive, or likely to be highly stressed, it is probably in his best interest to make alternative plans. All pets are required to use flea prevention such as Frontline or Advantage. Please be sure and clean and vacuum regularly  during your stay. Due to ongoing complaints, these regulations have been created in an effort create a more harmonious environment. Please be conscious of your neighbors, many of whom reside permanently. If problems continue, pets may not be allowed in certain areas of the Island or particular villas or homes. Please help us to continue our 'pet friendly' service to you and your pet.

COMMENTS: A cherished landmark in the historic Garden District of New Orleans, The Pontchartrain Hotel has been catering to discerning guests since the 1920's. Where old world elegance meets Southern hospitality each of the 118 guest rooms and suites are individually designed and exquisitely furnished, offering the spledour of a bygone era while providing luxurious, modern amenities.<br><br>For every guest, The Pontchartrain offers the subtle ambience of a small European Inn with amenities that include valet parking, local club privileges and business conference center services. Room amenities include cable television, tea/coffee-making facilities, hair dryers, safe deposit box, iron/ironing board and more!<br><br>Guests can also experience the authentic atmosphere of New Orleans' nightlife at the Bayou Bar, where cocktails and camaraderie combine crescent city-style. Added in 1947, the Bayou bar remains a popular meeting place for local professionals as well as guests.<br><br>The Pontchartrain has set the stage for New Orleans' most memorable and prestigious weddings, receptions, events, banquets and meetings.<br><br>Pet Policy: $50 non-refundable fee, $10 each additional pet over 2.

COMMENTS: Discover a world of casual elegance amidst the splendor and serenity of New Hampshire's White Mountains. As you step into this faithfully restored New England country inn, the painstaking attention to period detail is evident throughout, from elegant decor to the finely preserved woodwork.<br><br>The Bretton Arms' 34 spacious guest rooms and suites feature private baths, in-room telephones, color-cable televisions and high-speed internet access, and are graciously appointed. The intimate dining room of the Inn offers gourmet dinners and hearty country breakfasts, while the cozy fireplaced Parlor Lounge offers a quiet getaway. Guests can meander around the picturesque grounds and delight in the perennial gardens, or indulge in a peaceful respite seated on the veranda.<br><br>Located just a short stroll from the grand Mount Washington Hotel, The Bretton Arms offers guests all the amenities of this historic Resort, including two golf courses and a unique 18-hole putting green situated around the Hotel's spectacular annual gardens.<br><br>Enjoy tennis on one of 12 red clay courts, take a horseback or carriage ride, swim in indoor and outdoor pools, or simply stroll in the shadow of the magnificent Presidential Range.<br><br>Winter guests enjoy great alpine skiing and snowboarding next door at the Bretton Woods Ski Area, New Hampshire's largerst, and 100 kilometers of meticulously groomed cross-country trails, right from the front door of The Bretton Arms. Embark on a romantic horse-drawn sleigh ride, go skating, snowshoeing or swimming, or just relax in one of the Resort's whirlpools or saunas.<br><br>Experience for yourself the timeless elegance and endless recreational pursuits of this classic New England Inn. Our friendly staff looks forward to welcoming you!

During the winter the nordic center at the Mount Washington Hotel allows dogs on a special 8km cross-country ski trail. Dogs need to be leashed on the property and on the trail.

TITLE: Shinneyboo Creek Cabin Resort
ADDRESS: 11820 Eagle Lakes Road
CITY: Cisco
MAJOR: Lake Tahoe
STATE: CA
ZIP: 
PHONE: 530-587-5160
TOLLFREE: 
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: These secluded cabins are located in the High Sierra, surrounded by the Tahoe National Forest. There is a $10 per pet per day additional pet fee.
COMMENTS: &quot;We were greeted by resident Innkeepers, Mike and Chris Rogers with welcoming smiles and walked to our cabin. The air was crisp with impending storm, but the cabin was warm and firelight flickered from a cast iron gas stove in the corner. The cabin smelled wonderful like new cedar and after instructions on the heat and breakfast and available services we were encouraged to make our selves at home and call if we needed anything. Sally, our friendly roving canine who had been in her carrier for the past hour had made herself immediately at home rolling in the snow and pouncing on imaginary snow bunnies.&quot;<br><br>Come stay awhile, enjoy a romantic mountain experience in your own private & intimate "cabin in the woods". Simply relax by the campfire, unwind, and let your mind take you back to a place in time. Enjoy our eight classic log cabins nestled near the base of Old Man Mountain in a wooded glen where Shinneyboo Creek and the stunning South Yuba River meet.<br><br>Surrounded on three sides by the beautiful Tahoe National Forest, these spectacular forests of Jeffery Pines and old growth Cedars provide thousands of acres of rushing rivers, sparkling clear mountain lakes, emerald granite pools and trails like the Pacific Crest Trail and the Old Emigrant Trail of the 1800's for you to explore the Back-Country of the High Sierra.<br><br>Shinneyboo Creek is pleased to offer cozy cabins for your relaxed romantic Sierra Nevada mountain experience: Luxury Cabins each decorated uniquely with colorful quilts, rugs and pillows.<br><br>Each cabin has one queen-size Serta Perfect Sleeper bed, comforters, loft with an assortment of twin beds, queen beds, and futon mats, Jacuzzi tubs, in-room warmth from a cast iron stove, a table with two chairs, deck chairs, an outdoor fire ring, and umbrella patio-table sitting area. We also provide a small convenience kitchen with fridge, microwave, coffee maker, hot pot for tea water, community BBQ picnic area and complimentary breakfast basket, delivered to your door in the morning.<br><br>We call it "pamping". All the pleasures of camping with a comfortable bed,fresh linen & towels, privacy, your own bath, and the flicker of continuous firelight for cold winter nights. <br><br>We are located just below Donner Summit in the Tahoe National Forest. Pets are allowed subject to management approval. There is a $10 per pet per day pet fee.

COMMENTS: <b>A Private, Restful Retreat in the Heart of San Francisco</b><br><br>With its tasteful dcor, fireplace and home theatre, Casa Francisquita is a romantic getaway. Or the perfect place for parents when visiting the City. To a business traveler, it offers the convenience of a DSL-equipped desk, close proximity to downtown, and its own garage.  A family with children would find toys and kids furnishings, a washer and dryer, a private terrace and  nearby parks. <b>To a dog lover, in particular, Casa Francisquita offers a welcoming home with a private entrance and fenced garden, and, nearby, a beautiful park on a hill where dogs can roam free while their owner enjoys the view.</b>  A visitor looking to relocate would find a comfortable pied--terre for an extended stay.  And a gastronome with a yen for entertaining, a well appointed kitchen, cozy dining area and elegant living room.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are welcome and there is no additional pet fee.
OLDCOMMENTS: Located on a quiet, residential street in the geographical center of San Francisco (between the neighborhoods of Noe Valley and the Castro), Casa Francisquita is a large, convenient pied--terre within walking distance of all amenities - restaurants, markets, gyms, one-of-a-kind stores, and the historic Castro Theatre.  All manner of transportation is readily available, including the venerable F-Line streetcars that carry passengers on scenic rides to San Francisco's Symphony Hall and Opera House, the Financial District, the Ferry Building Farmers' Market, Fisherman's Wharf, and the beautiful new baseball park by the Bay.<br><br>Casa Francisquita is the lower of two flats in a home built in 1893.  It has a private entrance, a serene, old-fashioned garden with a fountain, its own garage, and a well appointed kitchen for those who like to cook.  The comfortable, Arts-and-Crafts living room with fireplace offers books, magazines, CDs, videos and parlor games, as well as satellite TV and a surround-sound stereo system. An adjoining working area houses a desk (equipped with stationery, dictionaries and reference books), a private telephone, and high-speed internet access. A fax machine and a computer are available as well. <br><br>Casa Francisquita is suitable for two guests and a dog. Children can also be accommodated. There is a fenced yard for your dog and there is a $10 per day pet fee. Come join us on your next trip to dog-friendly San Francisco.

TITLE: Inn of the Turquoise Bear
ADDRESS: 342 E. Buena Vista St.
CITY: Santa Fe
MAJOR: 
STATE: NM
ZIP: 87505
PHONE: 505-983-0798
TOLLFREE: 800-396-4104
HIGHWAY: Interstate 25
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: Small well-behaved dogs are allowed at this inn in a few pet rooms. Please call or email the property for availability.
COMMENTS: The Inn of the Turquoise Bear is a historic Santa Fe bed and breakfast located within walking distance of many downtown cultural and entertainment attractions. In the National Register, it was once the home of poet and essayist Witter Bynner, when it hosted a myriad of celebrities including Edna St. Vincent Millay, Robert Frost, Ansel Adams, Rita Hayworth, Errol Flynn and Georgia O'Keeffe. Today guests of this Santa Fe inn will enjoy their beautiful gardens, charming amenities, and outstanding service. The quintessential rambling adobe villa boasts an acre of terraced gardens, flagstone paths and soaring ponderosa pines, enclosed by adobe walls & coyote fences. Canine companions are free to play and explore the gardens off leash as their temperament allows. Pet owners are asked to be mindful of other guests, cars in the parking area, and to refrain from bringing pets into indoor common areas. The Inn of the Turquoise Bear offers four pet friendly rooms to choose from, and four-legged guests will be welcomed with food and water dishes, treats, a sleeping pad, waste disposal bags, and a helpful information package with listings for pet services, favorite walking routes, and pet-friendly attractions and restaurants. The pet stay fee is $25 per day.
OLDCOMMENTS: Tall ponderosa pines shade this rambling Spanish Pueblo Revival adobe, giving it the feeling of being in a mountain setting, although it's only blocks from the plaza.  In the National Register, it was the home of poet and essayist Witter Bynner, when it hosted a myriad of celebrities including Edna St. Vincent Millay, Robert Frost, Ansel Adams, Rita Hayworth, Errol Flynn and Georgia O'Keeffe.  The walled acre of grounds includes flagstone paths, wild roses, lilacs, rock terraces, stone benches, and fountains.  In a Southwest decor, there are kiva fireplaces and romantic courtyards.  Guests are invited to enjoy wine and cheese in the afternoon.  Museums, galleries, restaurants and shops are within walking distance.  Among its accolades, the inn was the recipient of the Heritage Preservation Award from the city of Santa Fe in 1999, and from the State of New Mexico in 2000.<br><br>Smaller, well-behaved pets are welcome at the Inn in certain rooms only.  Please call or email for specific room availability.

The kitchen is attached to the living room and features brand new appliances.  A laundry facility, bedroom and bathroom are off of the kitchen.<br><br>The dining room is located off of the kitchen and features a long glassed in deck overlooking the stream.  A double-sided gas fireplace separates the dining room from a sitting area with a small television.<br><br>Upstairs is a large game room including a pin ball machine, air hockey, electronic darts, pool table and slot machines.  The second bedroom is located off of the game room, as well as the second bathroom.<br><br>A Little Bit of Vegas is perfect for two couples or a family with kids.  With plenty of games, a big screen Television, a large yard and easy access to all the local attractions - it is convenient as well as beautiful.<br><br>Dogs above 25 pounds with permission of management. There is a $25 one time pet fee per stay.

HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: This downtown hotel allows your dog of any size for $15 per night additional pet fee. Dogs may not be left unattended in the room.
COMMENTS: The Camden Riverhouse Hotel & Inn, is Camden's premium upscale Hotel with un-matched friendly service and comfort, an incredibly quiet village location with onsite private parking.  There is no need to search out a place to curb your pet on the public ways or town parks with plastic bags in hand, the Riverhouse Hotel boasts our very own 1.5 acre park in our backyard. (See photo)  Exclusive to Riverhouse guests, our park is private, and easily enjoyed, on or off lead.  After a bit of exercise, stroll across our footbridge and we will treat your pet with a coupon for a frozen doggie ice cream delight, at our Riverhouse Ice Cream Stand.<br><br>Our lobby & breakfast room, were extensively remodeled in 2007, There is complimentary computers and high speed to stay connected.  Our have rooms with in-room hair dryers, refrigerators, microwaves, irons, 27" TV's, VCR & DVD players available, onsite laundry facility, fitness room, indoor pool & hot tub.<br><br>Main St. is just at the end of our lane, literally steps from village shops, restaurants and Camden's historical library and Harbor Park.  Great recreational activities abound for you and your dog, such as hiking 7,000 acres of State Park and Land Trust trails.  Enjoy a day aboard the dog and kid friendly schooner, "OLAD" with Captain Aaron (maineschooners.com) (see our packages).  One of our favorite restaurants, the famous "Cappy's" (cappyschowder.com) is also pet friendly.  There is dog swimming, and stick throwing at several, close by beaches.<br><br>Dogs are welcome and pampered at the Camden Riverhouse Hotel with biscuit, beds and bowls, and a list of local pet services.  Two well-behaved dogs are allowed per room and the one strict rule we adhere to, is that pets are not to be left unattended in the room.  We do not discriminate on size or breed.  Room rates range from $89 - $119 in the quiet season a$179- $219 in our high season.  There is an additional $10 per night fee for each pet.
OLDCOMMENTS: Conveniently located on the quite side of downtown Camden, Maine.  The only hotel downtown with a spacious backyard for you and your dog!  Also included in your stay is a deluxe continental breakfast, indoor pool & hot tub, onsite private parking, and free wireless internet access.  Pet fee is $15/night for your dog, no size restrictions.  Guest must sign a pet policy at checkin, dog must never be left unattended in the hotel, and the dog must be leashed at all times outside of the room.  For additional pet amenities please see our vip package located on our website.

ZIP: 81210

BOOKCOMMENTS: Harmels is a dude ranch that allows you to bring your leashed dog with you. They have a three night minimum in their 37 cabins. The Ranch borders on the Gunnison National Forest which allows leashed dogs on its hiking trails. There is a $10 per night pet fee. COMMENTS: Harmel's offers an exciting dude ranch experience for the whole family, including your four legged members!  We have a three night minimum with 37 cabins available near or on the Taylor River, 22 different floor plans, 19 with kitchenettes. Amenities & Facilities include: horseback riding, whitewater rafting, trophy fly fishing, rock climbing, therapeutic massage, outdoor heated pool, hot tub, sauna, playground, business center with wi-fi, BBQ's, hayrides, overnight camps, restaurant & saloon, recreation lounge, tons of hiking trails (we border 1.6 million acres of the Gunnison National Forest), children's program, nightly entertainment, and laundry facilities.  There are a couple of great swimming holes on the Taylor River that are perfect for your dogs afternoon dip.  $10/night/pet fee or $65/week/pet.  Dogs need to be on a leash while on ranch property.  Owners assume responsibility for any damage caused by their pet.  Please see our website at www.harmels.com for more details on our pet policy.

COMMENTS: The Haylapa House is located on a small ranch east of  San Diego, in the  picturesque mountain community of  Descanso which borders on  Cuyamaca State Park. The  Haylapa  is one large open room, with a palapa ceiling made from   recycled tipi poles and willow twig.  It is furnished with a queensize bed ,  a futon couch, furnishings and art made by the owners,   TV, VCR, DVD and free internet connection.  The kitchen is fully equipped  .  The countertops and night stands are made from pine killed in the Cedars fire.  The sunken bathroom has a  large clawfoot tub and "rain" shower  with a  view of Cuyamaca Peak .  The private patio has a view of the surrounding mountains,  an outdoor fireplace made from local stone, a pizza oven, and  is securely fenced for your pets.<br><br>Horses and dogs are welcome, but the fencing is not cat proof.  In addition to the fenced patio, the Haylapa is sited in a fenced 2 1/2 acre compound of oaks, boulders and trails and is secure for your pets to play and explore.  If you want to take a long hike with your dog, there is a trailhead nearby  that accesses a expansive wilderness area that has no leash requirements.

TITLE: The Lodge at Moosehead Lake
ADDRESS: 368 Lily Bay Road
CITY: Greenville
MAJOR: 
STATE: ME
ZIP: 04441
PHONE: 207-695-4400
TOLLFREE: 800-825-6977
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: This country inn allows dogs provided they have had a health certificate from a vet within the last 10 days. There is a $40 per night pet fee and pets are not allowed in the main lodge. 
COMMENTS: Pamper your fido friend and yourself in the luxury of a AAA 4 Diamond Country Inn.  The Allagash suite in the Carriage House has been set aside you and your loving campanion. This luxury suite with stunning lake and mountain views along with private outdoor deck, double Jacuzzi, fireplace and living room area, results in the ideal retreat.  Pet Policy:  The Lodge understands how wonderful it is to share a Moosehead vacation with your canine campanion.  Pet lovers ourselves and proud owners of 3 Labrador Retrievers, we realize that, especially in unfamiliar settings, dogs will be dogs; despite an historical track record of exemplary behavior.  With respect to other lodging guests, pets are not allowed in the Main Lodge.  We therefore happily allow you to share with your pet the creature comforts of your guest room, provided they adhere to the following conditions:  Pooch's must have health certificate from veterinarian no more that 10 days prior to arrival and must be washed and on flea medication as well.  All pets incur a $40.00/night charge.  They will receive a dog matt, bowls for food and water along with nightly treats.  No pets on the beds or furniture.  When outside of their guest room on the Lodge property, pets must be on a leash and owners must clean up after them.  When left in their room alone, your pet must be created (the Lodge provides creats at $10.00/night charge).  We reserve the right to refuse daily housekeeping or turndown service to rooms in which a pet is left loose in the room.  In addition to the nightly charge, a $200 pet security deposit is required upon arrival.  This deposit is refundable at the time of departure barring any unintentional property damage, "accidents", noise complaints, or disobedience of our leash law.  Should your pet seriously damage an item of lodge property, you will be charged full replacement value.  Chronic disturbance issues may result in requiring you to take your pet to a local kennel.

TITLE: Synergy Beach House
ADDRESS: Call to Arrange
CITY: Seacrest Beach
MAJOR: 
STATE: FL
ZIP: 32413
PHONE: 678-409-0157
TOLLFREE: 
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: Pets are welcome in this vacation rental on Seacrest Beach. There is a fenced in yard at the house.
COMMENTS: Synergy provides a top-quality, affordable vacation experience for guests of all ages. The house is spacious and bright, in a great location, and nicely furnished with extra touches like a hot tub, a 4-person electric GEM car for trips to and from the beach, beach equipment, and more. The large hot tub is on a deck off of the back porch. Ceiling fans over the porch, outdoor furniture, lighting around the hot tub, a radio and a fenced-in yard make lounging around out back a pleasure. The front yard is professionally landscaped and provides a pleasant surrounding while relaxing in the teak lounge chairs on the wrap-around front porch. The outdoor shower makes cleaning up after the beach a snap. Rain or shine, for a weekend, week, month or more, everyone will have something to do. Just bring your bathing suits and sunscreen!<br><br>This lovely house is located in a small private coastal community of beautiful homes. The charming neighborhood is nestled in a quiet environment off the Emerald Coast two miles West of Rosemary Beach and six miles East of Seaside - far from high-rises, fast-food, and crowded beaches and roads. This is a prime location only a short stroll from a gorgeous, award-winning, un-crowded beach. Walk from your front door or take the GEM car to the end of the street to a private beach access shared only by our community and a small condominium complex. There is an outdoor shower at the top of the beach walk-over for your convenience. There is no shortage of peace and quiet here; however, all of the conveniences needed are just a short drive away. Built in 2002 along scenic 30-A (a beautiful winding beach road featured in Coastal Living and Southern Living magazines in 2003), this spacious and bright two-story house is designed to be the perfect retreat for your complete comfort and convenience.  Dogs and cats are welcome in our home, and the fenced in back yard is convenient for the dogs.  We do not charge extra fees for pets.

TITLE: Fox Hill Bed & Breakfast & Cottage Suites
ADDRESS: 4383 Borden Grant Trail
CITY: Lexington/Fairfield
MAJOR: Lexington
STATE: VA
ZIP: 24435
PHONE: 540-377-9922
TOLLFREE: 800-369-8005
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: This 38 acre B&B in the Virginia countryside allows dogs of all sizes. There is a $12 per dog pet fee per night. Dogs may be left alone in the room if crated and if a cell phone number is left.
COMMENTS: Unwind and delight in the quiet, comfortable elegance of our 38-acre country retreat. You'll be greeted with a warm welcome and special dog treats, and just wait until you see all the wonderful outdoor experiences awaiting you: stroll in the shade and splash in our spring-fed stream as the bluebirds swoop by, wander along mowed paths through our wildflower meadows, or play a game of Frisbee in the field kept mowed just for you. Don't worry if you get a little dirty -- there is a special outdoor dog washing station equipped with shampoo (just let us know if you need towels). And if Mom & Dad forgot anything, Ruger and Benelli (our resident dogs) will be glad to share their water bowls or toys. When you are ready to explore the area, we'll point you towards some of our favorite dog-friendly activities: a hike in Goshen Pass or the Blue Ridge Mountains, a trip to Natural Bridge, a vineyard tour, a stroll along the Chessie Nature Trail alongside the Maury River, or a weekend double feature at Hull's Drive-Inn Theatre (April-October - ask for the extra large popcorn). You'll find a complete list of pet friendly activities as well as pet friendly restaurants (outdoor dining) and shops in your room when you arrive.<br><br>We have no restrictions on the size of visiting dogs -- we love them all! Our pet fee is $20/dog/night. If you chose a Kitchen Suite, we ask you to stay in your crate if you plan to be in your room unattended, and that a cell phone number is provided in case you are unhappy and make your sentiments known.  If you chose a Bed & Breakfast Suite, you can stay in your room unattended during breakfast time only.  We also ask that beds and furniture be reserved for your two-legged companions only.<br><br>Please visit our web site for full details, pictures, room descriptions, specials and rates (www.foxhillbb.com). We invite you to come stay with us and experience the tranquility and beauty here in the Shenandoah Valley and Blue Ridge Mountains.
OLDCOMMENTS: Unwind and delight in the quiet, comfortable elegance of our 38-acre country retreat.    You'll be greeted with a warm welcome and special dog treats, and just wait until you see all the wonderful outdoor experiences awaiting you: stroll in the shade and splash in our spring-fed stream as the bluebirds swoop by, wander along mowed paths through our wildflower meadows, or play a game of frisbee in the field.  Don't worry if you get a little dirty -- there is a special outdoor dog washing station equipped with shampoo (just let us know if you need towels).  And if Mom & Dad forgot anything, Ellie (our resident dog) will be glad to share her water bowls or toys.  When you are ready to explore the area, we'll point you towards some of our favorite dog-friendly activities:  a hike in Goshen Pass, a trip to Natural Bridge, or a double feature at Hull's Drive-Inn Theatre (open summer weekends).<br><br>We have no restrictions on the size of visiting dogs -- we love them all!  Our pet fee is $12/dog/night.  We do ask you to stay in your crate if you plan to be in your room unattended when your people leave our property, and that a cell phone number is provided in case you are unhappy and make your sentiments known.<br><br>Check out our web site for full details, pictures, room descriptions and rates.  We invite you to come stay with us and experience the tranquility and beauty here in the Shenandoah Valley and Blue Ridge Mountains.

TITLE: Inn at Camachee Harbor

MAJOR: 
STATE: FL

HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: Fourteen of the nineteen rooms at this inn are pet friendly. The inn is located at the Camachee Harbor only about five minutes from historic St Augustine. You will need to get special permission from management to leave a pet alone in the room.
COMMENTS: We say we're pet friendly because we are Pet Friendly.  Of our 19 units 15 are pet friendly, and as clean and comfortable as an allergy approved room. The Inn is only two minutes from beautiful historic St. Augustine. If you are seeking sun & fun on the beach you are just 5 minutes away from the perfect tan.....Our rooms are all oversized, tropically styled & beautifully furnished.<br><br>Bring your pet by the front office for a treat at any time. Dog/Cat food is available at the market next door or arrangements can be made for delivery of a special food.<br><br>We do ask that you do not leave your pet unattended in the unit without testing the animals reaction to being left alone in a completely new environment.  Many animals, when left alone in a strange place, react in ways their parents could never have imagined.  If at any point you must leave your pet alone, please ASK the front desk if this is ok, and leave contact information should we need to contact you with  any issues.  (If it is after we are closed, please do not leave the pet unattended).<br><br>Please be considerate of other guests staying with us, and remember not all people are comfortable with animals. Keep your pet on a leash when outside your unit, and please pick-up their "business" (bags are available upon request if you do not have any of your own).<br><br>St. Augustine is a very Pet Friendly town.  Pets are welcome to join in the fun on the beaches, at the parks, throughout the old city and at many restaurants where dining outdoors is available.

TITLE: A Toccoa Riverfront Cabin Vacation
ADDRESS: Call to Arrange.
CITY: Dahlonega
MAJOR: 
STATE: GA
ZIP: 
PHONE: 478-862-9733
TOLLFREE: 
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: A North Georgia mountain cabin on the Toccoa River. Located near Blue Ridge/Blairsville/Dahlonega. Very private. Sleeps 6.  Central heat/AC, fireplace, satellite TV, BBQ grill, swings, screened porch, catfish pond and river fishing year-round. Fenced acreage and barn for horses. Pets are welcome.
COMMENTS: This Toccoa Riverfront Cabin can sleep up to 6 people. It has more than 1000' on the Toccoa River that is stocked weekly with trout. My cabin is very private, on 16 Acres, some wooded with paths throughout. There is a 1 1/2 AC. Fenced in area with a barn for horses. Riding trails from the cabin are great. There are several ponds on the property and guests delight in feeding the fish, deer and birds. The cabin has all amenities. It has central H/AC and a wood burning fireplace. (Wood is provided) We have satellite TV, BBQ grill, swings, picnic tables and lots of room to roam. You must bring own linens. Cabin also has a mini office setup with DSL hookup for your laptop. There is a scanner/copier/fax machine. The river is wonderful for splashing, tubing or kayaking. The catfish pond is for kids--catch and release, only! Pets are $5 each per night and the basic rate for up to 4 peoples is $125. Please see my web site for additional information. Email me for additional pictures!
