TITLE: A Room with A View
ADDRESS: Black Bear Woods Resort-Northside Cortland Rd
CITY: Canaan Valley
MAJOR: 
STATE: WV
ZIP: 26260
PHONE: 301-767-6853
TOLLFREE: 
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: This is Unit 132 in the Black Bear Woods Resort. It is a single room suite without a kitchen with a view of Canaan Valley. There are two Queen beds and a large bathroom with a Jacuzzi. Well-behaved dogs are welcome for a $30 cleaning fee per stay.
OLDCOMMENTS: ROOM WITH A VIEW is Unit 132 in the AAA-approved Black Bear Woods Resort. It is a bright single room suite in a well-kept, quiet resort. The room has a superb view of Canaan Valley, WV. It has 2 Queen beds, plenty of closet space, a fireplace and balcony; a large bathroom with a Jacuzzi; and although it does not have a kitchen, it does have a mid-size refrigerator, coffee maker, a microwave, and toaster. It is also equipped with telephone, TV, Wi-Fi, new Cable service, DVD and VCR, and plenty of games and tapes. The Lodge is new and has a new pool and miniature golf. There are no stairs. The resort borders Monongahela Forest, and is close to Backwater, Canaan and Dolly Sods State Parks, ski slopes, a beautiful 18-hole golf course, hiking trails, horseback riding, and 2 small towns with eateries/stores. Cost is $75 plus a $35 per stay cleaning fee for any night between March 15 and December 14; and $90 per night plus a $35 per stay cleaning fee for Sunday through Thursday weeknights during the December 15-March 14 peak ski season.  All taxes are included in the price, and well-behaved dogs (no weight limit) are welcomed at no extra cost.  Call 301-767-6853 or email us to arrange a stay. Check out our website.
COMMENTS: This is a bright and cozy, dog-friendly single room suite in Canaan Valley, WV-- in the well-kept, quiet, AAA-approved Black Bear Resort.  It has superb views with large windows and a balcony with seating. It has 2 Queen-sized beds, a fireplace, a large bathroom with a Jacuzzi, Wide-Screen TV with Cable, and DVD/VCR player with DVDs/Tapes.  Although it does not have a kitchen, it does have a mid-size refrigerator, coffee maker, a microwave, and toaster. There are no stairs.  The lodge has a pool, miniature golf, a tennis court, and walking trails. The resort borders Monongahela Forest, and is close to Blackwater, Canaan and Dolly Sods State Parks, ski slopes, hiking trails, horseback riding, and 2 small towns with eateries/stores. Well-behaved dogs (no weight limit) are welcomed for a $53 per stay pet fee.  Rates per night (tax included) are:  (1) Mid-Week (any season) - only $67.20; (2) Ski Season (Dec. 15 to March 15) - $123.20; and (3) Low Season (March 16 to December 14) - $100.80.   Email  brbutterworth@gmail.com or call 301-767-6853 to arrange a stay. Check out our website.

When in the Inn's common areas please keep your dog leashed. Even though your dog is well behaved, other guests may be apprehensive when they see an unleashed dog.<br>Pet Policies & Regulations<br><br>The rate of the pet's stay is $30 per night, per pet.<br><br>1. Prior approval is mandatory, so that we can control the number of pets in residence.<br>2. We reserve the right to restrict the size of dogs to 60 pounds and to limit the number of pets per room.<br>3. We try to limit the number of pets to 3 at any one time.<br>4. Pets must be leashed when out of the guest room.<br>5. We require that your animal not be left unattended for more than 5 hours, and never unattended at night. If at all possible, please leave a phone number with us, when your dog is left unattended. If we reserve the right to enter any room at any time to aid a distressed or noisy pet. Guests agree to pay for any and all costs arising from such a case. We have heard "My dog doesn't bark", many times but in a new surrounding it's impossible to know what a dog will do- Above all please think of the other guests and their enjoyment as well as yours.<br>6 . Owners should bring pet bedding and dishes; no pets on the beds or furniture. Loaner leashes are available on request.<br>7. When registering at the front desk, the pet owner agrees to the inn's pet policies, to be responsible for any damage or injury caused by the pet, and to absolve the innkeepers/staff of any liability if the pet or another guest is injured.<br>8. You may walk your dog to the side of the inn and in the the designated area on the back lawn. We expect you to clean up after your pet.<br><br> Because all of our guests may not be "pet people", our Inn will only accept 3 rooms at a time with a pet. As much as we enjoy your fuzzy family member, we don't want anyone feeling "overwhelmed".<br><br>There is a $30.00 pet fee per pet, per night.<br><br>$50.00 fee for any clean-up required.<br><br>If you have any further "pet etiquette" questions or inquiries, please feel free to contact us by telephone or E-mail!<br><br>Bring bedding or a portable carrier for your pet to sleep in.<br><br>The Inn sits on the river and town commom your furry friend is welcome to explore. Obviously, in that always fun little tradition, we ask that you clean up after them following those certain "inspirational moments".

Our favorite is Tanner Park, a huge park with a creek, mountain biking trails, and even a bmx area hidden away in the woods.<br><br>When you're ready to make the move please contact me and I'll help you find your perfect home here in Utah. I can even help get the ball rolling by having a local real estate professional contact you about selling your current residence. So whether you're just playing with the idea of relocating and have questions to be answered or if you have already decided to come to Salt Lake please do not hesitate in contacting me. My business is to inform, educate, and make your real estate transaction as pleasant as possible.

ADDRESS: 16701 Lakeview Rd NE
CITY: Flintstone
MAJOR: 
STATE: MD
ZIP: 21530
PHONE: 301-784-8400
TOLLFREE: 800-724-0828
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: This Four Diamond Golf Resort offers a VIP package for pets in select rooms. The hotel has a dog walk area and lots of grounds for walking.
COMMENTS: The Rocky Gap Lodge & Golf Resort sits in the heart of Maryland's historic Cumberland Valley. It lies on the shore of a pristine 243-acre lake in a beautiful forested area in the foothills of Rocky Gap State Park, and boasts Maryland's only Jack Nicklaus Signature Golf Course.  The resort includes 216 guest rooms, The Rocky Gap Garden Spa, multiple food and beverage outlets, tennis courts, and a new indoor pool pavilion. The property has received the prestigious AAA Four Diamond award for five consecutive years. All guest rooms are handsomely designed with custom-made Shaker furniture.<br><br>As much a part of our hotel family as they are your family, Rocky Gap Lodge and Resort is fully pet-friendly. With the exception of our food and beverage outlets, leashed pets are welcome in the hotel and on the immediate grounds. We have included a "doggie" walk area, complete with a fire hydrant. When making your reservations and traveling with a pet, please request a "VIP" (very important pet) room that includes a special treat filled welcome basket for both you and your pet.<br><br>Amenities<br>Our guest rooms include coffee makers, hair dryers, a full-size iron and ironing board, individual climate controls, a comfortable seating area, and windows to take in some fresh mountain air or the beautiful views of our lush golf course. Additional room amenities include two telephones, dual telephone lines, a dedicated work area and high speed Internet access, remote-controlled cable television, pay per view movies, and Nintendo games.<br><br>Our suites may include a parlor area, sofa, separate dining area, private balcony, living room, fireplace, whirlpool tub, oversized bedrooms, spacious bathrooms, and more.<br><br>Activities<br>In addition to golf, the Resort offers a wide variety of outdoor activities including everything from hiking, fishing, kayaking, and sporting clays. Enjoy walking and hiking through the mountain area in the many marked trails of Rocky Gap State Park, visiting the aviary, fishing, or boating on the adjacent lake. The Resort also offers an indoor and outdoor swimming pool, the Rocky Gap State Park Beach, The Rocky Gap Spa facility, as well as a fitness room and tennis courts.<br><br>Rates<br>Rates start from $109 per night and varies seasonally.  Please contact us at 1-800-724-0828 for more information.

TITLE: Chateau on the Lake
ADDRESS: 415 North State Highway 265
CITY: Branson
MAJOR: 
STATE: MO
ZIP: 65616
PHONE: 888-333-5253
TOLLFREE: 
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: This resort and convention center offers an indoor and outdoor pool and a full service marina. Dogs up to 25 pounds are allowed. Dogs must be crated while alone in the room. There is a $25 one time pet fee.
COMMENTS: <b>Chateau on the Lake</b><br><br>Set like a jewel in the Ozark Mountains, Chateau on the Lake is an elegant and exciting resort that combines modern luxury with traditional charm. A dream-like setting, on the lake and in the mountains frames this enchanting castle - offering endless views of the resort's breathtaking surroundings. Peaceful patios and comfortable lounges abound, offering relaxing spaces and scenic vistas of Table Rock Lake and the Ozarks.<br><br>To complement the spectacular panoramic views, the resort's 301 beautifully appointed guest rooms offer endless luxuries that are sure to make any visit simply perfect. Tiled stone baths; hand-tooled iron lamps; leather chairs; and cherry-wood beds with Serta Perfect Sleeper mattresses, down comforters, and fluffy pillows are just of few of the comforts that adorn every room. Additional extras include: high-speed Internet access, wireless Web TV, in-room movies, in-room safes, and two telephones with dual lines, voice mail, and data port.<br><br><b>Pet-Friendly Policy</b><br>At Chateau on the Lake, we want you to feel at home, so we encourage you to bring along your "best friend" while you visit us. We have a one-time, non-refundable pet fee of $25 and ask that you only bring pets that weigh 25 lbs. or less and that are fully trained and housebroken. If you leave your pet unattended at any time, they must be crated or put in a carrier, and we ask that you keep your pet on a leash while in the hotel. This is for the safety of all our guests. We realize that your pet may get excited while visiting the Chateau, however, if they disturb other guests, we may ask you to find alternative accommodations.<br><br><b>Dining</b><br>Whether it's a candlelit dinner for two or a casual meal with friends, dining at Chateau is a memorable experience. Chateau Grille features delicious cuisine and an extensive wine list. Lighter meals and picnic-style dishes are served throughout the day at the 9th Street Deli while patio-style dining complete with an evening cocktail can be enjoyed at the Atrium Cafe & Wine Bar.<br><br><b>Amenities & Recreation</b><br>From the new $6-million Spa Chateau to the full-service Chateau Marina, Chateau on the Lake offers endless excitement. Our resort also has an amazing array of onsite fitness facilities, including: lighted tennis courts, year-round indoor and outdoor (seasonal) pools and hot tubs, and gorgeous nature trails. Our professional Recreation Coordinators are available to help you organize the perfect excursion.<br><br>Our full-service Chateau Marina offers all the water sports imaginable - both on and under the water - from jet skis, pontoon boats, and luxury watercraft to snorkeling equipment and Scuba lessons.<br><br>Spa Chateau  -- our full-service spa - is a palace of pure indulgence, where signature treatments blend rich elements of the Ozarks with exotic European therapies. With 10 treatment rooms, awe-inspiring decor, a highly trained staff and an excess of indulgences, our elegant new Spa Chateau is an experience to savor.

COMMENTS: Cape San Blas was the #1 beach in the USA in 2002 and the best pet friendly beach in America in 2007.  Cape San Blas is a pet friendly beach located 50 miles SE of Panama City between Port St. Joe & Apalachicola, just East of Mexico Beach & West of St. George Island on NW Florida Panhandle Gulf Coast!<br><br>Cape San Blas is truly one of the last unspoiled areas of Florida's Panhandle. Cape San Blas has relatively little development... no high-rise condos, no traffic (not even a traffic light), and no fighting for position on the beach as the beaches are quiet and uncrowed ... even during peak season.  Enjoy the white sand, unspoiled, dog friendly beaches and turquoise water of the Florida Panhandle!<br><br>We offer 2BR and 3BR rentals ranging from beachfront to 200 steps to the beach, all supplied with everything from beach chairs to laundry detergent and spices.  You won't find more comfortable, well-stocked rentals anywhere!  We know what it is like not to have what you need when you're on vacation!  We try and provide as many of these extras a possible so you are focused on your vacation, family and fun and not on the basics!  We encourage you to catch your own dinner of scallops, crabs or fish and bring along some marshmallows and enjoy desert around the beach bonfire!<br><br>Barrier Dunes, our gated community, has 2 pools (one is beach front!), lighted tennis courts, 3 fresh water fishing ponds, playground and pet stations throughout.   Enjoy the quiet, unspoiled, dog friendly beaches of the Florida Panhandle!<br><br>LARGE DOGS VERY WELCOME!

In consideration of all guests, pets must never be left unattended in the guest rooms and on a leash while outside of guest room. Pets are not allowed in the lobby or around the pool area.

STATE: WA
ZIP: 98562
PHONE: 360-276-0014
TOLLFREE: 
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: This small inn has three suites with kitchen and is directly across the street from the ocean. There is a $10 a night dog fee and rooms are about $60 to $85 per night.
COMMENTS: We have three uniquely decorated suites with kitchens, and a hot tub, across the street from the ocean, three hours from Seattle.  There is a convenient path that puts you on the beach in under two minutes.  Moclips has a long, wide, nearly flat beach that is perfect for walking.  Dogs love it.  The Moclips river is about 10 minutes walk from our place.  Our rooms are $60-$85 per night with a $10 a night dog fee.  We have a free video library, and antiques shop, and live onsite so we can help with anything that might come up.  We have a generator in case of outages.  Moclips is remote and sparsely populated.  The beach is often deserted.  A great place to get away.  Please fill out the availability request form on our web site if you are interested in staying with us.  If you would like a free DVD showing the beach and our suites, please email us. Thanks, John and Carla

TITLE: Cape Cod's Lamb and Lion Inn
ADDRESS: 2504 Route 6A
CITY: Barnstable
MAJOR: Cape Cod
STATE: MA
ZIP: 02630
PHONE: 508-362-6823
TOLLFREE: 800-909-6923
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
CITYCOMMENTS: Lots of privacy and on 4 acres in the historic district. A Continental breakfast is served daily. Suites with wood-burning fireplaces, a pool and more.
COMMENTS: Nestled on 4 acres of Cape Cod's unspoiled historic district, guests at the Lamb and Lion enjoy lots of privacy with spacious suites, all with private baths, and separate guest entrances and exits (no curfews, and no tip-toeing around someone's living room!). The Inn is located about 1 mile from beautiful Barnstable Harbor (and the whale watch boat!) and just a few short minutes from all the best beaches, shopping and restaurants that Cape Cod has to offer. Here you have the very best of both worlds...the peaceful setting of "Olde Cape Cod", yet you're less than 10 minutes from the nightlife and shops of colorful Main Street, Hyannis!<br><br>The diversity of accommodations is one of the many perks that the Lamb and Lion has to offer...Ultra-clean suites with wood-burning fireplaces, cozy rooms with gas fireplace stoves, and some with full kitchens. Some suites can accommodate a family or a small group of friends. All of the rooms are just a few steps away from the central courtyard which features a heated pool and giant year-round hot tub spa, and all the rooms feature top-of-the-line bedding, private in-room baths, cable TV, wireless internet, A/C, sitting areas and telephones!<br><br>All room rates include our very unique Gourmet Continental Breakfast which can feature anything from Ali's "famous" granola (once featured in Bon Appetit Magazine), slow-roasted fruit, "Monkey Bread", and "Gooey Caramel-Orange Ring". Breakfast is served in the same laid back fashion as the Inn is run. You can have your breakfast any time you like, and you can enjoy it anywhere you like--in the Breakfast Sunroom, on the decks overlooking the "Elvis Willow Tree" and gardens, poolside...or back in your suite! After you fill up on breakfast take a short walk to our local beach, hike a trail in the beautiful conservation land right across from the Inn, or just veg-out poolside with a good book!<br><br>The Inn accepts smaller pets at a charge of $25 per day, with a $100 maximum. For larger pets there may be flexibility in the slower seasons. Please inquire.

COMMENTS: Located in Ellicott City, and just 7 minutes from neighboring Columbia, Maryland, Turf Valley is Maryland's premier and only true golf resort property within a 20 mile radius of Baltimore and BWI International Airport. Guests can enjoy over 1,000 acres of lush green, championship golf views from their own balcony of our 171 guest rooms and suites, all with complimentary wireless Internet access. In addition to spectacular golf, relaxing outdoor and indoor pools and a luxury spa, you can enjoy a game of tennis with our three courts and a state of the art fitness facility. For shopping and exploring, visit Historic Ellicott City, a quaint colonial village, laced with cobblestone streets, numerous cafs and specialty shops.<br><br>For a relaxing getaway, stay in one of Turf Valley's two and three bedroom villas. Our villas offer full kitchen, living and dining room areas, with majestic views of Turf Valley's driving range, also ideal for corporate retreats. <br><br>Need a facility for your conference? Turf Valley boasts over 40,000 square feet of versatile meeting and event space. For groups of 10 to 650, Turf Valley's resort setting has the perfect retreat seclusion in the busy Baltimore-Washington DC metro area. <br><br>Turf Valley welcomes your dog (65 lb. max, 2 dog max. per room); a $75.00 one-time, non-refundable dog fee is required.
OLDCOMMENTS: At The Hotel at Turf Valley in Ellicott City, Maryland, we measure our meeting space in acres! And no wonder.....our facility boasts more than 1,000 breathtaking acres devoted to a 171 room deluxe hotel, 36 holes of championship golf, luxurious European Spa, 40,000 square feet of meeting space, a driving range and putting green, indoor and outdoor pools, fitness facility,  recreation area complete with tennis courts, children's playground and both elegant dining and casual dining facilities. In all, Turf Valley offers the region's premier golf resort and conference center with meeting facilities for groups of 10 - 1,000 guests. We are also about 25 minutes from BWI Airport and Baltimore's world-renowned Inner Harbor.<br><br>Complimentary In-Room Wi-Fi and Shuttle Services are Available<br><br>Resort accepts both cats and dogs and there is a one time non-refundable pet fee of $150.00 required.

Drive only 15 minutes to Busch Gardens and 45 minutes to Disney World!  Within 30 minutes of the Tampa International Airport.  With over 2200 sq. ft. of completely tiled living area and pet-friendly furniture, lodging has never been more comfortable!<br>Enjoy the 50" big screen TV in the cozy living room and the 60" bigger screen TV in the master bedroom!<br>The two bedrooms and bathrooms are over-sized for plenty of personal and pet space while creating a private getaway of comfort. Custom tile and stone designs through-out your vacation home compliment the natural sunlight coming through six skylights, including a skylight in each bathroom shower.  Large laundry room has large-capacity washer and dryer, in-wall ironing board and small clothes steamer.<br>A six-foot privacy fence surrounds the back and side, and a four-foot picket fence compliments the front of this expansive dog-friendly 1 acre yard.  A rural setting, yet close to everything, that is perfect for dogs and cats, complete with pet doors that fit pets up to 100 pounds (they can go outside as they please while you explore Florida!)  The outdoor hot tub and shower (hot showers outdoors in the Florida sun or under the stars are heavenly!) is only steps away from the sliding glass doors in each bedroom.  Challenge your friends to a game of billiards on the outdoor pool table, cook on the large gas grill (BBQ) and eat a relaxing dinner on the patio while you enjoy the breeze through the palm trees.<br>There is no (human) swimming or fishing permitted in our relaxing dog-friendly koi pond filled by an 8 foot high waterfall; it will melt your stress away!  And don't forget to enjoy the outdoor fire pit on a cool winter night; sit by the fire and enjoy the calming sounds of the waterfall, your worries will fade away.<br>Be sure to eat at least one breakfast or lunch on the "Tree House" deck.  A short trip up the stairs brings you onto a deck snuggled into a large oak tree; you'll feel like you're in a tree house!  Hot summers catch some nice cool breezes on the deck, shaded in oak leaves with a nice view of the koi pond.<br>Park two-three cars in the large garage; there is also room on the 1 acre property to park boats, RVs and trailers without restriction.  It is centrally located so that it is a wonderful "hub" where you can visit one-tank-trip destinations, or take a few days to explore either coast of Florida, you can travel virtually anywhere in the state!  If you enjoy fishing, boating, water skiing and swimming, lovely Lake Thonotosassa is only a 5 minute drive!   How about a "Girls or Guys night out" at the Hard Rock Casino?  It's only a 10 minute drive!  Take a nice afternoon walk, or drive a few blocks to the famous Cracker Barrel restaurant, located near the Flying J Travel Plaza (get gas there before every trip, it has one of the lowest prices in town).<br>No weight or size restrictions on pets<br>$120 Cleaning Fee<br>3 Night Minimum<br>Hot Tub is extra at $15 per week ($15 minimum)<br>No Smoking Permitted<br>Please note: We do not recommend bringing toddlers or small children.  The koi pond is not gated, the home is not child-proofed.  There are no safety latches, outlet safety covers, etc.<br>A minimum of $300 is required to reserve this home. All rates are subject to sales and tourist tax. $500 security deposit (or cost of rental, whichever is greater) is due on each booking. COMMENTS: <p>Enjoy a charming mini-resort experience at the Best Western Villa Del Lago in the heart of California's beautiful Central Valley. Our contemporary, three-story hotel features life-enhancing services and facilities for your comfort and relaxation. Conveniently located just 1  hours from San Francisco, San Jose and Sacramento, the Villa Del Lago is the ideal stopping place for business and leisure travelers.<br><br>-	Central Valley Vacation. Situated in the golden hills of the Central Valley, you'll enjoy our close proximity to downtown Patterson and Modesto, the famous Diablo Grande Golf Course, Manteca Waterslides, Big Bear Lake, Yosemite, historic California train rides, wineries, shopping, and beautiful Stanislaus County parks, lakes and mountains.<br><br>-	California Comfort. Pets are welcome!<br><br>-	Vacation/Workstation. Start your day with a continental breakfast, or dine at the Atrium Bar &amp; Grill in our open three-story atrium. Sip your favorite beverage in the casual sports bar. Relax in our outdoor pool, luxuriate in our spa or sauna, and enjoy a workout in our fitness room. TOLLFREE: 
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: This pet-friendly inn, with rooms and cottages, overlooks Lake Arrowhead. There is a restaurant and bar on the premises.
COMMENTS: Surrounded by tall pines and cedars overlooking Lake Arrowhead is the Saddleback Inn- A Unique Charming Establishment.  Originally constructed as the Raven Hotel in 1917, the Saddleback Inn is now a totally-restored historical landmark. Departed guests, now commemorated in room names and decor, include Howard Hughes, Mae West and Charles Lindbergh.  The Saddleback Inn features 34 guest rooms and cottages with queen or king beds, stone gas log fireplaces, double Whirlpool baths and mini refrigerators.  Varieties of suite combinations afford excellent lodgings for families and groups as well as individual couples.  The Inn's architecture and furnishings are a blending of Victorian, mountain and country styles. The Inn features a full service restaurant and bar. Located in the mile-high resort of Lake Arrowhead, the Saddleback Inn is situated in the San Bernardino National Forest.

BOOKCOMMENTS: Some of these vacation rentals on Sunset Beach are pet-friendly. Those that are pet-friendly require a $150 non-refundable one time pet fee. 
COMMENTS: Sunset Beach is a small barrier island located at the southeast corner of North Carolina. To reach the island you pass from the mainland over one of the last pontoon swing bridges operating in our state. Sunset Beach is truly a quiet family beach, with virtually all of the development on the island comprised of family cottages. It boasts one of the widest and cleanest beach strands on the East Coast.<br><br>2008 is our 20th year of providing beach rentals on the island. We have over 400 Sunset Beach vacation rental properties for you to select from in our rental property database. You can see cottage details, check on availability, and book a reservation from there. From bed, your morning view is dominated by huge windows looking out onto the bay.<br><br>Inside the 24'x24' house is a living room area, a full kitchen with dining area, a bedroom area, a full bathroom, and an overflow room with a futon bed (double) downstairs. BOOKCOMMENTS: This realty company manages a few dog-friendly rentals in the Topsail Beach area. Dogs must be over 12 months old to stay in any of the properties and each has different pet terms.
COMMENTS: Since 1976, Topsail Realty has offered a variety of vacation rentals in Topsail Beach and Surf City, from homes for large families to two-bedroom cottages for quiet getaways. Topsail Realty, Inc. is in the Town of Topsail Beach at the south end of Topsail Island. A few Topsail Island vacation homeowners allow tenants to bring their friendly, housebroken, flea free dog(s) that is over 12 months old with them. The vacation home description will indicate if dogs are allowed in the vacation home and on its premises. The maximum number of dogs allowed and the pet rent per dog per reserved week is indicated in the description. Most units offer a reduced pet rental rate for rentals of 4 nights or less. There are leash laws and "pooper scooper" laws in Topsail Beach and Surf City. All dogs must display a current rabies vaccination tag and an identification tag. Failure to follow these laws could result in a civil citation and additional charges. In addition to a name tag with your home telephone number, please put a tag on your dog with your vacation home address and telephone number.

COMMENTS: Happy Acres Resort is a mountain resort offering cabins and camping. Open year round, pet friendly. We ask that you keep your pet on a leash and do not leave them unattended in the cabins or tied outside. Agressive dogs are NOT welcome!! We are a family resort catering to those who want a peaceful, outdoors experience in a beautiful mountain setting.

Wireless internet access, parking and local & toll-free calls are at no charge, and a guest e-mail center allows guests to keep in touch with those at home. TITLE: Il Lugano Luxury Suite Hotel
ADDRESS: 3333 NE 32nd Avenue
CITY: Ft Lauderdale
MAJOR: South Florida
STATE: FL
ZIP: 33308
PHONE: 954-564-4400
TOLLFREE: 
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
SMALLDOGS: TRUE
CITYCOMMENTS: New all-suite hotel il Lugano is Fort Lauderdale's most fashionable address for luxury
BOOKCOMMENTS: Dogs up to 25 pounds are allowed for a non-refundable pet fee of $100 per dog. Other types of pets are not allowed. They may allow you to exceed the weight limit at the discretion of the manager.
COMMENTS: Leisure and business travelers alike have a new place to enjoy everything that Fort Lauderdale has to offer. Il Lugano, the newest luxury all-suite hotel is located directly on the Intracoastal at Oakland Park Boulevard, across from one of the world's most beautiful beaches, with the excitement of Fort Lauderdale- known as the "Venice of America" - just moments away by car or water taxi. With its clean and sophisticated design, Il Lugano features 105 spacious guest suites and a level of personalized service unrivaled in South Florida.<br><br>With stunning Intracoastal and ocean views, il Lugano turns a guest's travels into an extraordinary luxury experience.   Indeed, no detail is overlooked. The hotel's exclusive il Concierge offers world-class service that caters to your every whim, day or night.  Want reservations at that hot new bistro, or an in-suite massage?  Il Concierge will graciously arrange it.<br><br>Every suite is fully equipped with every amenity a guest could desire.  Oversized terraces look out onto crystal blue waters.  Gourmet kitchens including a full-size washer and dryer.  Wireless high-speed Internet, flat-panel TVs and Bose iPod docking stations add to the level of comfort and convenience.<br><br>Guests can enjoy il Lugano's beautifully landscaped swimming pool and beach area overlooking the Intracoastal; Moto, their state-of-the-art Precor fitness center; and in room dining by Blue Moon Fish Co.  Business travelers will find the hotel's hospitality suites and il Spazio boardroom perfect for any meeting or gathering. A celebrity chef restaurant is also set to open in Fall 2008.<br><br>The best part about il Lugano for pet owners is that you can travel with your pet! All guests checking in with a dog will receive a welcome kit to include information on nearby areas for exercise and other goodies to help make traveling with pets more enjoyable. There is an additional one time cleaning fee of $100.00 per dog. The weight limit is up to 25 lbs, however dogs exceeding the weight limit and other pets other than dogs may be accepted into the hotel at the General Manager's discretion. Of course, pet owners will be responsible for their canine companions and for any excessive damage they may cause. A pet waiver must be signed upon check in.<br><br>Il Lugano.  Where style and sophistication meet.  Located at 3333 N.E. 32 Avenue, at Oakland Park Boulevard and the Intracoastal in Fort Lauderdale.  For reservations and information, call 954-564-4400 or go to www.illugano.com.

TITLE: Dovetail Inn B&B
ADDRESS: 3370 Route 30
CITY: Dorset
MAJOR: Manchester Center
STATE: VT
ZIP: 05251-0010
PHONE: 802-867-5747
TOLLFREE: 888-867-5747
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOCOMMENTS: This 1800's B&B allows dogs of all sizes in 4 of their 10 first floor rooms. There is a $30 one time pet fee.
COMMENTS: Dovetail Inn is a gracious 1800's B&B located in the heart of historic Dorset Village. Rates range from $99-265/night for 2 people(depending on season and room) and includes breaakfast.  We are close to restaurants, hiking trails and neighboring Manchester.  Four of our ten rooms on the first floor are designated "Dog Friendly" with easy access to outside.  Dogs of all sizes are allowed within the guest room but not in sitting or eating areas for a one-time pet fee per stay of $30 per room.  Dogs must be well behaved, leashed and cleaned up after at all times and crated when left alone for brief periods.  Arrangements must be made with innkeeper at time of booking.  Dovetail Inn reserves the right to ask disruptive dogs to leave and a local kennel will be recommended.

TITLE: Cape Cod's Lamb and Lion Inn
ADDRESS: 2504 Main Street
CITY: Barnstable
MAJOR: Cape Cod
STATE: MA
ZIP: 02630
PHONE: 508-362-6823
TOLLFREE: 800-909-6923
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
COMMENTS: A multi-award winning Cape Cod Inn with the spirit of a small luxury hotel. This pet-friendly establishment is one of the few Bed & Breakfast/Inns that features a pool (solar heated). Also featured are a central courtyard, hot tub spa, fireplace suites and suites with kitchens. Located on 4 pet friendly acres--you can walk to the beach and their are conservation trails across the street! The Lamb and Lion is not only pet friendly, but makes human guest welcome--their privacy is a priority. The guest services are unmatched on Cape Cod (just read the reviews!). There is a pet-friendly restaurant just down the road in nearby Barnstable Village (outdoor dining is seasonal, however). Most importantly, all room are incredibly CLEAN!<br>* The Inn is pet-friendly year round, however, it has a 30 pound weight restriction Mid-June through Mid-September).<br>* Dogs cannot be left in the rooms unattended when leaving the property. An in-room pet sitter may be arranged with advanced notice.<br>* Dogs must be leashed when in the common areas.<br>* Pets (and owners) must be properly groomed prior to arrival. There is a $25/day pet fee (with a $100 max.)

TITLE: Seventy-four Ranch
ADDRESS: 9205 Highway 53 West
CITY: Jasper
MAJOR: 
STATE: GA
ZIP: 30143
PHONE: 706-692-0123
TOLLFREE: 
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
CITYCOMMENTS: Relax in rugged indulgence at our working ranch bed and breakfast. Ride, fish or just unwind in our antique-filled cabins and the historic Butler-Cape House. Weddings, anniversaries, parties, family reunions, scout and church groups.
BOOKCOMMENTS: This pet-friendly B&B at the historic Butler House has a three acre fenced yard for your dog to run. Enjoy horseback rides, organic food and gardens. 
COMMENTS: The Seventy-four Ranch is Pet friendly<br><br>Pets stay in your room - FREE with notice. We have a three acre fenced yard for your dog's enjoyment and your peace of mind.<br><br>FREE Airport pickup and delivery<br><br>Stay three nights with us and the Fourth is FREE<br><br>We are your "Stay-cation" destination. A one tank trip from Atlanta and Chattanooga<br><br>Get ready to relax in rugged indulgence. The historic Butler-Cape House, built in the mid 1800's, is the heart of the Ranch.  Our rooms, cabins and suites are hand-crafted for your delight. Antiques, artifacts and artwork quilts and fluffy towels.<br><br>Your hearty breakfast is served on the antique French dining table in the Butler-Cape House. Savor the freshest of foods - a freshly made organic smoothie, Pecan Peaches N Cream waffles and natural bacon.<br><br>Come horseback riding with us.  You'll feel like an explorer as you wind your way through 1,200 acres of fields and streams. Experience how it was when horses were the only means of transportation and our country's history was being formed. Enjoy fishing in Parker Pond or playing in Big Scarecorn Creek.  There is something for everyone at Seventy-four Ranch.<br><br>Stroll around our gardens, full of antique roses and period flowers, or find a porch or a wooden swing and luxuriate in the breeze that sweeps through our valley. When it's time to leave, you'll be refreshed and renewed, with memories that will last a lifetime.

TITLE: Half Moon Bay Inn
ADDRESS: 401 Main Street
CITY: Half Moon Bay
MAJOR: 
STATE: CA
ZIP: 94019
PHONE: 650-726-1177
TOLLFREE: 
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: Dogs are allowed in this 1932 inn which was renovated in 2005. There is a $25 per stay pet fee and a $100 refundable pet deposit.
COMMENTS: Dogs of all sizes welcome!  This magnificent, award-winning boutique inn was built in 1932 and recently renovated to preserve its Spanish Revival Architecture. Our gorgeous and luxurious rooms have an old world charm, designed with your comfort in mind. Centrally located in the heart of downtown Half Moon Bay, you're just a stroll away from some of the best restaurants and shops including the locally-celebrated on-site restaurant, It's Italia, where you can cozy up to the fireplace on the dog-friendly terra cotta tiled patio. During your stay, explore the beautiful Northern California coastline, rich with state parks, beaches, farms and rural hamlets tucked between the coastal range and the Pacific Ocean. This fantastical and luscious location is like a little bit of Europe in downtown Half Moon Bay.  Beds and dishes for your canine traveler provided.<br><br>Room Rates:<br><br>Sunday-Thursday weekday rates: $130-$225<br>Friday-Saturday weekend rates: $175-$300<br><br>Dog Policy:<br><br>$25.00 per stay<br>$35 for 2 dogs per stay.
OLDCOMMENTS: The Half Moon Bay Inn, built in 1932, underwent a yearlong renovation in 2005, maintaining its Spanish Revival architecture.  Our magnificent building, full of history and lore has been an award winning labor of love.  We are located in the heart of downtown Half Moon Bay, walking distance to some of our best dining, shops, and of course, the beach.<br>Our rooms are gorgeous and luxurious, with an old world feel, designed with your comfort in mind.  Each room has its own marble bathroom, down comforters, fine linens, flat screen TV, and complimentary wireless internet access, as well as in-room locally roasted Fairtrade coffee. We have a variety of rooms to choose from including our Terrazzo Queens which open up to their own terracotta tiled courtyard, our premium Colossal Kings, our Cottage Suites with wet bar and sitting room, and two Bella Vista villas, complete with kitchen and laundry room which are perfect for your extended vacation.  Pets of all sizes are welcome and will be provided with their own beds, dishes and special treats!<br>During your stay, visit our popular on-site restaurant and relax in our terracotta tiled courtyard by the fireplace while enjoying the many fruits this part of California has to offer.<br><br>Room Rates:<br>Sunday-Thursday weekday rates: $130-$225<br>Friday-Saturday weekend rates: $175-$300<br><br>Dog Policy:<br>$25.00 per stay<br>$100.00 refundable deposit<br>Dogs are not to be left in rooms unattended.

TITLE: Casa Laguna Inn & Spa
ADDRESS: 2510 S Coast Highway
CITY: Laguna Beach
MAJOR: 
STATE: CA
ZIP: 92651
PHONE: 949-494-2996
TOLLFREE: 800-233-0449
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
CITYCOMMENTS: Voted "Best of Orange County" for nine consecutive years by the OC Register and Silver Medal winner in the 2007 "Inn-credible Breakfast Cook-off"
COMMENTS: The Casa Laguna Inn & Spa was voted 'Best of Orange County' for nine consecutive years by the OC Register and was awarded the Silver Medal in the 2007 'Inn-credible Breakfast Cook-off.'  In addition, this 22 room hotel was a featured 'Romantic Stay' in the November 2007 issue of Sunset Magazine and listed as 'Best Coastal Inn' in the October 2007 issue of Coastal Living Magazine.<br><br>Terraced on a hillside in Laguna Beach, CA amid tropic gardens and flower splashed patios, the Casa Laguna Inn & Spa exudes an ambiance of bygone days when Laguna Beach, California was developing its reputation as an artists' colony and hideaway for Hollywood film stars.<br><br>The mission style architecture of this Laguna Beach bed and breakfast set below towering palms framing views of the blue Pacific invites you to linger, to slow your pace to that of another less hurried era. This feeling will be reinforced as you take your breakfast or afternoon refreshments in the historic Mission House or on one of the many secluded patios.<br><br>The magnificent Palm Court, the bougainvillea-vined courtyard and the ocean-view pool deck will enchant you with their fountains and rare Catalina tiles. Another true touch of classic Laguna Beach, California is the Bell Tower, the perfect place to catch spectacular sunsets over Catalina Island.<br><br>Breakfast at the Casa Laguna Inn is a very important part of the experience. The philosophy at this Laguna Beach hotel echoes that of the Slow Foods Movement, of which the owners of the Casa Laguna Inn & Spa are members. When asked what inspires him in the kitchen, Chef Paul Blank states simply, ' my love of food, the feeling of accomplishment when a dish is prepared and presented well and most importantly, the satisfaction of our guests.'<br><br>Two lovely beaches are a few minutes walk from this Laguna Beach hotel. Victoria Beach is the white sandy one while Moss Point offers tide pools and coves. Located one and a half miles south of Main Beach, we are a short distance from the many boutiques, pottery shops, and galleries for which Laguna Beach, CA is famous.<br><br>The Casa Laguna Inn & Spa welcomes well behaved, clean and healthy pets traveling with their people. There are a number of restaurants and attractions nearby that are pet-friendly. In addition to running the inn, the owners raise Guide Dog Puppies for Guide Dogs of America.  Emory, a career-changed Guide Dog spends his days greeting guests and serving as the Goodwill Ambassador at Casa Laguna.<br><br>There is a nominal nightly charge of $25/pet and an additional registration form guests must complete when they arrive. If traveling with pets, please indicate the number, type and names of your pets when making your reservation.  Pets may not be left in your room unattended.<br><br>Casa Laguna Inn offers high speed internet access in all of our rooms as well as wireless through-out the propertyFull gourmet breakfast and afternoon refreshments <br>Hypoallergenic Feather bed or pillow-top mattress <br>Hypoallergenic duvet <br>Luxurious robes<br>Complimentary high-speed Internet access <br>DVD & CD player with complimentary access to our collection of classics <br>Hair dryer, iron & ironing board <br>Small refrigerator <br>Telephone with voice mail and, free local calls and 800 calls <br>Beach chairs and umbrellas <br>Pet bowls, treats and welcome information about traveling with your pets
BOOKCOMMENTS: This Spanish-style bed and breakfast sits on a hillside with views of the ocean. It was voted Orange County's Best B&B four years in a row. The rooms are decorated with a blend of antique and contemporary furnishings. There are 15 guest rooms plus several guest suites and cottages. While in Laguna Beach, browse the variety of speciality shops or dine at one of the dog-friendly restaurants. Interested in a stroll on the beach - Main Beach (certain dog hours) is a short drive from the inn. There is a $25 per day additional pet fee.CATEGORY: Accommodation

COMMENTS: Rocky Oaks Cabin is located in Descanso, California, a small country community in San Diego County, east of Alpine and west of Pine Valley of about 2,162 residents. TITLE: The Surf House
ADDRESS: 205 Rio Del Mar Blvd
CITY: Aptos
MAJOR: 
STATE: CA
ZIP: 
PHONE: 805-260-1255
TOLLFREE: 
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
CITYCOMMENTS: This 800 square foot pet-friendly vacation rental is across the street from the pet-friendly Rio Del Mar Beach in Aptos. Sleeps up to 6.
BOOKCOMMENTS: This 800 square foot vacation rental allows pets. Please mention your pet when making reservations.
COMMENTS: The Surf House is located across the streeet from Rio Del Mar State Beach in Aptos California. Located 10 miles south of Santa Cruz, on the sunny side of the Monterey Bay. The state beach is one of the few California beaches that allow pets.  The Surf House is a charming 800 sq ft, single story, beach bungalow. Sleeps 6. Master Bedroom has a queen size bed, 2nd bedroom has 2 twins, twin trundle bed in living room. Expansive view of Rio Del Mar State Beach from the living room and large deck. Watch the surf and beach activities from the comfort of your lazy boy recliner or deck chair. Built in late 30's as part of the Rio Del Mar Country Club in Aptos Ca, it retains many of the original features. Deck has barbeque & redwood picnic table. Lovely hillside view from the master bedroom balcony and kitchen. Fully furnished. TV, DVD, phone, and internet connection provided. No washer or dryer. See the USS Palo Alto from your living room. This cement ship was brought to Rio Del Mar beach in the 1920's and turned into a floating nightclub. Time and tides took its toll. The cement ship is now the home for numerous fish and sea birds. The pier leading to the ship offers no-license required fishing. 90 minutes from San Francisco. 40 minutes from Monterey or San Jose. 15 min to the Santa Cruz boardwalk. 5 minutes to Santa Cruz Mountains and redwoods.<br> Off Season rates: 2 nights $781.  $275 for each additional night. Stay 6 nights and the 7th night is free.<br>Summer Season rates: 2 nights $1001. $385 each additional night. Stay 6 nights and the 7th night is free.<br>Visit our website http://www.lynnsbeachhouse.com for more pictures and information, send an e-mail to thesurfhouse@lynnsbeachhouse.com or call 408-541-1987 and ask for Lynn or 805-260-1255 and ask for Jeff.

Auberge Mendocino Inn and Seaside Vacation Cottages is the perfect place to relax, unwind and rejuvenate body and soul.   We offer comfort with style in a setting of exceptional natural beauty at one of the most romantic places to stay on the Northern California Coast.  Read in our beautiful gardens.  Step out our door and walk to the beach or to the cliff's edge for spectacular ocean vistas.  Bird watching, whale watching, hiking and acres of wild flowers are at our door.  Canoeing, kayaking, galleries and restaurants begin across the street and are all within a two mile radius.<br><br>We offer extra value lodging packages for your enjoyment & relaxation.  If you're looking to celebrate a special occasion or planning a romantic getaway Auberge Mendocino Bed and Breakfast could be just what you need. We have variety of packages and specials built around holidays and events.  For something extra, try our added touches, or melt away stress with a soothing massage or spa treatment in the privacy of your own room.   When these packages and specials just don't fit; you can still save when you book online with our seasonal internet rates.<br><br>The design of our facility will help you make the most of your visit.  With several sitting areas and a unique selection of guest accommodations featuring simple economical rooms, deluxe rooms, suites, a romantic cottage or a charming vacation home, we have something for everyone.  Whether it be a simple getaway, a holiday escape, family reunion, or a time for you to re-connect with old friends we have the perfect place for your event.  At Auberge Mendocino Bed and Breakfast you can steal away with the girls for a relaxing girlfriends getaway.   We welcome everyone to share our experience - families with children, couples, singles, straights, gays and lesbians.  We have select rooms available for pets with well behaved owners.<br><br>What ever your dream - privacy, exploring, or just kicking back, we will make it a reality. Visiting us is a wonderful experience you'll never forget.  Our staff is committed to ensuring that your visit with us is enjoyable and memorable.  If you're searching for a gift for a relative or special friend you can purchase a gift certificate to Auberge Mendocino online or by calling us and speaking to one of our innkeepers.

BOOKCOMMENTS: Dogs are allowed at teh motel and RV Park 20 miles west of Cody near the Shoshone National Forest. There is a $10 per night pet fee in the motel. There is no additional fee for pets in the RV park.
COMMENTS: Closest Motel/RV park to east entrance of Yellowstone National Park, twenty (20) miles west of Cody, one (1) mile east of the Shoshone National Forest, set in beautiful Wapiti Valley directly on US HWY 14/16/20. Restaurants, laundry, hiking, fishing, horseback riding, hunting, and convenience store/gas station next door or nearby. Dogs are generally allowed (under owners control) anywhere on property, $10 per night per pet ($5.00 additional pet) in motel rooms and in the RV Park for no additional fee. Dogs may not be left unattended/tied/crated or in vehicles at night. Some pet services are available (ie: pet sitting; fenced grassy play areas; etc) upon request. Rates start at $69.00 (motel/seasonal) with discounts available.

The house has been recently renovated and will welcome you with its gleaming hardwood floors, freshly painted interior and exterior arched doorways and curved ceilings. Each bedroom is appointed with a luxurious queen sized, pillow top mattress, fine linens and cozy bedding. High quality furniture, antiques and many original works of art are around every corner. Sit at the desk where you can make unlimited local and long distance phone calls, plan your day, peruse the guest book or connect your computer to wireless internet access.<br><br>Enter the house through your private courtyard shrouded in potted plants, climbing wisteria and olive trees. Listen to the sound of the fountain running, read a book or take a nap in the outdoor daybed.<br><br>Take a ten minute walk to Copia, the center for wine, food and the arts and enjoy an array of daily activities and programs, a casual cafe or fine dining at Julia's Kitchen. Just a few more steps to the incredible Oxbow Market, which houses three restaurants, a wine merchant, an actual micro-winery, bakery, tea shop, chocolatier, spices, butcher shop, organic ice cream, olive oil, gifts and more. Catch a trolley from here or continue on to Napa's downtown, where choices abound from day spas, theater, wine tasting rooms and shopping to a plethora of world class restaurants.<br><br>Hundreds of wineries are a short drive away, many in the beautiful Carneros region or the Stags Leap wine district, both within five miles. Take flight in a hot air balloon, ride the wine train or hire a tour company to pick you up at Casa Alta and explore.

COMMENTS: Pacific Edge, a Laguna Beach, Pet Friendly, California Hotel fronts 300 feet of Orange County's most gorgeous and pristine beaches, stretching to almost one uninterrupted mile of pure surf and sand, and receding before your eyes into the glittering depths of the Pacific Ocean. Pacific Edge is centrally located, and is fully encompassed within the famed downtown Laguna Beach area. <br>Pacific Edge Hotel's relaxing amenities include two heated swimming pools, a hot tub, and a game room. The property is also immediately adjacent to a fantastic oceanfront restaurant, the Beach House, serving breakfast, lunch, dinner, and cocktails. For your day on the beach, Pacific Edge provides complimentary beach towels, lounge chairs and umbrellas. Guests receive high-speed Internet WiFi connectivity throughout the hotel, and can even stay connected while lounging on the beach.<br><br>Room Amenities<br>Sometimes you just want to relax in the comforts of your own home. That's why Pacific Edge offers rooms with everyday comforts you've grown to love. Pacific Edge affords a full-featured hotel experience, with private balconies that let you enjoy the Pacific from your room, and full kitchens that let you enjoy meals without leaving the beach. All rooms come with a refrigerator and air-conditioning to keep you feeling cool and comfortable on hot summer days when the ocean breeze is just not enough. In addition, all rooms offer complimentary wireless internet access, so you are always connected.<br><br>Executive Accommodations<br>In addition to the standard room options at Pacific Edge, several other suite accommodations can be configured to accommodate the needs of business executives, including small business meetings and retreats. A private executive boardroom is available with adjoining king bedroom and office, perfect for up to 12 people. The Pacific Edge sales team can tailor these arrangements to meet specific requirement. <br><br>Things to Do<br>Laguna Beach features an exciting range of attractions and special events, from golfing to a day at the spa, from art festivals to historical tours and wilderness parks. With numerous galleries, artist's studios and boutiques - not to mention close proximity to some of Orange County's most renowned shopping destinations - the opportunities for shopping here at Laguna Beach are unrivalled. Known to travelers as a quaint, artistic village and community, Laguna Beach hosts nearly 100 galleries and one-of-a-kind shops, and is home to special annual events such as the world-famous Pageant of the Masters and Festival of the Arts.<br><br>Pacific Edge, Laguna Beach Hotel: Venues<br>This undiscovered gem is located on a mile of uninterrupted beach and is just steps away from the many acclaimed restaurants, galleries, shops and cultural activities that make this destination famous. Accommodations at the Pacific Edge Hotel include 130 recently upgraded guestrooms and suites overlooking the blue waters of the Pacific and The Pacific Edge Villa, a beautiful 4,000-square-foot, private beachfront venue ideal for business retreats, weddings, or family vacations. An executive meeting suite is also available, perfect for smaller business gatherings.<br><br>Pet Information: There are no weight limits.  There will be a $50.00, non-refundable, fee.

Services include an exercise room, outdoor swimming pool, gift shop, business center, onsite car rental desk and two unique upscale venues for dining and nightlife entertainment. Conveniently accessible off I-25, I-10 with easy access to I-70 which allows guests to explore the wide variety of attractions in Las Cruces and Southern New Mexico. The hotel is only minutes away from historic Old Mesilla and New Mexico State University, and the Mesilla Valley Mall is located just across the street.<br> With 350 days of sunshine a year, set off for an amazing day at White Sands National Monument, or golfing at the the beautiful Sonoma Ranch Golf course or the New Mexico State University Golf course, or enjoy a challenging hike through the majestic Organ Mountains.

COMMENTS: Nativo Lodge is a unique hotel in Albuquerque with Native American cultural influences.<br>This hotel combines rich and vibrant Native American cultural aspects with contemporary Albuquerque city elements. History, art, electronics, vibrant colors and neon lighting are combined to provide guests with a dramatic experience. This 146-room full-service hotel features the best of modern amenities mixed with the hospitality and charm of the Native American culture. Guests can enjoy the beautiful indoor/outdoor pool and Jacuzzi, or workout at the hotel's fitness center. Each guestroom at Nativo Lodge is custom designed with a striking Navajo chief's blanket design covering the floor and stunning historical Native American photography artwork, basketry and dream catchers. The beds in each guestroom are luxurious with the highest quality bedding, fabrics and pillows to ensure a restful experience. Enjoy the breakfast buffet experience and sample the local seasonal items and a variety of entres prepared in a Southwestern flare. Relax with a signature cocktail as you listen to enchanting cultural music in the souring lobby lounge. This area offers guests an intriguing place to read a magazine, catch up with a friend, or unwind from the day.

CITYCOMMENTS: A cultural hotel inspired by the building traditions of the Anasazi offering guests a comfortable environment to enjoy all Santa Fe has to offer.
BOOKCOMMENTS: Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There is a $50 one time additional pet fee.
COMMENTS: Inspired by the ancient and legendary building traditions of the Anasazi, the Lodge at Santa Fe stands atop the hills of Santa Fe paying tribute to the ancient culture. A blend of Northern New Mexico's distinct cultural influences awaits you at this exquisite "Santa Fe-style" hotel. This 127-room full service hotel features a number of unique suites, some with wood-burning fireplaces. The guestrooms are some of the most unique rooms in the Southwest. A Navajo Chief's blanket design covers the floor of each room. The custom designedfurniture is handcrafted to reflect hundreds of years of rich Anasazi history and New Mexican heritage. Relax and enjoy the view from Las Maanitas restaurant or the comfortable hilltop lounge. Take time to experience the beautiful perennial gardens and spacious outdoor pool and spa. Every summer, visitors can enjoy a variety of entertainment in the intimate setting of the Cabaret located within the hotel. The Lodge at Santa Fe offers guests very convenient access to the ultimate in world-class art, shopping, dining and entertainment. The historic Santa Fe Plaza is just a short five minute drive and a complementary shuttle is provided for guests of the hotel.

TITLE: Fox Hill Bed & Breakfast Suites
ADDRESS: 4383 Borden Grant Trail
CITY: Fairfield
MAJOR: Lexington
STATE: VA
ZIP: 24435
PHONE: 540-377-9922
TOLLFREE: 800-369-8005
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: Dogs are allowed for a $20 per night pet fee for the first two nights and then $10 per night after that.
COMMENTS: Unwind and delight in the quiet, comfortable elegance of our 38-acre country retreat. You'll be greeted with a warm welcome and special dog treats, and just wait until you see all the wonderful outdoor experiences awaiting you: stroll in the shade and splash in our spring-fed stream as the bluebirds swoop by, wander along mowed paths through our wildflower meadows, or play a game of Frisbee in the field kept mowed just for you. Don't worry if you get a little dirty -- there is a special outdoor dog washing station equipped with shampoo (just let us know if you need towels). And if Mom & Dad forgot anything, Ruger and Benelli (our resident dogs) will be glad to share their water bowls or toys. When you are ready to explore the area, we'll point you towards some of our favorite dog-friendly activities: a hike in Goshen Pass or the Blue Ridge Mountains, a trip to Natural Bridge, a vineyard tour, a stroll along the Chessie Nature Trail alongside the Maury River, or a weekend double feature at Hull's Drive-Inn Theatre (April-October - ask for the extra large popcorn). You'll find a complete list of pet friendly activities as well as pet friendly restaurants (outdoor dining) and shops in your room when you arrive.<br><br>We have no restrictions on the size of visiting dogs -- we love them all! Our pet fee is $20/dog/night. If you chose a Kitchen Suite, we ask you to stay in your crate if you plan to be in your room unattended, and that a cell phone number is provided in case you are unhappy and make your sentiments known.  If you chose a Bed & Breakfast Suite, you can stay in your room unattended during breakfast time only.  We also ask that beds and furniture be reserved for your two-legged companions only.<br><br>Please visit our web site for full details, pictures, room descriptions, specials and rates (www.foxhillbb.com). We invite you to come stay with us and experience the tranquility and beauty here in the Shenandoah Valley and Blue Ridge Mountains.
OLDCOMMENTS: Unwind and delight in the quiet, comfortable elegance of our 38-acre country retreat.   You'll be greeted with a warm welcome and special dog treats, and just wait until you see all the wonderful outdoor experiences awaiting you: stroll in the shade and splash in our spring-fed stream as the bluebirds swoop by, wander along mowed paths through our wildflower meadows, or play a game of frisbee in the field kept mowed just for you.  Don't worry if you get a little dirty -- there is a special outdoor dog washing station equipped with shampoo (just let us know if you need towels).  And if Mom & Dad forgot anything, Ellie (our resident dog) will be glad to share her water bowls or toys.  When you are ready to explore the area, we'll point you towards some of our favorite dog-friendly activities:  a hike in Goshen Pass or the Blue Ridge Mountains, a trip to Natural Bridge, a vineyard tour, a stroll along the Chessie Nature Trail alongside the Maury River, or a weekend double feature at Hull's Drive-Inn Theatre (April-October - ask for the extra large popcorn). You'll find a complete list of pet friendly activities as well as pet friendly restaurants (outdoor dining) and shops in your room when you arrive.<br><br>We have no restrictions on the size of visiting dogs -- we love them all!  Our pet fee is $20/dog/night for the first two nights, then $10/dog/night for subsequent nights.  If you chose a Cottage Suite, we ask you to stay in your crate if you plan to be in your room unattended, and that a cell phone number is provided in case you are unhappy and make your sentiments known.  If you chose a Bed & Breakfast Suite, you cannot stay in your room unattended (weather permitting, you are welcome to join your people on the back porch for breakfast -- during the cooler or rainy times, we ask that you nap in the car while your people eat breakfast in our main dining room).  We also ask that beds and furniture be reserved for your two-legged companions only.<br><br>Check out our web site for full details, pictures, room descriptions, specials and rates (www.foxhillbb.com).  We invite you to come stay with us and experience the tranquility and beauty here in the Shenandoah Valley and Blue Ridge Mountains.

What's Doin' On Pleasure Island, NC<br><br>Don't worry for a single, sunset beach second about not having enough to do on your vacation with us here on "Pleasure Island" as we locals like to call it. We promise: we've got you covered!<br><br>No matter how eclectic your tastes or how adventurous you are (or aren't), from Carolina Beach, to Kure Beach to Fort Fisher, there are activities abounding for all ages and all tastes.<br><br>Naturally the warm waters, sandy beaches and plentiful sunshine are the mainstays of our island entertainment. If you simply want to soak up some rays or float on warm waves, you have miles of beach to choose from. However, if lazing the day away is a little too restful for you, Carolina Beach, Kure Beach and Fort Fisher offer multiple outlets for all that pent up energy.<br><br>An Educational Vacation On Carolina Beach, Kure Beach and Fort Fisher<br><br>Collectively referred to as "Pleasure Island" by the locals, the towns of Carolina Beach, Kure Beach and Fort Fisher combine to offer vacationers outstanding "up close and personal" insights into the natural habitat of our abundantly varied coastal marine and wildlife. There is so much more to the Carolina coast than sun and waves...

TITLE: Stonehurst Place Bed & Breakfast
ADDRESS: 923 Piedmont Avenue NE
CITY: Atlanta
MAJOR: 
STATE: GA
ZIP: 30309
PHONE: 404-881-0722
TOLLFREE: 
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
COMMENTS: Stay with us and take advantage of our Pampered Pooch Package.  Travel light with your dog ... we'll provide a lovely dog bed, food and water bowls, and fresh-baked dog biscuits to Pamper Your Pooch! <br><br>Enjoy Stonehurst Place, a romantic bed and breakfast inn offering the finest accommodation experience in Atlanta.  We are small enough to give the personal attention you seek, and provide exceptional hospitality and a commitment to service in the tradition of First Class hotels and inns worldwide.<br><br>Enjoy beautiful rooms and suites with fireplaces and sumptuous decor, all in our eco-friendly environment that may have you tuned-in to your very heart and soul!  We are pet-friendly, smoke-free, and have museum quality art for you to enjoy at leisure.  Then, to top it all off - gourmet breakfast and refreshments served throughout your stay by our friendly innkeeper.<br><br>In addition to our extraordinary rooms and baths, Stonehurst Place has lovely gardens, a dramatic front parlor and our Sleeping Porch for your enjoyment.  We provide: high-speed and Wi-Fi Internet access, electronics charging and iPod docking stations, complimentary beverages upon arrival, homemade refreshments throughout your stay, eco-friendly amenities, superior linens, flat screen TVs and work desks, comfy chairs and beds, and stylish surroundings to relax in.<br><br>Bring your dog and enjoy nearby Piedmont Park with its own Doggie Park, just three blocks away!<br><br>Built in 1896, our National Historic Register home, the "Hinman House", was extensively renovated and lovingly restored in 2008.  This historic preservation, which used EarthCraft House standards (like those of LEED), provides an alternative to Atlanta hotels in the form of a dog-friendly, eco-friendly and personal setting for business and leisure travelers visiting Downtown and Midtown Atlanta.  Stonehurst Place has become a destination for travelers and a landmark in Midtown for its utilization of "green lodging" initiatives such as water reclamation, purification, recycling, reuse, and solar energy.<br><br>From your walk into the house through beautiful gardens to the sound sleep you will enjoy in your high-ceiling, spacious suite or room, the pleasure you will get from your spa tub or multi-head shower, and the gourmet breakfast to start your day after a perfect nights sleep, we guarantee that you will return to Stonehurst Place again and again.<br><br>Whether business or pleasure brings you to Atlanta, let us help make your visit just what you have in mind!  Imagine arriving at Stonehurst Place after a long trip; entering a peaceful and quiet grand old home in the middle of busy Atlanta where you are greeted at the door; taking refreshments to your room or suite; kicking off your shoes, stepping onto the cool wood floors or into a warm bath, and relaxing at the end of the day - Why settle for a hotel or anything less when you can have something very special?

TITLE: Cobtree Vacation Rental Homes
ADDRESS: 440 - 458 Armstrong Rd
CITY: Geneva
MAJOR: Finger Lakes
STATE: NY
ZIP: 14456
PHONE: 315-789-1144  
APHONE: 888-328-9813
BOOKPHONE: 315-789-1144
ATOLLFREE: 866-573-6322
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: A number of these vacation rentals in the Finger Lakes region allow your dog. Ask them about pet-friendly properties when calling.
COMMENTS: Welcome to Cobtree Vacation Rental Homes Resort in the Beautiful Finger Lakes Region of Upstate New York. Cobtree is proud to have achieved  a    3 diamond AAA Rating offering a deluxe Air Conditioned, Pet Friendly, Children Friendly, Disabled friendly  development of brick built, English style, Vacation Rental Cottages and more traditionally built "  Log Cabin Rentals" Each home is provided with free WI-FI, Cable TV, free USA/Canada telephone calls &  fully equipped kitchens.  Cobtree is surrounded by 57 acres of farmland and woodlands overlooking the Western Shores of Seneca Lake suitable for both couples and families and combined together are ideal for reunions, Wedding Receptions & sporting groups as well as for parents and visitors to the nearby HWS colleges in Geneva.  We offer affordable good value for money Rental Rates and quality rentals.<br><br>Just 4- hours North West from New York City and 1- hours South East from Buffalo on the US-Canadian border by road, you will discover the idyllic Finger Lakes Region.<br><br>In a setting of 9000 square miles, there are 11 Lakes and over 1000 waterfalls and numerous gorges, which were formed at the end of the ice age when tremendous grinding pressures gouged enormous holes in the land forming what is now the Finger Lakes region of "Up State New York". These amazing Lakes range from 3 miles (5km) to 40 miles (64km) in length and from 30 feet (10m) to over 632 feet (194m) in depth! Native American Legend says that the Fingers Lakes were the impression left behind by the creator when he reached down to bless the land. Whatever the truth, the Finger Lakes are a wonderful place to Escape to, to "Just get away" and where you can relax and do either very little or do a lot. To explore the many exciting places dotted around the region and to have that perfect vacation.<br><br>Whilst you are here, why not take a leisurely drive or wine tour to visit some of over 70 award winning wineries and Vineyards, which have joined together to form five wine trails. Shop at a variety of stores including antique shops, boutiques, bookshops and outlet Malls. Visit the many festivals, craft fairs, Museums, Historic Sites and other activities that take place throughout the year or simply enjoy the hospitality of the people of the Finger Lakes. For the more active and adventurous visitors to the region, there are numerous summer adventure activities such as canoeing, kayak, sailing, wind surfing, hiking around the 25 State Parks to take in the Natural beauty, swimming or why not take a cruise on Seneca Lake or Cayuga Lake or visit the Red Newt Winery in Hector which not only has stunning wines created by David Whiting but also offers some of the finest cuisine available in the region, expertly prepared by Chef Debra Whiting and all dishes served at affordable prices?
OLDCOMMENTS: Welcome to Cobtree Vacation Rental Homes, a AAA 3 diamond approved establishment located in the beautiful and scenic New York Finger Lakes Region offering Economically Priced  Air Conditioned, Pet Friendly, Children Friendly, Disabled friendly development of English architectural Style brick built Vacation Rental Cottages as well as traditionally built " Log Cabins" or " Real Homes" for the equivalent cost of a hotel suite!  Each home is provided with free Road Runner WI-FI, Cable TV and USA/Canada digital telephone service and each with a fully equipped kitchen.  Cobtree is surrounded by 57 acres of farmland and woodlands overlooking the Western Shores of Seneca Lake. The properties are in addition, ideally suited for hosting family reunions & WEDDING RECEPTIONS as well as for sporting groups (such as the Triathlon, sailing, fishing, hunting, cycling etc).

HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: There is a $14 per day per pet charge. Dogs cannot be left unattended in the room. All rooms are non-smoking.
COMMENTS: Why are our guests so loyal to the Fireside Motel?<br><br>Rooms look out at a magnificent rocky coastline. Giant boulders push into the ocean, waves crash into coves, and fissures spray foam high in the air. Sunsets are framed in your picture window.<br><br>Sited on the north end of Yachats, the Fireside is away from traffic noise, yet only minutes from fine dining, delightful shops and top-ranked art galleries. In front of your room, sandy coves reveal agates, driftwood and tide pools. A path follows the ocean to a long sandy beach. A short drive leads to hiking trails, a wilderness, and a wonderful array of attractions.<br><br>Fireside rooms are meticulously clean and well maintained.<br><br>We understand how much it means to bring your pet with you to the Oregon Coast. The Fireside Motel allows up to two well-behaved and well-groomed pets per room at a charge of $14.00 per pet, per night (2 pet maximum).<br><br>To ensure that you, your pet, and all of our guests have a positive stay, we request that you follow our Pet Policy. Following the Pet Policy will help the Fireside Motel remain pet friendly. A copy of this policy will be given to you upon check-in. We also provide a Pet Package including towels, sheets, and pooper-scoopers.<br><br>The Fireside Motel Pet Policy in brief follows:<br><br>Never leave your pet alone in the room.<br><br>Always accompany your pet and have it on a leash when outside.<br><br>Use the towels provided in the Pet Package to wipe your pet off after a walk on the beach, or if your pet becomes wet and/or dirty.<br><br>Use the sheets provided in the Pet Package to cover furnishings your pet may lie on.<br><br>Always use pooper-scoopers provided. Ask at the Front Desk if you need more.

TITLE: Brannan Cottage Inn
ADDRESS: 109 Wapoo Avenue
CITY: Calistoga
MAJOR: 
STATE: CA
ZIP: 94515
PHONE: 707-942-4200
TOLLFREE: 
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: Two of the six rooms at this small inn are pet-friendly.
COMMENTS: Brannan Cottage Inn is located in the Napa Valley's most unique town of Calistoga--the town's motto is "Hot Springs, Cool Wines, Warm Welcome." This charming National Register of Historic Places B&B was built in 1860 by Samuel Brannan, Calistoga's founder.  It features unique architecture, a wraparound porch, ornamental gardens and lawn, four comfortable and luxurious one-bedroom units and two larger mini-suites (each can sleep up to four adults). All rooms have A.C., private baths, ceiling fans, refrigerators, telephones, etc.  5 of the 6 rooms have fireplaces and skylights.  We offer a full, delicious breakfast and a Friday afternoon "wine and cheese hour" with a unique local winery providing the liquid refreshment.  Rates range from $155 to $255 plus tax per night, based on single or double occupancy.  The Inn is walking distance to Calistoga's popular restaurants, spas, and shops and within two miles of more than 15 wineries.<br><br>We have two rooms that are pet friendly (of 6 total rooms)and special rates for pets and their owners. The pets (dogs especially) are welcome to romp on our newly re-landscaped lawn area.  Dogs are also welcome in many of our local wineries. There also is a big "park" (the athletic fields for the high school) across the street in back, and the excellent hiking trail ("Oat Hill Mine Trail") starts about one half mile to the northeast.  We also provide Travelin' Dog Pet Amenities ("for discriminating dogs and their people") for our four footed guests, including such things as liver biscotti, dog cookies, and doggie clean-up baggies.<br><br>Check our website at www.brannancottageinn.com for more info.

COMMENTS: The Hilton Sedona Resort at Bell Rock, Sedona's only spa and golf resort is located amidst the spectacular beauty of Northern Arizona's red rock country. Magnificent red rock formations surround this Sedona hotel giving the resort the feel of a high desert lodge. Sedona has been called "The Most Beautiful Place in America." The Hilton Sedona Resort at Bell Rock is located just 90 minutes north of Phoenix, AZ along SR179 Arizona's only All American Road and Scenic Byway.  The Grand Canyon is located two and a half hours away and makes a great day trip. Hilton Sedona at Bell Rock hotel guests can enjoy exquisite two room suites or deluxe guest rooms featuring high-speed Internet access, Hilton Serenity Collection bed, Crabtree and Evelyn bath amenities, gas fireplace, flat panel LCD televisions, and private balcony or patio.<br><br>The Grille at ShadowRock features a Southwestern menu by Chef Richards, offering fresh regional fare for breakfast, lunch or dinner. Our pet friendly outdoor patio dining boasts stunning views of lush fairways and pine-topped mountain ridges.<br><br>Sports enthusiasts visiting our resort can take advantage of the onsite 18-hole championship golf course with the award-winning clubhouse. Golf Digest and The Arizona Republic ranked the course in the top 5 best public courses in the state. Designed by architect Gary Panks, the 6,646-yard, par 71 lay out is widely considered to be among the world's most unforgettable golf courses, providing a variety of challenges to match any level of ability.<br><br>Escape from ordinary life and discover the remarkable Hilton Spa and emerge refreshed, renewed and recharged. Luxuriate and pamper yourself in this spacious 25,000-square-foot spa therapy center. The fully equipped facility features a wide array of world-class spa treatments, lap pool and therapy spa, exercise opportunities and offerings to sooth mind and body - all in the unforgettable setting of Red Rock Sedona. Serve up a game of tennis - your choices are many.<br><br>The Hilton Sedona Resort at Bell Rock offers a variety of room packages including the Extended Stay Package, Love on the Rocks Package, Weekday Wellness, and Golf Packages.<br><br>Pet Policy:  Weight limit of 75 lbs per pet, maximum of two pets per room, $75 nonrefundable pet fee per room per stay.
