BOOKCOMMENTS: Pets are allowed at these vacation properties on the beach at St. George Island.
COMMENTS: Resort Vacation Properties offers over 200 pet-friendly vacation homes for rent on the beautiful, uncrowded beaches of St. George Island.  Located just 80 miles east of Panama City, Florida, the beaches and most stores and restaurants are pet-friendly, too.<br><br>There are no pet fees or damage deposits charged and because price is important, our rates are all inclusive.  Simply put, you pay the advertised rate plus state and local taxes with no additional fees except for optional items like pool heat.<br><br>Resort Vacation Properties understands that little touches make a big difference.  Our properties offer all the comforts of home with a little extra.  We are pleased to provide you with a starter supply of garbage bags, paper towels, toilet paper, dishwasher soap, hand soap and coffee filters.  Your reservation also includes travel insurance, free long distance calls and complimentary towels and linens.<br><br>Please call or click today to choose from the largest selection of homes on the Island - from 1 to 7 bedrooms located on the beach or overlooking the Apalachicola Bay.
OLDCOMMENTS: If you can't imagine leaving your 'babies' behind when you go on vacation, then you've found the right place!  St. George Island is one of the rare beaches in Florida where pets are welcome.  This sparsely populated paradise offers wonderful opportunities for you and your special friends.  
Resort Vacation Properties caters to families with pets and offers over two hundred choices for your stay.   Many homes allow up to two of your 4-legged friends with no extra fee.<br>Located in Florida's Panhandle, we offer the largest selection of vacation rental homes, townhomes and villas from 1 to 8 bedrooms.  Our gorgeous white sand beaches are warm and un-crowded with plenty of public access.  They are easy to reach, whether you're staying in a beachfront home,  on  the pristine Apalachicola Bay or in-between.  The walking/bike path traverses the entire length of the island and is   accessible from almost all homes, so that you can enjoy casual strolls with Fido.  <br>For our 2-legged friends, assorted amenities abound in each home:  Private pools, wireless internet access, hot tubs and elevators along with multiple TVs, DVD or VCR players and a stereo in virtually every home. Each home offers complimentary linens already in place, free long distance calls and travel insurance is provided with each reservation.  For your added convenience, most homes feature keyless entry locks so you can bypass the Check-In Center, go straight to your home upon arrival on the island and immediately begin relaxing.   To request your free vacation planner, view our large selection of homes and make your reservation on line, please visit our website.<br><br>Fabulous fishing, birding, shelling, dining, stargazing, relaxing, playing, canoeing & kayaking, turtle walks, State Parks, a lighthouse, golf course, fresh seafood, fine dining, seafood festivals, art festivals, a stage theater, charter fishing, fresh water fishing, shore fishing, bridge fishing, boutique shopping, antique shopping, historic museums, military museums, Three Servicemen Statue, and if a quiet sunset is the reason for your stay, those are available every evening around dusk.<br><br>Low Season $580 - $5,525     Weekly<br>Mid Season $720 - $6,975     Weekly<br>High Season $995 - $10,475   Weekly<br><br>Stays less than a week are available as are monthly stays; please see our website. Rates are subject to State and County taxes and are subject to change without notice.  There are no additional fees charged by Resort Vacation Properties except optional selections such as use of an elevator or pool heat as requested.  Within 10 days of booking a home, payment of one half of the total rent is required to confirm your reservation and the balance is due 30 days prior to arrival.  We have several methods of payment.  By postal service, we accept your personal check, money order or cashier's check. Payment can be made on line with a "web check" which is a personal check submitted electronically through a secure site. We also accept Visa or Master Card on line with a convenience fee of $30.

TITLE: The Sea Pines Resort
ADDRESS: 32 Greenwood Drive
CITY: Hilton Head Island
MAJOR: 
STATE: SC
ZIP: 29928
PHONE: 866-561-8802
TOLLFREE: 800-SEAPINES
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
CITYCOMMENTS: Come stay at The Sea Pines Resort on Hilton Head Island, the perfect retreat for your family and four-legged friend.
BOOKCOMMENTS: Dogs up to 50 pounds are allowed in some of the 1, 2 and 3 bedroom villas. They are not allowed in any homes. There are pet fees starting at $100.00 and higher.
COMMENTS: <B>Pets are restricted to one pet, under 50 lbs in designated villas only. Please see complete pet policy below.</B><BR><BR>Hilton Head Island rules for Dogs! Your dog will love a getaway to Hilton Head Island, almost as much as you. The island offers over twelve miles of beach and is laced with fifty miles of paved trails for you to explore with your pet. The Sea Pines Resort also offers the 605-acre Sea Pines Forest Preserve - a dream come true for any dog. The eight miles of walking trails, open sunrise to sunset, are ideal for walking or jogging with your canine companion, just be sure to use a leash. You and your dog will never want to go home.<br><br>Don't leave your dog behind on your next vacation: come stay at The Sea Pines Resort, the perfect retreat for families and pets alike! Located on 5,000 oceanfront acres of Hilton Head Island, this luxury resort is bordered by the Atlantic Ocean and Calibogue Sound, offering breathtaking views. It is just 45 miles by car from Savannah, Georgia and is easily accessible by two area airports.<br><br>Beach - The Sea Pines Resort is lined by five miles of Atlantic Ocean beach, perfect for long walks, playing fetch with your pooch or basking in the sun. From October to March, the beaches on Hilton Head Island are free-range for dogs: no leashes required and no restrictions on day parts. In April and May (until Memorial Day) as well as in September (after Labor Day), dogs must be kept on a leash between the hours of 10:00am and 5:00pm, but are free to roam outside these hours. From Memorial Day to Labor Day, dogs are only allowed on the beach before 10:00am and after 5:00pm, but no leash is required.<br><br>Pet Policy - Pets are permitted in designated 1, 2, 3 and 4 bedroom villas. Pets are not allowed in homes. Pets are restricted to one pet, under 50 lbs. A non-refundable fee will be charged at the time of the reservation. This fee varies with size of villa: one bedroom fee - $100, two bedroom - $150, three bedroom - $175, four bedroom - $200. In addition, Accidental Property Damage Insurance must be purchased. The insurance fee will be charged at the time of reservation.<br><br>Accommodations - Ideal for families and those who want to bring along their furry friends, The Sea Pines Resort's villas are individually furnished and are available in 1, 2, 3 or 4 bedroom models. There are over eighty different pet-friendly villas from which to choose.<br><br>Golf Courses - The Sea Pines Resort offers three premier courses for an unforgettable golf vacation, including Harbour Town Golf Links, which was named one of the top 20 courses in the country by Golf Digest and Golf Weekly.<br><br>Tennis - The Sea Pines Resort Racquet Club has grown into a premier resource for tennis enthusiasts. All registered guests are given two complimentary hours each day on one of the 23 clay courts.<br><br>Outdoor Activities - The Sea Pines Resort offers two resort swimming pools, equestrian facilities, fitness center, boating and water sports at two marinas, and a supervised children's recreation program during summer and select holidays.<br><br>Shopping - More than 40 independently owned and operated boutiques are within minutes of The Sea Pines Resort at The Harbour Town Shops.<br><br>Dining - Whether you are looking for a hearty breakfast under the oaks, lunch at the beach, happy hour at the marina or a sunset dinner on the harbor, the diverse offerings at The Sea Pines Resort will excite and delight you.

CITYCOMMENTS: 2-Bdrm Beach House<br>1-Bdrm Guesthouse<br>Within two walking blocks of Swammi's Beach w/awesome ocean view  
COMMENTS: Located in the quaint village of Cardiff-by-the-Sea, "Angel Way" is a non-typical beach house (1500 sq ft) that has been updated but retains its cozy, ecletic '50's flavor.  There are two bedrooms, each with a queen bed, and a single sleeper in the den/reading room  accommodating  five people comfortably.  The bathroom has a tub as well as shower.  There is an abundance of streaming light from the numerous windows and skylights with  original hardwood floors and updated tile in kitchen and den.  <br>The hillside beach house is approximately two walking blocks (thru the garden and orchard) from world-famous Swammi's Beach and across the street from the huge organic vegggie gardens cultivated by the Self-Realization Center, which adds to the tranquil, uncrowded, private, safe surroundings and open unobstructed ocean view.  Angel Way is fully furnished, fully fenced and includes laundry facilities, cable tv, hi-speed internet and local telephone calling.  <br>Located on the same property but separate and private from the beach house is a one-bedroom (queen bed) Guesthouse (650 sq ft) with it's own unique '60's charm.  It is fully furnished with large kitchen, bathroom (shower only), large living room and a fenced yard and deck with an awesome (and affordable!) ocean view and ocean breezes.  The plentiful  tropical plants/hedges and the old  California Pepper Tree are a haven for visiting birds and butterflies.  <br>Walk to Swammi's Beach and many of the local eateries (60) and shops.  Local Farmers Markets on Wednesday, Saturday and Sunday.  Visit Seaside Bazaar on weekends and our favorite organic food outlets.....TraderJoe's, Henry's and Seaside Market. We provide beach gear such as chairs, towels, boogie boards and beach balls.  Scripps Hospital/Encinitas is approx.  one mile.<br>Cardiff is within close proximity to sister cities Carlsbad, Leucadia, Solona Beach, and Del Mar.  Easy day trips to Balboa Park, The San Diego Zoo, Sea World, Scripps/Birch Aquarium, Legoland and Wild Animal Park.  San Diego Airport is 20 miles to the south. Tijuana is 40 miles south.<br>Cardiff State Beach is dog-friendly (on leash) and Del Mar (3 miles) has an off-leash dog beach where dogs rule!!<br>If you are looking for a fun vacation in the best, most temperate climate  in California (70-degrees average year-round), bring your furry friends and stay with us!<br><br>*Summer Rates/Beach House:  $1250./wk plus $75. cleaning fee<br>*Summer Rates Guesthouse:   $900./wk plus $50. cleaning fee*<br>*Winter Rates/Beach House:  $950./wk plus $75. cleaning fee<br>*WinterRates/Guesthouse:  $800./wk plus $50. cleaning fee. <br>Pet fees:  $10./day for dog #1 and  #2.  3rd dog is free.<br><br>Daily as available  and Month-to-month transitional housing available off-season. TITLE: Rosebud Guest House
ADDRESS: Call to Arrange
CITY: Fruitland
MAJOR: 
STATE: UT
ZIP: 84027
PHONE: 435-548-2630
TOLLFREE: 866-618-7194
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: This B&B is located on 40 acres. It is pet-friendly, there are no weight limits for dogs. You may even bring a horse, mule, or llama and they have stalls.
COMMENTS: The Rosebud Guest House is a perfect place for travelers with dogs - for an overnight or a vacation stay! All dogs are absolutely free! No deposit, no charge, no weight limits! If you travel with horses, mules, llamas, or other small groups of livestock, they stay for free, too (although please bring your own feed). And the guest house is affordable for people - per night it's $50 for one, $10 for each additional adult, and $5 for children under 13. You can run your dog off-leash on miles of trails in the mountains on either side of the Red Creek Canyon where we're located. We're within easy driving distance of national forest lands, lakes, and rivers where dogs are welcome (and we can steer you away from the few places nearby where they're not). The Rosebud Guest House is on the Red Creek in Fruitland, UT (western Duchesne County), just 4 miles south of U.S. Highway 40 on the Lower Red Creek Road. We're under two hours from Salt Lake City, Provo, Price, Ogden, and Vernal. You'll breathe crystal clear air under clear skies.<br>The guest house can sleep up to 12 people (8 separate beds). It has a full kitchen with everything you need to prepare and serve meals - you just bring your food and drink. There's a full bath with shower and tub, plus a covered deck, BBQ grill, picnic table, and campfire ring. We're close to great fishing, hiking, mountain-biking, horse-riding trails, bird and wildlife watching, sight-seeing, golfing, boating, historical and archeological sites, and more.<br>As an added amenity, we own and operate Rosebud Llamas Utah and offer day hikes, training clinics, and other activities with llamas. The guest house is located on the premises. For something different during your stay, you may wish to take a catered day hike with llamas. Dogs can come along, too, as long as they're well-behaved with the llamas. Google Rosebud Llamas Utah for more information or follow a link from the guest house website. Please contact us for more information or to make a reservation (required).

TITLE: Arrowhead Pine Rose Cabins
ADDRESS: 25994 State Highway I89
CITY: Lake Arrowhead - Twin Peaks
MAJOR: Lake Arrowhead
STATE: CA
ZIP: 92319
PHONE: 909-337-2341
TOLLFREE: 
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: Dogs are allowed in the cabins for a $100 refundable deposit and a $10 per day pet fee. per pet.
COMMENTS: Arrowhead Pine Rose Cabins is a great getaway location for you and your dog. We are a truly unique property with 20 individual cabins of all sizes (sleeping 2 to 22) on 6 acres of pines with streams and ponds scattered through out. At Pine Rose you get the best of both worlds, a private cabin with its own kitchen and Bar-B-Que and a gift store / lobby were someone is always available to help you with any needs. Some of cabins even have dog runs and one with a log cabin dog house. We have pet mitt holders through out the acreage for your dogs? do-dos. We have a hiking trail, play areas and seasonal out door pool and year around outdoor spa.  Our staff will be more than happy to guide you to other places and hikes where you can take your dog. When you book with us, a make sure you tell us that you would like a pet friendly cabin, (we keep some of cabins free of pets for our guests with allergies) Pine Rose is in Twin Peaks which is part of Lake Arrowhead. We are centrally located 31/2 miles to Lake Arrowhead and 3 miles to Lake Gregory which offer a lovely trail around the lake which is pet friendly. We love your well behaved pets at Pine Rose. In order to make sure you and your pet have a great stay we have some policies that need to be followed.<br>We require a refundable $100 security deposit (as long as there is no damage to the cabin) for each pet and a $10 per day pet fee.<br>1.	All pets must remain on leash outside of cabin.<br>2.	Pets are never to be left alone in cabin. If you must leave your pet in the please ask about pet setters.( Pets get scared when their owners leave them alone in unfamiliar surroundings)<br>3.	Pets that bark excessive and disturb the other cabins will be asked to leave.<br>4.	Pet owners are responsible for picking up all pet do-dos (we have pet mitts located around property)<br>5.	Pets are not allowed on furniture, beds or sofas (if your pet likes to sleep on sofas we ask you to bring blankets to cover the furniture). You will be charged for pet hair found on furniture.<br>6.	We recommend you bring towels for pets with messy paws. Dogs really love our ponds and creeks. The towels in the cabin are for people guests only. If you forget pet towels or pet blankets we have some we can supply at a small fee.

COMMENTS: This beautiful home in Wolcott, Colorado is just 20 minutes from world class ski resorts Beaver Creek and Vail, has outstanding mountain views and sits on 35 acres in a private gated community.  The home is over 4000 sq. feet and has an extremely large living room with floor to ceiling windows. There is a gourmet kitchen, with wet bar and stool seating as well as a dining table that seats 8.  Off of the living room, there is a library with a pullout couch, flat screen tv, vcr/dvd player and high speed internet hookup.  The master bedroom has a queen bed and full bath.  The second bedroom has a queen bed, cable TV and a full bath.  The downstairs bedroom is very large and has two twin beds, a double futon and window seat bedding that is perfect for children. There is a 2 car garage + plenty of outdoor parking at the house.  Dogs of all sizes welcome. There is a $10.00 daily fee for the first pet and a $25.00 daily fee for the second pet. Limit of 40lbs per pet and a limit of two pets per room maximum. There is also a $50.00 CASH DEPOSIT at check-in PER PET which will be returned at check-out after the room is inspected. <br><br>For longer staying guest the Max Fee for the first pet is $150.00 dollars and the max fee for the second pet in $375.00 dollars.<br><br>Bay Palms Waterfront Resort has NO SURPRISING RESORT FEES, unlike many others on the beach. Also, you can be assured that the rate you are quoted on our website is guaranteed to be the best price on the beach and you receive the following AT NO EXTRA CHARGE FREE Parking (One space per room) FREE Wireless High-Speed Internet Access in All Rooms and Pool Area FREE Large Heated Pool overlooking the intercostals waterwayFREE Pool Towels<br>FREE Coffee in the mornings in our lobby<br>FREE Baby Cribs Available<br>FREE Rollaway Beds Available<br>FREE use of Large Private Fishing Pier<br><br>IN YOUR ROOM YOU WILL ALSO GET<br>Hotel Rooms: Refrigerator, Microwave, Coffee Pot, Toaster, Dishes, Glassware and Silverware.<br>Deluxe Efficiency: Refrigerator, Microwave, Cook-top with all utensils, pots and pans, Coffee Pot, Toaster, Dishes, Glassware and Silverware.<br>One Bedroom: Refrigerator, Microwave, Cook-top with all utensils, pots and pans, Coffee Pot, Toaster, Dishes, Glassware and Silverware.<br>Deluxe One Bedroom: Refrigerator, Microwave, Cook -top with all utensils, pots and pans, Coffee Pot, Toaster, Dishes, Glassware and Silverware.<br>Deluxe Two Bedrooms: Refrigerator, Microwave, Cook -top with all utensils, pots and pans, Coffee Pot, Toaster, Dishes, Glassware and Silverware.<br><br>All rooms have Iron & Ironing board, Hair Dryer, Phone with Data-Port and Voicemail and free Local Telephone Calls, Flat Screen Television with 76 channel cable.<br><br>OTHER AMENITIES AVAILABLE TO YOU<br>FREE Mini-Golf / Shuffleboard / Foosball Table<br>FREE Human Size Chess Field / Checkers Field<br>FREE Beachside BBQ - Gas Grill<br>FREE Beach Cabanas<br>Internet Caf<br>Onsite Laundry Facilities<br>Boat Slips available<br><br>In walking distance to grocery store, Walgreens, CVS, Dollar Tree, fantastic beach night spots and 18 restaurants.

COMMENTS: Spacious 30 acre Civil War farm on the Gettysburg Battlefield behind Big Round Top. You will find plenty of room for your dog to romp. Eight guest-rooms welcome dogs of all sizes. <BR><BR>At 8 AM, a Civil War historian will entertain you with a hand-on presentation about the Battle of Gettysburg and the Civil War. After the history program, you will enjoy a delicious hot breakfast with a breakfast entree, breakfast meat, potatoes, fruit, baked goods, orange juice, and coffee or tea. Friday nights, you can enjoy Ghost Stories in the parlor. <BR><BR>You will be staying on the south edge of the Gettysburg National Military Park in an original Civil War farmhouse that has been modernized for the most fastidious traveler. The building witnessed the battle of Gettysburg. There is history, comfort, and fun inside the old stone walls. Have a home baked cookie and a cup of tea to unwind and relax when you arrive. Your hosts will happily help you plan your visit to Gettysburg. There is so much to see that an overnight will only give you a taste of the town and National Park.<BR><BR>We request that the dogs be leashed inside the building. Outside, use your discretion, but keep in mind that you are sharing the property with resident farm animals and barn cats.

All of Barefoots premier golf courses were designed by four of the top golf course designers of the world. The Greg Norman, Davis Love III, Pete Dye, and Tom Fazio courses offer unique, visually striking, and fun to play courses. This is why Golf Digest rated the Barefoot Resort and Golf one of the best places to play.<br><br>Looking for shopping and restaurants? Look no further!! Broadway at the Beach, Grand Coastal Mall, and Tanger Outlets are all close by! Enjoy fine dining at exclusive restaurants such as Thoroughbreds Steak House & Greg Norman Grille, casual dining at Outback, Olive Garden, TGI Fridays, Brentwood, T Bonz, and Chucks Steakhouse. Whatever your taste, you will find something for everyone.<br><br>Looking for a vacation to remember! CONTACT US TODAY!!!! We would be delighted to answer any and all questions promptly. <br><br>NO SMOKING PLEASE.<br><br>Apr 03 - Jun 05 .. $650/wk.<br>Jun 05 - Jun 26 .. $899/wk. Saturday - Saturday Only<br>Jun 26 - Jly 31 .. $1,099/wk. Saturday - Saturday Only<br>Jly 31 - Aug 14 .. $799/wk. Saturday - Saturday Only<br>Aug 14 - Sep 11 .. $699/wk. COMMENTS: Pets Welcome, People Accepted!<br><br>To Our Pet Guests<br><br>At The Country View, Motel & Guesthouse, we understand how wonderful it is to bring the family pet on vacation. Your credit card will be charged any additional charges. Valid credit card information and a signed copy of our Expectations From Pet Owners is required upon check in. If your pet is noisy and disturbing to other guests, you may be asked to leave and find alternate accommodations. You will be responsible for any charges that apply. Charges may include, but are not limited to: two night minimum and pet damage charges.Pets should not be washed in the rooms or bathrooms, a hose is provided in the Pet Park area.

COMMENTS: The Hilton Longboat Key Beachfront Resort hotel in Longboat Key sits nestled beneath ancient Banyan trees along the Florida Gulf Coast. Known for the daily visits from the Bottled-Nose Dolphins and our resident wading birds, hotel guests find themselves surrounded by nature in one of the most pristine island destinations of Florida. Miles of powder white sand border the aqua-blue waters of the Gulf and breathtaking sunsets stir the soul.<br><br>From the moment our hotel guests enter any of the 102 newly renovated Longboat Key resort hotel rooms and suites at the Hilton Longboat Key Beachfront Resort hotel, they are swept with a sense of serenity with views of the Gulf, pool or garden outside private balconies and patios. Hilton Longboat Key Beachfront Resort offers a boutique hotel experience with beachside amenities. We offer guest rooms, suites, accessible rooms and welcome your dogs 75 lbs. or less to stay for a one-time fee of $75. <br><br>At our Longboat Key, Florida resort, guests can enjoy a swim in the shimmering beachfront pool, or a variety of ocean sports right on the beach, such as kayaking, wave runners and catamarans.<br><br>Located on a beautiful barrier island on the West Coast of Florida, Hilton Longboat Key hotel is just 12 miles from Sarasota and the Sarasota-Bradenton International Airport. Sarasota is one of the finest cultural centers of Florida, offering a variety of museums and cultural attractions including:<br><br>* The South Florida Museum<br>* The Van Wezel Preforming Arts Hall<br>* Florida West Coast Symphony<br>* Sarasota Ballet of Florida<br>* The Asolo Repertory Theater<br>* The Ringling Museum<br>* Mote Marine Aquarium<br>* Marie Selby Botanical Gardens<br>* St. Armand's Circle <br><br>4711 Gulf of Mexico Drive <br>Longboat Key, Florida<br>United States 34228<br>Tel: 1-941-383-2451<br>Fax: 1-941-383-7979

BOOKCOMMENTS: This pet-friendly hotel in downtown Savannah welcomes pets with a number of amenities.
COMMENTS: THUNDERBIRD INN, DOWNTOWN HISTORIC SAVANNAH GA!<br><br>THIS PET FRIENDLY SAVANNAH HOTEL LOVES DOGS!  At Thunderbird Inn's pet-friendly Savannah hotel-motel / retro inn, a red heart dog tag says it simply: "Thunderbird Inn Loves Me".<br><br>The pet-friendly Savannah inn commissioned "Dog Days in Savannah" a pet-friendly Savannah pet friendly Savannah Georgia travel video.  The fun-loving Savannah pet-friendly hotel wants to convey that pet lovers may bring their well-behaved dog or cat and find a friendly welcome at The Thunderbird Inn in the downtown Savannah historic district. The YOUTUBE.com link is here ->  <a href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gSo-pqeuhYc" target="_blank">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gSo-pqeuhYc</a><br><br>Abundant Savannah pet-friendly amenities are provided to pet owners for the well-supervised dog or cat:  <br>.       Custom Thunderbird Inn pet bed<br>.       Stainless steel dishes and mat<br>.       Bottled spring water<br>.       Complimentary pet treats in the lobby<br>.       Complimentary extra "Doggie Poo Bags"<br>.       Maps of downtown Savannah, with designated pet-friendly restaurants, cafes and comfort areas <br>Additionally, the Savannah hotel's pet-friendly staff will orient pet travelers to local Savannah pet etiquette when walking about in the downtown, and provide pet cleanup bags to pet owners.<br><br>PET-FRIENDLY SAVANNAH HOTEL'S INVIATION TO RESPONSIBLE PET OWNERS<br>Fun-loving Savannah pet-friendly lodging at Thunderbird Inn in the downtown Savannah historic district is an invitation to responsible pet owners and happy pets. The downtown Savannah inn's open door welcome to family pets on vacation also requires an equal commitment by pet owners.   The Savannah hotel's pet-friendly requirements are outlined in a Domestic Pet Welcome that includes: <br>- a modest pet deposit <br>- a contract signed by the pet owner<br>- proof of up-to-date vaccines.   <br><br>Pet lodging stipulations keep the 42-room inn a welcoming place for all guests -- <br>.       Pets are not permitted on the bed coverings or other furniture.<br>.       Pets must be crated when human guests leave the room.<br>.       Owners must prevent pets from barking or otherwise disturbing other guests.<br>.       All dogs must be on a leash at all times while in the hotel public areas; likewise, cats must be constrained at all times.<br>.       Only stranger-friendly pets are permitted in the inn's lobby with their owner.<br>For more information about this Savannah hotel's pet-friendly / dog-friendly lodging, please contact Thunderbird Inn in downtown Savannah -  611 West Oglethorpe Avenue, Savannah, GA USA 31401. Toll Free Reservations (866) 324-2661; International +1/912-232-2661; Fax 912-233-5551. Twitter:@TBirdInn; E-mail info@thethunderbirdinn.com;<br>Web:TheThunderbirdInn.com<a href="http://www.dogfriendly.com/servlet/refer?from=pageGA&dest=http://www.thethunderbirdinn.com" target="_blank">Web:TheThunderbirdInn.com</a>

COMMENTS: Topsail Realty offers the finest North Carolina family vacation rentals in Surf City and Topsail Beach on southern Topsail Island, North Carolina. For more than three decades, Topsail Realty has offered a variety of Topsail Island vacation rentals, from large family rentals to smaller cottages for quiet getaways. Topsail Realty also offers a large selection of Surf City and Topsail Beach pet-friendly rentals so you and your canine friends can enjoy your vacation together! Experience the wondrous sights of sunrises over the Atlantic Ocean and gorgeous sunsets over Topsail Sound and the Intracoastal Waterway. Shop in the delightful small shops and eat at the excellent restaurants in Topsail Beach and Surf City.  Don't forget to bring a camera to take pictures of your family relaxing and playing together with your canine companions.<br><br>Individual house descriptions indicate if dogs are allowed and if so, the number of dogs allowed, any size limitations, and the pet rent required. Dogs must be over 12 months old, friendly, housebroken, flea free, and should be on a monthly flea preventative program. Birds, cats, and all other pets are prohibited.  View our pet policies for details and other important safety information you may need when bringing your best friends to the beach: <a href="http://www.topsail-realty.com/pet-policy.htm" target="_blank">http://www.topsail-realty.com/pet-policy.htm</a>.

BOOKCOMMENTS: This vacation rental duplex is located next to Ocean Beach and near the dog beach at Ocean Beach. There are no additional pet fees.
COMMENTS: Treat your dog to a beach vacation in the dog-friendliest neighborhood on the West Coast.  This apartment is located directly across from the entrance to oceanfront dog beach and oceanvillainn.com. This back unit of duplex has one rare reserved off-street parking space - important at this beach! Interior is approx. 400 sq ft and patio approx. 200 sq ft.<br>There's a full kitchen, living room w/ queen Murphy bed (tempurpedic mattress)& tv/dvd, and small den/bedroom/ with sofa chair that folds into single bed and a tv/dvd. All is tiled and pet friendly. Internet is free (old laptop may be available upon request). Sliding glass doors open into private, fenced patio which has gazebo, electric bbq, dining table , kennel and dogwash. There are also beach supplies incl. chairs, towels, cooler, umbrella & boogie boards.<br>Dog Beach is open to canines any time., any dog, 24/7  This beach has waves for dogs to run through and they have access to the large area of low sand dunes that extends back along the San Diego River. Here, pets are not only allowed on the beach, but encouraged to come anytime, cast off their leash and run amok with all their pals. After work, or anytime on the weekend, you'll find upward of 100 specimens, big and small, young and old, all frisking and fetching.<br>Ocean Beach i.e.. OB, as it is referred to by the locals, is popular amongst surfers, hippies, free spirits, beach-goers, and antique lovers. The main drag on Newport offers restaurants, smoke shops, surf huts, and a variety of antique stores, as well as a weekly Farmer's Market on Wednesday nights. Dog lovers are also drawn to OB because of its leash-free dog beach and the many establishments welcoming dogs. They're everywhere!
In addition, the OB Pier has been a San Diego attraction ever since it was built in 1966. Some sources say it is the longest concrete pier on the West Coast, and others argue that it is the longest in the world -it has it's own cafe and features great fishing w/o permit needed.Enjoy the tidepools next to pier as well.<br><br>Rental Rates for this vacation apartment rental in Ocean Beach, California<br>Additional information about rental rates<br>- no cleaning fee if left in good condition. No dog surcharges.<br>- Rates are $2500 monthly, $750 weekly or $125/nightly with 3 day minimum stay. No cleaning fee if left in good condition.No extra dog fees. 10.5 % city room tax if less than 30day stay; $250 refundable security deposit    Payment by Visa/MasterCard  Deposit and return of the rental agreement is required upon booking. Rates are subject to change without notice until confirmed.

Our elegant guestrooms are appointed with an luxurious Grand bed, comprised of Sealy 700-plush mattresses, down duvet comforters, pillows, and featherbeds.<br><br>The only downtown Boston hotel to receive the EPA's 2010 ENERGY STAR certification, Hyatt Regency Boston is committed to being a Green hotel.  Along with receive the ENERGY STAR, the property has received the EPA's Merit Award and has been nominated for Mayor Thomas M. Menino's Second Annual Green Business Awards.  Initiatives such as recycling products, cooling machinery with air instead of water, offering incentives to host Green Meetings and much more. Hyatt Regency Boston is taking every step to continue our growth as a Green Building.<br><br>At Hyatt Regency Boston we are noted for our outstanding facilities such as our 24-hour Business Center, Avenue One Restaurant and the Lafayette Lounge.  Our 24-hour fitness center features state of the art cardiovascular machines, a eucalyptus steam room, saunas, outdoor sun terrace, massage therapy and the largest indoor hotel pool in Boston. <br><br>Fresh twists, unique architecture and inspired dcor create a luxurious ambiance for the perfect getaway. This distinctive, award-winning hotel is ideally positioned for business and leisure travel. With creative cuisine, deluxe accommodations and a pet-friendly attitude, Hyatt Regency Boston is the perfect choice for your Boston hotel.

ZIP: 49684

TOLLFREE: 800-901-8922

BOOKCOMMENTS: This vacation rental company offers a number of pet-friendly vacation rentals in the Traverse City area. Pet fees are $49 to $125 per stay depending on the length of the stay.
COMMENTS: Quaint towns, beautiful lakes, sprawling beaches, and activities for all ages. All of these great attractions can be found in Traverse City, Michigan and its surrounding areas.<br><br>Visit Up North Vacation Rentals offers over 130 homes, cottages, or condos throughout beautiful Northwest Michigan. About 45 of those are pet-friendly and welcome you to bring along your four-legged family members!  We specialize in finding people their perfect place to stay while they are in this beautiful area.  This area boasts so many wonderful things to do, it is nice to have a home base to return to at the end of the day.  Beaches, golf, hiking, biking, wineries, skiing, great restaurants (Traverse City was named one of the Top 5 Foodie Towns by Bon Appetit magazine), and so much more. We at Visit Up North will help you find a rental property near the activities you and your pet want to enjoy.<br><br>The 'little finger' of Michigan is treasured by many as one of the most beautiful places in the United States.  Once you visit the area, you are most likely to come back year after year.  The natural beauty in this area is unparalleled.  From the crashing shores of Lake Michigan, to serene inland lakes, to the massive Sleeping Bear Dunes, to the acres of farms and vineyards, you do not want to forget your camera when visiting. Possibly the best part of this area, is that every location is equally attractive. Wherever you are, you are within 30 miles of another great destination.  Each town offers dozens of unique shops, great restaurants, and blocks to roam.  You will be amazed at how clear the lakes are and how clean the air is!  <br><br>At our pet-friendly properties, there is a $125 non-refundable pet fee for stays that are 7 nights or more.  $49 is charged for stays less than a week.  We ask that you clean up all dog waste, bring along something to cover the furniture/beds if your dog is normally allowed on them, preferably crate the dog if they are left in the property unattended, and keep barking at a minimum (preferably NO barking). If your dog is a 'flight risk' please keep them on a leash when outside.  Dogs should not venture into neighbors' yards.  For specific pet policies, please contact Visit Up North.<br>We are open all year long and can help you plan a vacation during any season. We look forward to hearing from you.

The fence has been built with 18 inches of wire dug underneath to provide a safe environment for pets that like to dig and to stop wildlife from digging in.  Even though it has a six foot fence we recommend all small dogs be watched as there have been coyotes spotted in the National Forest.  There is also a dog room which is accessible through the garage and home.   This room allows the owners to have the peace of mind their loved ones have a place to do 'their business' while they are out on the slopes.  With pebble rocks on the floor, wood walls on the sides and ceiling plus a sliding glass door to the yard it keeps your dogout of the snow and heat with the feeling of being outside. COMMENTS: The York Harbor Inn is centrally located in Northern New England just one hour north of Boston, Massachusetts and 45 minutes south of Portland Maine. New York City is a 5 hour drive to the south. The inn overlooks the Atlantic Ocean and the entrance to York Harbor. York Harbor Beach is just steps away from the front door. A short drive on Coastal Rte. 1A is the famous Nubble Lighthouse, one of the most photographed lighthouses in the country. Scenic Portsmouth, NH and Ogunquit, Maine are close by. The historical town of York Harbor is small, quaint and picturesque- a wonderful example of a coastal New England village.<br><br>The Inn offers 54 individually decorated guestrooms, complete with T.V., A/C, private baths, complimentary continental breakfast and Wi-Fi.  Man y of our guestrooms feature ocean views, decks, king 4 poster beds, whirlpool Jacuzzi tubs, and fireplaces. Our ocean view Restaurant and Pub are open year round with live entertainment. Banquet and Meeting Facilities are also available. The historical town of York Harbor is small, quaint and picturesque- a wonderful example of a coastal New England village.<br><br>To make your pet feel at home away from home, we supply blankets, food and water bowls, trash bags, walking maps, treats, and lists of pet friendly beaches in our area.<br><br>Please read our pet policy below, for the safety and comfort of all our guests, human and animal:<br><br>Pet Policy-<br>-	Dogs only are allowed at the Inn. <br>-	All pets must be declared at check in. <br>-	Please provide us with your pet's name, and any special information about your pet for your registration card. <br>-	Pets are not to be left unattended in guest rooms. <br>-	Pets can't be bathed in your guestroom bathroom.<br>-	Excessive barking, or disturbing other guests is not tolerated. <br>-	If a pet is left unattended the guest's room will not be cleaned or serviced for the safety of the pet and our employees.  <br>-	Pets are not allowed in public areas of the hotel, including restaurants, and sitting areas. Service dogs are allowed. <br>-	Guests are responsible for picking up after their pet in and around the hotel. <br>-	All pets must be on a controllable leash at all times when outside guest's room. <br>-	We request a cell phone number in case of emergency.<br>-	If there is any damage to the room from the pet the owner/guest in the room will be held monetarily responsible.<br>-	Pet friendly guest rooms are only available in our Harbor Crest Building.<br>-	As a pet owner please be considerate of our property and other guests, andfollow our pet policies to ensure smooth worry free stay. <br><br>For your pet's comfort and convenience we can arrange for pet sitters.  Please check out our website or call our front desk for more details.

COMMENTS: Welcome to one of the most naturally spectacular and elegant Gulf-front resort communities anywhere in the world - Located on the quite west end of Panama City Beach, Carillon Beach Resort is 2 miles from Rosemary Beach, Fl and 4 miles from Pier Park Panama City Beach. The harmonious back drop of the sea, sand and sun combined with lush natural surrounding and the old world charm architecture offers a unique opportunity for a wonderful life style; for a day Week, month or for the rest of your life. Carillon is designed to provide a Luxurious modern retreat with the entire creature comforts one would expect in an exclusive resort community.<br><br>CARILLON is a true haven for the discerning short-term traveler or second home weekly experiences. It is truly a special safe environment for those who make Carillon their Home away from Home.<br><br>Proximity to beach/beach services: A short walk 300 yards around the Private lake or a two-minute Free dune buggy ride to the Beach and the  Beach front swimming pool. The beach umbrellas and chairs available for a nominal charge, along with the 24-hour Health club. The Four Swimming Pools (1) heated), two (2) Jacuzzis, two (2) Tennis courts, bicycles, kayaks, Paddle boats and children's playground are provided for with the resort fee. Walking trails are all over our resort community.<br><br>The condos have a view of the Carillon Private Lake and some have a limited view the Gulf of Mexico from a private balcony. All Condos in the Inn have King size beds, a queen sofa sleeper in the living room, Two flat screen TVs with over 50 channels, play station, hard wired free internet service, in-room personal safes, and fully equipped kitchens. The Premiere Corner Condos have fireplaces (gas) for those cozy fall and winter nights.<br><br>This upscale CONDO/hotel offers a number of on site amenities for business and leisure travelers, plus a convenient location to the beach, shopping, dining, and entertainment areas. Dog pets are invited for an additional pet fee of $75 per room per week. Sorry we only have a limited number of pet-friendly rooms available on the first and fourth floors.<br><br>When making an online reservation, type the following in the Comments section on the Guest Information Page of the registration form: "I am bringing my dog (Best Friend)." See pet policy for more details.

COMMENTS: Escape to the relaxing Spruce Point Inn Resort & Spa, a spectacular seaside retreat situated on 57 acres of shoreline fringed with tall spruce woodland. Recognized as one of the best family resorts in Maine, our historic vacation destination offers a variety of accommodations: 56 modern guestrooms in 8 traditional lodges, 16 classic cottage rooms, 9 guestrooms and suites in the historic Main Inn and 4 townhouses.  Whether you choose sailing, golf, hiking, beachcombing or one of the many nearby scenic attractions, you are sure to create new and lasting memories with every stay. The Inn offers a variety of dining options showcasing locally grown, fished and farmed selections and a talented chef who captures the quintessential taste of Maine.Located less than an hour drive 'down east ' from Portland to seafaring Boothbay Harbor,  Spruce Point Inn is a true gem among Maine resorts. For more than 100 years, the inn has attracted travelers from across the United States and has provided a refreshing backdrop for families and friends to create delightful memories. Along a stunning stretch of oceanfront on Maine's rugged coast, the Spruce Point Inn is the premier Maine family resort and an ideal venue for a romantic getaway or for memorable reunions, seaside weddings and business retreats.<br><br>Pet Policy<br>We accept pets. No fee. No weight restriction. Leash law in Boothbay Harbor. Limit 2 pets.<br><br>Amenities include: boutique full-service spa, saltwater and heated freshwater pools, three hot tubs, recreation hall, two championship Har-Tru clay tennis courts and fitness room with pilates and yoga.

COMMENTS: Family owned and operated, The Boat House is a quaint little place tucked away in Olde Florida. The Boat House Motel has one very unique feature - a house built over the Marco River, with a wrap-around deck perfect for fishing, sight-seeing and sunbathing. The Motel consists of twenty units. We offer two Waterfront Rooms of the picturesque Marco River, one Studio Room with a kitchen and Queen Bed, and all other rooms include a king or queen size bed. In this quiet and peaceful environment you will enjoy nature at its best while being close to "civilization". We are committed to preserve the charm of "Olde Marco". <br><br>Make use of our boat slips, cast a line from our dock and watch the dolphins, manatees and fishes on the Marco River or within minutes, sail away to the blue waters of the Gulf of Mexico. The Boat House will bring you back to a time when life was simple, when outstanding sunsets were the highlight of your day. Whether you stay with us for a day, a week or a month, you will be refreshed and ready to get back to society just long enough to start planning your next stay at The Boat House. We have even reserved some rooms where your pets will feel right at home and welcomed. <br><br>Our dedicated staff are ready, willing, and able to make your stay on Marco Island a true pleasure. We look forward to serving you! <br><br>Dog Friendly Rooms are the lower level King Rooms! Thank you and we look foward to seeing you.

TITLE: Seahorse Guest Cottage
ADDRESS: 8811 Dayton Avenue
CITY: North Beach
MAJOR: 
STATE: MD
ZIP: 20714
PHONE: 410-610-9322
TOLLFREE: 
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: This pet-friendly rental on the Chesapeake Bay hosts a fenced yard and is within easy walking distance to quaint shops and restaurants.
COMMENTS: The Seahorse Guest Cottage is located in North Beach, Maryland, on the western shore of the Chesapeake Bay, within an hour's drive of Washington, Baltimore, and Annapolis.  Recently renovated with new kitchen and bathroom, the fully furnished cottage has a living room with sofabed, bedroom with queen size bed, front sunporch with day bed, a full kitchen, and a backyard deck with grill. The Seahorse Guest Cottage sits on a quiet street within walking distance to the Chesapeake Bay and the North Beach town boardwalk, beach and pier.  Additionally located within easy walking distance are several restaurants and quaint shops.  A marina with boat launch, a waterpark, and a shopping center are within one mile of the cottage.  There are close-by opportunities for charter fishing, kayaking, hiking, fossil hunting, bicycling, and bird watching.  A weekday commuter bus provides service into Washington, and a seasonal trolley bus runs through town from Memorial Day through Labor Day weekend (rides are 25 cents). The Seahorse Guest Cottage has a fenced yard and is dog-friendly.  The cottage is an ideal and inspirational place for artists, musicians, and writers, with a separate north light studio located behind the cottage. The town of North Beach is an incorporated community of about 1800 residents.  Originally platted in 1900, it was once referred as "Washington's Salt Water Resort," and was accessible to Washington, D.C. by railroad and streetcar.  Today the town is experiencing a substantial revival, with old homes restored and new homes constructed.

COMMENTS: Likely Place Golf Course and Resort is a beautiful full service resort with a wide range of recreational activities. This 520 acre property has a Championship 6900 yard golf course, 55 RV sites, 10 tent sites, 3 bedroom villa rental on the 10th fairway, restaurant, geocache course, nature trail, and 3.5 mile walking or biking trail. Please don't allow them to chase the wildlife. Dogs are also allowed to swim in the many ponds on the property. If people are fishing please don't swim your dog in that pond. Barking dogs are NOT allowed. Additional recreational opportunities include the Modoc National Forest and the Warner Mountain Wilderness. Both are close by and provide unlimited hiking and fishing.

SMALLDOGS: TRUE
BOOKCOMMENTS: Well-mannered, vaccinated dogs up to 30 pounds are allowed with a non-refundable pet fee of $75 per stay.  No more than two pets may occupy a guest room.
COMMENTS: Sitting on the shores of the Atlantic Ocean, Delray Beach Marriott offers a dog-friendly Mediterranean-style oasis in the tranquil seaside village of Delray Beach, Florida.  Situated on the corner of Ocean Blvd and famed Atlantic Avenue, the hotel is minutes away from local boutiques, antique shops, art galleries, fine restaurants and outdoor cafes.  Plus, the area offers more than 20 dog-friendly restaurants, boutiques, and shops within walking distance, making it easy to find something for everyone to enjoy.<br><br>Families can escape to comfortable and spacious accommodations with private balconies and stunning views of the Atlantic Ocean. Enjoy locally inspired Florida cuisine with delicious on-site dining options including; Seacrest Grill, Cascades Pool Bar and Restaurant  & O'Grady's Lobby Lounge.  This Seaside escape provides endless amenities including a full service Spa, resort style pool, fitness center and beach access. Delray Beach Marriott has everything you need for an unforgettable stay.<br><br>Well-mannered, vaccinated dogs up to 30 pounds are allowed with a non-refundable pet fee of $75.00 per stay. No more than two dogs may occupy a guest room.
OLDCOMMENTS: The Marriott Delray Beach overlooks the Atlantic Ocean and is situated on the corner of A1A (Ocean Blvd.) and famed Atlantic Avenue, featuring boutiques, antique shops, art galleries, fine restaurants, and outdoor cafes.<br><br>Several dining options are available including our Seacrest Grill which offers a delightful blend of Caribbean and local flavors in a tropical setting, O'Grady's Lobby Lounge which serves a light menu and dinner favorites, and Cascades Pool Bar & Restaurant which features a light menu & tropical beverages.<br><br>Recreational services include a tropical outdoor pool, jacuzzi, fitness center and the full service N Spa. Beach, water sports, golf, tennis and a jogging trail are all nearby.<br><br>Well-mannered, vaccinated dogs up to 30 pounds are allowed with a non-refundable pet fee of $125.00 per stay. No more than two pets may occupy a guest room.

We regret that pets are not allowed in the hotel's restaurants, the Bar, the Fitness Center and Spa, the Pool Areas or The Ritz Carlton Club Level lounge. This exclusion does not apply to guide or service animals.

TITLE: Mysty Mountain Properties
ADDRESS: Call to arrange
CITY: Stevens Pass
MAJOR: 
STATE: WA
ZIP: 
PHONE: 206-219-6427
TOLLFREE: 
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: These vacation rental properties allow pets for a $15 per night or $50 per week additional pet fee.
COMMENTS: Mysty Mountain Properties offers a wide variety of pet friendly accommodations. From romantic and cozy cabins for two, to luxurious lodges for large groups, we're certain to have the perfect place for your mountain getaway. You and your furry friends will enjoy settings that include riverfront or water access, private acreage, and view- all while being centrally located for all the area's best activities. All our homes are fully furnished and equipped with an outdoor grill, satellite TV or a DVD library, linens and towels. Most properties also offer a private hot tub, Wi-Fi internet, outdoor fire pit and a fireplace or wood stove.<br><br>Stevens Pass is a popular area for outdoor recreation, many that are suitable for pets, but you are also welcome to leave them crated in the cabin if needed. Summer activities include hiking, fishing, white water rafting, downhill biking, ORV trails and horseback riding. Winter activities include snow sports at Stevens Pass ski area (10-30 minutes from most of our cabins), snow shoeing, cross country skiing, snow mobile trails, hiking and winter season fishing. <br><br>Pets are allowed at our cabins for just $15/night or $50/week. We have NO SIZE RESTRICTIONS, and are flexible with the number of pets (depending on the property). <br><br>Rules: We ask that the pets be kept off the furniture and bedding, and that pet hair is cleaned up as best as possible. All waste must be picked up and placed in the outside garbage cans tied securely in trash bags. No pets in the hot tub or bath tub. Pets should not be left unattended in cabin unless they are crated. Guest assumes full responsibility for any damage caused by pet to be charged to credit card on file.<br><br>We understand the importance of including our four legged and feathered friends on vacations, and look forward to helping you find the ideal place for everyone to relax and unwind.

ZIP: 93108
PHONE: 805-689-9182
TOLLFREE: 
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: Dogs are allowed in this vacation rental near Santa Barbara. There is a security deposit for pets.
COMMENTS: Step through the gates of Spring House and you will be welcomed by a serene fountain and Zen statuary. Enjoy secluded privacy in a lush tropical setting. Step outside the gates and you are a mere 5 minute walk from Butterfly Beach - the most beautiful beach in Santa Barbara, the historic Four Seasons Biltmore Hotel and Spa, and Coast Village Road - the exclusive heart of Montecito with a wide variety of dining options, boutiques and gift shops, and business and banking services. Enjoy that vacation cocktail without the worry of driving home! The unique layout of Spring House with two kitchens allows maximum flexibility for multiple families or families traveling with a nanny. The yard is fully enclosed and you may let your dog roam outside in complete confidence. The house contains 4bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, a Jacuzzi and sauna, 4 fountains, outdoor eating areas, gas BBQ, blow-dryers, iron and ironing board, toiletries, paper goods, all linens, bicycles, a beach wagon, sand toys, boogie boards, telephone, 4 flat-screens, 3 fireplaces, a computer, wireless internet, iPod docking stations, movies, books, games, and puzzles. Spring House exceeds customary expectations, and is a luxury experience from original art to thread count to Viking appliances.&#8232;Dogs must be clean, thoroughly brushed, and well mannered (that means house-broken!), neutered or spayed, on a flea control program, weigh no more than 30 pounds, and be a non-shedding breed. Please leave your big, shedding dogs at home. We have a lovely yard but it is not big enough to exercise a large dog, and the local beach does not allow dogs. Of course, if you bring a smaller dog you will find a list of dog friendly beaches at the house. Do not leave your dog alone in the house or yard. Lonely and bored dogs bark, dig and scratch on the doors. If we get a complaint about barking from one of our neighbors, your deposit will go to the neighbor. We will be happy to provide you with the names of reputable dog sitters, and will gladly make those arrangements for you if you prefer. Please be candid with us about your pet and we will try to work with you. You will find a pooper-scooper and duty bags on the premises, as well as Nature's Miracle and plenty of cleaning rags. Guests with dogs can expect all area rugs to be rolled up and stashed in a closet. In some of the bedrooms, quilts or duvet covers will be replaced with less costly and more durable bed furnishings. And please, do not let the dogs up on the furniture. $500 to $650/night with a 5 night minimum. $300 Cleaning Fee. $500 Security Deposit. 10% Occupancy Tax.

TITLE: Paradise Bay Resort
ADDRESS: 47-039 Lihikai Drive
CITY: Kaneohe
MAJOR: Oahu
STATE: HI
ZIP: 96744
PHONE: 808-239-5711
TOLLFREE: 800-735-5071
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: This resort has pet-friendly rooms from studios to 5 bedroom suites.
COMMENTS: Visit Paradise, the ultimate true Hawaii vacation experience. In paradise we treat everyone like family, especially your furry friends!<br><br>Paradise Bay Resort offers the most stunning natural setting and is the best kept secret on Oahu. The resort is just minutes from Kailua, Lanikai and Kualoa Beaches with just a 30 minute drive separating us from the airport, Waikiki and the North Shore.<br><br>The resort offers a wide variety of room sizes from studios up to 5 bedroom suites. Each  suite offers a full kitchen or kitchenette, and most suites offer a spacious and private covered lanai, with ocean, bay and mountain views. During your stay enjoy panoramic views of the Ko'olau and Kualoa Mountains with breath taking views of Kaneohe Bay, Chinaman's Hat Island and the Pacific Ocean. <br><br>We have specially appointed pet friendly rooms as well as a newly renovated pet play area! Each furry family member is greeted with plush pet beds, healthy treats, toys, and food bowls. When booking your room please advise booking agent you will be bringing along your wet nosed friend. We have a maximum of two pets per room with a 50 pound weight limit. We do make acceptions so please don't hesitate to ask!<br><br>Our guests get to enjoy complimentary daily breakfast, WIFI, maid service, private parking, Wednesday Night Aloha Dinner with island cuisine, live Hawaiian music and Mai Tais(2), Friday night Mojito night and a complimentary Eco and Sandbar excursion on Saturdays .<br><br>We offer kayaking and standup paddle boarding on property as well as private boat charters, kite boarding packages, fishing tours, guided kayak and SUP eco tours.<br><br>Paradise Bay Resort is also a great destination for weddings, group travel, and business travel. We have a wide variety of meeting facilities to fit any groups needs.<br><br>Return from an exhilarating day and stretch out on our luxurious sheets, under our tropical ceiling fans. If you are in the mood for a little relaxation, come lounge by the resort pool, floating dock, or kick back and enjoy a cool drink in the lobby which looks out over the bay to the incredible mountains.<br><br>Paradise Bay also offers on call Spa services to guests. Treat yourself with a massage, facial, manicure/pedicure, or get your hair done for a night out on the town.<br><br>Experience the Windward side of Oahu and escape the hustle, bustle and crowds of Waikiki. Come get lost in Paradise!

ZIP: 95338

BOOKCOMMENTS: These pet-friendly vacation rentals are about 40 minutes from Yosemite.
COMMENTS: Conveniently located within four, to nine miles of the Historic, Gold Rush town of Mariposa, SierraScape's vacation rentals are all within 40 minutes of Yosemite National Park.  Although a short distance from Yosemite itself, all three of our homes provide a combined element of Peace, Privacy and Affordability that accommodations inside the park cannot.  If you're looking to be conveniently close to Yosemite but would prefer to not spend your vacation placed in an over-crowded development or conventional resort/hotel setting then we may have JUST what you're looking for.<br><br>Our Amenities Include:<br><br>* Superb Locations, each on 7 to 8 acres * Total Privacy and Seclusion * Beautiful, Sunny Garden Patios/Decks * Large, PRIVATE Outdoor Spas * Stone, Wood-Burning Fireplaces * Beautiful, Full-Amenity Kitchens * Full-Size Washers & Dryers * Satellite TV, HBO - DVD/VCR * Stereo Systems, including iPod ports * Wireless Internet * Ping Pong & Foosball Tables * Fenced Yard (at one home) * Playgrounds, Kid's Corners, Toys, Books & Games * Cribs, High-Chairs, Booster Seats etc. * Scoop Sets, Dog Bowls & more.<br><br>Reasons to Choose Mariposa:<br><br>Staying outside the park allows visitors a far more diverse vacation experience than being inside Yosemite ever can.  From any one of our three cabins you can be in town within ten minutes and either choose from a wide variety of great, local restaurants or simply enjoy Mariposa's historic charm, its art galleries, antique and gift shops or the county park and playground. There are also the California State Mining and Mineral Museum, the Mariposa Gold Country Museum and History Center, California's oldest operating courthouse & the historic jail house, built in 1858.   There are Local Wineries, a Farmer's Market (seasonal), free, summertime live-music in the Art Park (kids and friendly dogs welcome!), a beautiful, heated town pool, the new and challenging Skate Park and an exceptional new Yoga Studio, as well. There's simply more to your Yosemite vacation in Mariposa!<br><br>Dogs are $15 per night, or a maximum of  $60 - We do not discriminate against large dogs, all will be considered.  Local Pet Sitting/Dog Walking etc. services are available. <a href="http://www.dogfriendly.com/servlet/refer?from=pageYosemite&dest=http://www.yosemitevacations.biz" target="_blank">Click here to learn more about SierraScape Vacation Rentals dog-friendly accommodations.</a>

COMMENTS: The Country House Resort is an independent and family owned property. You will find the resort to be a secluded gem on the waters of Sister Bay, close to everything, yet away from it all.<br><br>Enjoy the adult atmosphere (we welcome adults and children 13 years and older), located on 27 wooded acres with 1,100 feet of private shoreline. 46 rooms and suites, including designated dog friendly accommodations, are located on a bluff overlooking the waters of Sister Bay. They are not allowed in non-dog guestrooms at any time.<br>* Proof of current rabies vaccination will be required at check-in.<br>* Dogs are not allowed in the lobby or in the pool/whirlpool deck areas at any time.<br>* Dogs must be kept on leash at all times.<br>* Dog owners are responsible for walking their dogs in <br>* dog friendly<br>*  areas of the resort only. You must <br>* pick up<br>*  after your dog on all areas of the resort property. <br>* Dogs are never to be left unattended in guestrooms <br>* Dogs must not bark or otherwise disturb other guests on property.<br>* Dogs must weigh less than 80 lbs.<br>* No more than two dogs are allowed per room.

Alarm system and central heating. Sleeps 6 with 3 bedrooms, 2-1/2 bathrooms. Master bedroom: 1 king bed with Tempurpedic mattress. 2nd bedroom: 1 full-size bed. 3rd bedroom: 2 twin beds. Pet friendly gated and fenced hilltop property with great views of the western valley. Private 1.6 acres, haven for deer, squirrels, grey fox, owls, hawks and numerous other bird species. 2-car garage and driveway RV parking. Amenities: Wood fireplace (family room and living room), Cable TV (family room and master bedroom), DVD player, digital telephone with voicemail, high speed cable internet and WIFI service. Portable propane grill (back patio), electric range, electric oven, washer and dryer, microwave, toaster oven, frig, deep freezer, blender, portable mixer, coffeemaker, crockpot, Schlemmer clay cooker, waffle iron. Pots and pans, cooking utensils, mixing bowls, dishes, glasses and silverware. We stock toilet paper, paper towels, dish soap, hand soap, laundry soap, fabric softener, bleach, kitchen garbage bags, large trash bags, matches, coffee filters and condiments. COMMENTS: Located in the heart of Vineyard Haven on Martha's Vineyard, Mansion House offers 21st century amenities blended with the charm of yesteryear for pets and people alike. Pet friendly rooms feature doggy beds and clean-up doggy bags and are located on the ground floor for stair-shy pets. Nearby parks and dog-friendly beaches are ready for walks.Ideally situated, Mansion House is surrounded by places and points of interest. HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: Dogs are allowed at this vacation rental home that is a 5 minute walk to downtown. There is a $10 per night pet fee per pet.
COMMENTS: Vacation Rental House, 2 bedrooms + Futon, 1 bath. <br>Sleeps 4-6.<br><br>Dog- and kid-friendly!<br><br>Bisbee House is a charming, historic miner's home in a quiet neighborhood just a short, 5-minute walk from Main Street. Its tree-shaded and fenced courtyard and close proximity to downtown make it a wonderful vacation destination.<br><br>The original adobe structure has been modified and upgraded through the years.  A well-equipped kitchen, vaulted bead board ceilings, LED flat-screen TV, cable, wi-fi, air conditioning, VCR/DVD player, hundreds of VHS tapes, dozens of CDs, and comfortable beds and lounge areas await your visit.<br><br>There are 2 cozy adjoining bedrooms (queen beds) furnished for comfort, and a bath with a clawfoot tub/shower. The living room contains a futon sleeper for additional sleeping accommodations. A laundry room with full-sized washer/dryer is provided. <br><br>Bisbee House is reached via just a few wide/deep steps (no stairway) into a secluded garden courtyard, from which there is a partial view of the mountains. The yard is private (not shared) and is completely fenced -- perfect for those who like to spend time outside in a romantic setting and also handy for those with children and dogs.   The fencing is about 5' high. The house has hardwood floors, tile, and a few rugs.  It's quite suitable for dogs of all sizes.   Lots of 'dog' sheets are provided to cover furniture. The owners are dog lovers who want to ensure dogs are comfortable and safe off-leash. That can be hard to find in Bisbee, but with its garden courtyard outside, and hardwood and tile floors inside, Bisbee House is both kid- and dog-friendly.<br><br>Bisbee House has on-street parking with even more parking in the free city lot nearby. <br><br>The house is typical for Bisbee: it's 832 square feet. The living and dining areas are combined. <br><br>Minimum Age Limit For Renters : Age 25 and up (children and pets with adults age 25 and up are quite welcome). Non Smoking Only : Smoking outside only.<br><br>The house went through lots of updating (painting, refurnishing, a brand new fence, plus a partial kitchen remodel) in May 2012. <br><br>$145/night, 2 nights.  2 night minimum.<br>$120/night, 3-6 nights<br>$695/week.  Monthly rates available upon request.<br>13% city and county lodging taxes<br>$200 deposit, $39 cleaning fee<br>$10/night per dog, max of $50 per dog per stay, 2-dog max<br>Major holidays may require a 3 night minimum.

HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
BOOKCOMMENTS: Many of the 30 vacation rentals in Santa Fe allow dogs. Cats are not allowed. There is a $75 one time additional pet fee for cleaning.
COMMENTS: Welcome to Two Casitas Santa Fe Vacation Rentals<br><br>The best pet friendly homes in all of Santa Fe. Most all of our 30 homes are dog friendly (sorry no cats) There is no size limit or limit on the # of dogs you can have. Each dog has a one time cleaning fee of 75,  unless they are a poodle or terrier with no shedding at all. You will be interview to find out if the house is appropriate for you and your pet.<br><br>The age old adage, location,location,location applies to our vacation rentals . Only Two Casitas offers such a selection of exquisite Santa Fe lodging possibilities.<br><br>Our 30 unique homes are located in Santa Fe's finest neighborhoods, only blocks away from The Plaza, our town's historic center. Nearby are Canyon Road's world-class galleries and restaurants; a short walk takes you to the newly modernized Rail Yard historic district.<br><br>Two Casitas' vacation homes are tucked away in the city's most tranquil residential streets, yet strategically situated so you can experience our beautiful city on foot.<br><br>We offer everything from cozy romantic studios perfect for romantic getaways, to one, two and three bedroom homes.<br><br>Each home is thoughtfully decorated by the owners, with emphasis given to historic design themes, local materials and artisans, yet fully equipped with every modern comfort. Step across the threshold of your Two Casitas vacation rental and you'll know you're not in Kansas anymore---or New York, or Chicago, or Seattle. Santa Fe's distinctive adobe buildings and architecture evoke the city's history as a confluence of Spanish and Native American cultures. Two Casitas promises our guests an authentic Southwest experience.<br><br>Whether you are looking for a century-old adobe home or a contemporary Santa Fe Style home, Two Casitas is sure to have something that will suit your taste. Santa Fe itself offers a unique and enchanting experience rich with breathtaking vistas, award-winning cuisine, phenomenal dining, art, and shopping, excellent museums, and a cultural heritage unlike any other in the United States.<br><br>Come and visit Santa Fe during one of our remarkable seasonal Festivals like Santa Fe Indian Market , Spanish Market, Santa Fe International Folk Art Festival, Come for one of many New Mexico Art tours, Ski Santa Fe, Santa Fe Century bike ride, Santa Fe Wine and Chili Festival. Sofa West, Santa Fe Fiestas. Just name a few. Any season of the year some mayor event is going on in Santa Fe. Just ask your hostess Wendy for any local tips you want. Venture out of Santa Fe and in one hour or so you can visit famed New Mexico artist Georgia O'Keefe Country in Abique. River raft on the Rio Grande. Take a day trip to Taos. Ride the Santa Fe rail train to Albuquerque or Lamy, NM. Visit Bandelier national park. Visit at least one of Northern New Mexico's Native American Pueblos. There are many Golf courses and casinos nearby as well. I could go on and on.<br><br>Experienced travelers know that their choice of lodging defines their journeys. Sustain your Santa Fe memories with Two Casitas.

TITLE: Dunes Realty
ADDRESS: 28 Atlantic Avenue
CITY: Garden City Beach
MAJOR: 
STATE: SC
ZIP: 29576
PHONE: 843-651-2116
TOLLFREE: 888-889-0312
HIGHWAY: None
HIGHWAY1: None
COMMENTS: These days, dogs are more than just pets for many people - they are bona-"fido" members of the family! That's why, for the first time in our 40+ years in business, we began our new dog-friendly rental program on a trial basis in 2010. Based on its rousing success, we're happy to say that it's back for 2011 (and with more participating properties!) As you might expect, there are some rules that must be followed and a small pet fee that will apply; you can see the complete list below.<br><br>So, if a day without your dog leaves you dragging your tail, just check the "dog friendly" box when searching for your next vacation property or view our Myrtle Beach area pet friendly rentals. Hot-diggety-dog!<br><br>Dunes Realty Pet Policies<br><br>A select number of our homes welcome dogs and are advertised as "Dog Friendly."  However, for your own comfort and for the comfort and safety of our homeowners and other guests, there are certain restrictions that must apply.<br><br>Dog friendly properties accept dogs weighing under 35 pounds and at least one (1) year old, with a maximum of two (2) dogs per property.  "Visiting" pets are not allowed.<br>A $200 non-refundable "Fido Fee" ($300 for two dogs) will apply to each reservation that includes a dog.<br>This fee includes the additional services necessary to ensure the comfort of our guests, and will even cover housetraining "accidents" provided they are reported to us as soon as possible.<br>This fee does not cover damage to the property or grounds resulting from a dog, including but not limited to chewing, scratching, digging and unreported housetraining accidents.<br>Guests will be required to sign a waiver indicating that they understand and assume responsibility for any such damage, and a credit card must be kept on file to cover any such expenses.  Damage attributed to a dog is not covered under our regular Damage Waiver.<br>Failure to follow these regulations will result in eviction without refund, as will the presence of a dog in any home not designated as Dog Friendly.<br><br>All local laws and regulations must be followed, and may vary depending on the location of your property. A partial list of those regulations most pertinent to our properties is as follows:<br>All pets must be leashed at all times in all jurisdictions.<br>Pet waste must be collected and properly disposed in all jurisdictions.<br>In Surfside Beach, dogs are not permitted on the public beach during the period between May 15 and September 15.<br>In Garden City Beach (Horry County,) dogs are not allowed on the beach between the hours of 8:00AM to 5:00 PM from May 15 to September 15.<br>In Garden City Beach (Georgetown County,) leashed dogs are permitted on the beach at all times.

Sleeps up to 8 in beds/pull-outs. 2 bedrooms (1 upstairs-king bed, 1 bedroom downstairs w/ double-bed & twin bed), Queen-sized fold out bed in living room, twin bed in loft, 2  baths (with clean water filters on both shower heads). 1400 sq. ft. with vaulted ceiling, loft area with double bed, open plan, TV, DVD, wireless internet, gas grill, jetted garden tub, dining area, washer & dryer.Pool is 50 yards, short (7 to 10-minute) walk to the beach, 15-minute walk to Coligny shopping area or three-minute car ride to either. Quiet and safe condo complex features multiple pools and rec. facilities such as tennis courts. Island is very bike friendly with paths everywhere and reasonable rental by the day or week. <br><br>Weeks book Saturday to Saturday (can accommodate other check in/out times). Taking reservations into 2013. 10% increase for 4th of July Weekend & 5% increase for Labor & Memorial Day & Heritage Weekends. Check in time after 3pm the Saturday beginning your stay, check out before 10am the Saturday ending your stay (may be able to accommodate other check in/out times). Add 11% for all taxes. Security deposit of ($500) required (which will be  returned, less expenses for any damages--please help us keep our track record of never having to withhold any part of any deposit!). There is also a $97 cleaning fee applied.<br><br>Restrictions: NO SMOKING in condo. Our condo can sleep up to 8 adults; The condo association prefers no more than 6 guests to live in each unit, but there are no prohibitions against overnight guests, so if youd like to have others join you on your trip, you will have beds for them. Want to bring your dog? Please see details below.Included in your rental: dishes, flatware, cookware, kitchen utensils, iron, ironing board, bed and bath linens. Since the majority of our guests use only the bedrooms (not the loft or pull out sofa), our cleaning service changes the bedding for the king, the double and the twin in the second bedroom. We provide bedding for the twin in the loft and the queen-sized pull out sofa, but it is not changed out by the cleaning service. We ask that you wash the bedding if you use it. Some guests may prefer to bring their own twin and or queen bedding. Gourmet Kitchen tools and appliances available for a small fee. To make sure that we are able to cover our mortgage, condo fee, utilities and upkeep on this home, we do not negotiate prices in the typical sense. HOWEVER, if you are looking to save money and have goods or services we can make use of to keep our home in top condition, we will be happy to reduce your price by an appropriate amount. Here is our current wish list, but if you have items or services you think our condo could use, please make suggestions and wed be happy to consider them! Any professional services would require appropriate professional insurance, bonding, etc.<br>- New washer (or, if you have the proper insurance, maintenance to our current washer to optimize its performance)<br>- Flat Screen TV (large, preferably with flat wall mount) to replace tube TV in living room.<br>- Small Flat Screen TV (preferably with stand to sit on dresser) to replace tube TV in Master Bedroom.<br>- Paint/Cosmetic: Repaint any room or area per our specs (only if you are a painter by trade); bathrooms would require removal of wallpaper.<br>- Updated Blinds throughout<br>- Flooring: we would love to replace the carpet on the ground level with a bamboo floor. (If you are an installer who can guarantee/warranty your work as well as the floor)<br>- Decorative painting: If you are an interior designer or decorative painter, were open to some fun wall treatments by agreement. We also have some fun ideas for decorative paint on our cabinetry.<br>- Specialty kitchen appliances (especially those suited for a raw/living food kitchen) such as a high speed blender (like a vitamix, a spiralizer, a juicer, etc.)<br>- Home Stereo system and/or DVD player<br>- New dryer, fridge, oven, dishwasher, etc. (nothing wrong with current models, but always open to considering an upgrade)<br>- Maintenance Air Conditioner and/or heat pump to optimize performance.<br>We find it is easiest do discuss such things by phone, so if youre interested in talking about any of these options, please send basic interest along with the best contact number for us to reach you as well as times that are generally good for you to chat. Thanks for your interest in our condo!

BOOKCOMMENTS: This boutique motel has been family owned and operated since 1947. Dogs up to 75 pounds are allowed, for larger pets you need to seek special approval. There is a pet fee for pets more than 30 pounds.
COMMENTS: You have come to the right place where your dog is loved and adored! Up to two pets (30 lbs or less) are FREE; for pets over 30 lbs and up to 75 lbs there will be an additional fee of $10.00 per night per room per stay. Larger pets may be accepted with prior approval. Guests traveling with pets are required to sign a pet waiver upon check-in. <br><br>The Mountain Motel welcomed its first guests in 1947. In 1996, six more rooms were built to accommodate the tremendous influx of visitors to the motel. The Mountain Motel has been a family endeavor, being locally owned and operated since 1947 - over 55 years!<br><br>In December 2011, the new owner of The Mountain Motel felt that it was time to showcase the charm and history of the motel by performing a slight upgrade to the rooms as well as the Mountain Motel's brand. After transforming the office area into a lounge and reading room, the energetic owner set to work to begin outfitting the remaining nine rooms with an exhaustive inventory of Mountain Western Retro furniture, fixtures and room decor. The vision to make the Mountain Motel, Salida's FIRST "boutique motel" and reinventing an American icon - the roadside motel!<br><br>Foremost in the minds of the staff at the Mountain Motel is to provide guests with a comfortable, cozy, distinctive and memorable stay. One-size DOES NOT fit all! Each room has been re-imagined in a unique fashion, which brings the owner's distinct style to a historic Salida motel.<br><br>Room decor is an eclectic collection of "Mountain Western Retro" - reminiscent of properties dating back to the 1950's, and early 1960's.<br><br>We consider the Mountain Motel a forever evolving work of "motel art", where updates and decor are an on-going effort. We especially pride ourselves on being the only Salida, CO motel to bring the "boutique motel" experience to guests visiting the Arkansas River Valley.<br><br>The staff at the Mountain Motel invite you to share our "Mountain Western Retro" experience! Whether it be sharing stories in the lounge on a cold day with other guests, or sipping the special "Mountain Motel" iced-tea on a hot day. Without question, your stay at the Mountain Motel in Salida, Colorado will be a memory to share forever and keep you coming back, year after year.

COMMENTS: Hotel Urbano is a stylish, yet casual art boutique hotel situated in downtown Miami within the active Brickell Avenue Business District. Enjoy close proximity to some of Miami's most tempting beaches, upbeat neighborhoods, renowned attractions, and incredible nightlife. <br><br>Guest rooms feature walk-in showers with luxury bath products and bathrobes, a mini-fridge, balconies or lanais, eclectic interior design, premium TV channels and complimentary high speed internet.<br><br>This downtown Miami hotel features an intimate pool area including four private cabanas equipped with flat screen TV's, a business center and a state-of-the-art fitness center.<br><br>An innovative full-service restaurant and bar that dishes up a variety of South Florida-influenced cuisine is also located on the premises. Indoor, alfresco and poolside dining areas create a casual ambiance. <br><br>In addition, Hotel Urbano partners with Art Fusion Galleries of the Miami Design District, making this Art Hotel distinct and unique, with new exhibits introduced at seasonal art receptions.<br><br>Pets are welcome (25 lb weight limit).
